description.hltext_display: 我企业赴美上市遭调查
description.content:
据《华尔街日报》今日报道，美国证券交易委员会（SEC）着手对部分中国公司赴美上市的“反向收购”行为展开调查，其中重点调查美国会计师、投行以及律师帮助中国公司到美国上市的程序。
美证交会首席会计师Wayne Carnall指出，在美国上市的约340家中国公司，大都雇用一些不知名的美国小型审计公司，而这些公司可能又将项目承包给中国本地公司，由于距离和语言的障碍，可能在审计过程中出现问题。
Wayne Carnall称：“我们先看这个公司的规模，看看涉案人员，并检查公司员工中有没有人会讲普通话或者广东话。”
今年11月，在纳斯达克上市的中国环境产品制造商——绿诺国际有限公司被披露存在财务造假问题。
编译/钱业 记者 尹晓琳 杨铮

description.hltext_display: Taking Advantage of New Media Marketing
description.content:
0 comments | 31 reads
Posted by SYNDICATED BLOG on Dec 21, 2010
[Posted by Josh Bickford,
Marketing Intern, Neolane, Inc.]
It seems you can’t go anywhere today without hearing about new media marketing whether it’s Mark Zuckerberg’s awkward interview on 60 minutes, Google’s constant acquisitions, Avion tequila on Entourage, or 50cent’s twitter page, new media marketing has taken the country by storm; and guess what, it is only the beginning. When talking about new media marketing I am referring to emerging channels of advertising and promotion including search, branded entertainment/product placement, banners, videos, and mobile phones. New media advertising sales have grown 31% in the US since 2007 and the market is currently worth $37.6 billion according to Mintel.
So has there been a complete shift away from traditional channels such as television, radio, cataloging, and print? Not entirely. Actually many of these traditional channels have a greater reach than new media marketing, and are effective in targeting they an older demographic/generation that might not be as receptive/familiar/engaged with new media… But with this greater reach, comes a bigger price tag, and reluctantly, there has been a 30% decline in demand for these more traditional channels from 2007 to 2010 (Mintel). New media marketing has become more popular not only because it reaches younger consumers from higher income households, but also it offers greater measurement, more focused targeting, and reduces total campaign costs.
On the surface the advantages of new media marketing look absolutely divine, but many businesses do not have the back-end systems to manage the plethora of data/information that is available on customers today to fully take advantage of this newer type of marketing.. Simply put, without having a system in place to manage all of the behavioral and demographic customer data — and then take action on it – it’s not humanly possible to manage. Without an automated tool, the amount of data created through all these new channels would be overwhelming, consequently making the information useless. The good news is that there is technology out there to help companies manage this data and act on it – conversational marketing technology. Conversational marketing technology empowers organizations to build and sustain one-to-one personalized lifetime dialogues across all marketing channels that drive revenue and marketing efficiency. It enables marketers to unify inbound and outbound communications strategies by providing a centralized system to track and manage all marketing activity data to generate targeted messaging and the best, most relevant offers based on customer behavior and established preferences. This type of personal relationship with each customer was only achievable in the past on a small-scale; conversational marketing technology now makes it possible for organizations to automate and sustain personalized relationships with every customer, whether they are the first customer or the millionth.
I suspect that like Mark Zuckerberg, we haven’t heard the last word yet on conversational marketing – what are your thoughts?
Republished with author's permission from original post by neolane .

description.hltext_display: Lake Simcoe ice not safe: police
description.content:
Snowmobile breaks through ice near Keswick
YORK REGION — Police are warning people to stay off the Lake Simcoe ice after a man and his young granddaughter had their snowmobile crack through, Tuesday afternoon.
The pair made it to shore safely with only wet feet, but the situation could have been much more dire.
Const. David Howells, with the York Regional Police marine unit, said the thickness is poor in the southern end of the lake, and even worse up towards Barrie. Nowhere on the lake is it safe, he said.
"With the changes in the weather we've had, going hot-cold-hot, we've got rotten ice where it looks like it's about five or six inches," he said. "But it's not stable and is very easy to break through.
"As you come farther north, it gets thinner and thinner," Howells added. "Over towards Thorah Island and in that area, it's all broken up, just jagged, nasty stuff."
Howells urged people to stay off the ice at all costs.
"Right now, it is not safe at all to go out on the ice," he said. "We're advising everybody to stay off. We just haven't had the conditions to make optimal ice that would be reasonably safe for operating snowmobiles or ice-fishing huts."
Howells said the man and the little girl were crossing near Roches Point, north of Keswick, around 2 p.m. when the sled broke through.
"When their feet got wet, they jumped off," he said, adding the snowmobile plummeted through about an inch and a half of ice and sank in approximately 10 feet of water.
The pair made to safety, "but instead of walking to shore, which was about a hundred feet away, they actually ended up walking about a kilometre away from shore," Howells said.
When the duo eventually came back to see if the snow machine was still above the ice, that's when they run into police officers who were unaware of their whereabouts.
"The ice is so crappy there that it won't even hold my weight," Howells said. "I'm about 230 (pounds) and I was going through about every other step."
There are several rules to follow if people must, for whatever reason, venture out onto the ice, Howells said. Have a plan and make sure someone knows where you're going.
"Have a route in and a route out that people know you're going to use, so if they have to come looking for you, they can go to that area," he said.
People are also urged to wear personal flotation devices, be equipped with ice picks, and carry a cellphone and GPS unit.

百度胜诉360一审获赔38.5万
description.content:
羊城晚报讯 记者林曦报道：20日，百度诉360不正当竞争一案一审认定360的行为构成不正当竞争，必须立即停止侵权，刊登声明以消除影响，并赔偿原告百度经济损失及诉讼合理支出共计38.5万元。
受理此案的北京市二中院认为，360在其安全卫士软件和安全中心网站中将百度工具栏和地址栏软件称为“恶评插件”和“恶评软件”的行为，在查杀病毒、木马时将上述两款软件标识出来并进行虚假描述诱导用户删除的行为，以及360安全中心网站中无依据地对上述两款软件进行负面介绍的行为，均构成不正当竞争。
今年8月，百度以不正当竞争之名起诉360，称其打着安全检测的幌子，肆意篡改百度搜索页面结果，借助百度知名度为360.cn网站非法攫取流量，并对百度工具栏和地址栏两软件进行恶意贬损，阻碍其传播和运行，从而抢夺百度用户。百度请求法院判令：360立即停止其不正当竞争行为，赔偿1000万元经济损失以及15万元为制止侵权的合理支出。

description.hltext_display: 网络惊现“手机定位”网站 输入号� �可查机主位置
description.content:
新华网沈阳12月22日电（李相民、范春生）目前在实际生活中，通过手机确定位置已经成为移动运营商开展的正式业务，但必须经过被定位人授权允许。然而记者发现，目前在网上出现了一批声称提供“无声无息定位”服务的网站，只要付费即可找到任何人当前位置。法律人士表示，此类行为涉嫌侵权。
记者最近在网上通过搜索引擎查找“手机定位”，马上出现了不少所谓“手机定位网”。随机点进一个链接后，即出现：“只需要报出手机号码，2分钟即可知道结果，定位误差在50米至100米以内”，定位后提供经纬度、电子地图截屏，部分城市甚至可提供卫星地图。记者拨通了一个号称提供“手机定位”服务的公司，询问能不能定位辽宁省沈阳市的手机，一位男子回答说可以，报价800元，只需要报出要定位的手机号码，被查的机主不会收到任何信息，2分钟后便可定位。
据业内人士介绍，移动手机定位其实并不稀奇，简单来说，就是靠确认手机在哪个基站附近有信号，通过确认基站位置来定位机主位置。之前移动运营商也有推出类似服务，但由于涉及个人隐私，这些信息只能被移动内部查询且需要授权才能调出提供查询。
但在这些定位网站上，却都清清楚楚写明：“无需机主授权”，也就是说对方完全没有察觉。那么这些“手机定位网”到底是如何得到手机信号基站的信息，从而悄无声息地查出被定位者的位置并将此信息高价卖出呢？对此，有的手机定位网站如是解释：“被定位手机不会收到任何提示，完全是在对方没有察觉的情况下进行定位。所以整个过程都是后台操作，需要手机运营商的内部关系的协作，并非仅靠我公司自己的力量就可以完成。”
辽宁良友律师事务所尚尔东律师认为，“手机定位”的原则是“自愿”在先，用户必须同意开通这种功能，才能进行“定位”。如果私自对他人手机进行定位，明显是侵犯别人隐私。他告诉记者，相对于高新技术的飞速发展，立法的脚步显得有些滞后。“现在这些监控设备随处都有，如果造成严重后果，可以追究民事或者刑事责任。但如果还没有构成违法犯罪，很难去界定和管理。”
辽宁社科院实习研究员车流畅则呼吁，企业对于类似手机追踪定位服务之类存在较大争议的产品，在推出时应该慎之又慎。同时有关部门也要加强监管，管理监控设备的不正当生产、交易和流通使用。

description.hltext_display: Falcons top Canisius, but coach not pleased
description.content:
BOWLING GREEN -- The Bowling Green State University women's basketball team enters its winter break on an 11-game winning streak thanks to its 82-59 win over Canisius at Anderson Arena Tuesday night.
But Falcons coach Curt Miller isn't completely happy.
Oh, he's glad his team won, and he's pleased the string of 36 straight regular-season wins at home remains intact. And it's got to be a good feeling to be 11-1, the best start in the program's storied history.
But Tuesday night's victory was not satisfying for Miller.
"I think we have a lot of work to do," he said. "I think we had a poor foul shooting night. I think we fouled too much, and I think we gave them too many free throws.
"Offensively we did some good things. But defensively we could be better."
All 15 players saw action for BG, and no one played more than 26 minutes.
Tracy Pontius led the Falcons with 16 points and six assists, while Jen Uhl had 14 and Chrissy Steffen 12.
Courtney VandeBovenkamp led all scorers with 19 points while Jen Morabito had 18 for Canisius (3-7).
"That's their best offensive output of the year," Miller said of the Golden Griffins' 59 points. "I know we played all 15 players, and I know we only played one starter more than 23 minutes. But I'm still concerned that we let them get away from us offensively.
"We need to be better defensively with [Mid-American Conference] play just around the corner."
Bowling Green rolled to an early 23-8 lead in the first seven minutes as the Falcons made five of their first eight 3-point attempts. Steffen made 3-of-5 from behind the 3-point arc in the first half and 4-of-8 in the game.
"They were concerned with where Lauren [Prochaska] and Tracy were in zone, and [Chrissy] took advantage of that," Miller said. "She had three big 3's in the first half, and she made one out of the gate to start the second half.
"If she continues to be aggressive and look for her offense, she can be a big x-factor for this team."
And while Canisius never came closer than 13 points after that -- and Bowling Green extended its lead to as many as 31 in the second half -- the Falcons seemed listless in their first game in 10 days.
"There was definitely a lot of distractions, with Christmas break and finals week," Prochaska said. "Coach talked about us getting the job done, taking care of business, and then having some fun."
Steffen agreed, adding, "Coach spent time before the game talking about what we need to concentrate on. He was keen on our defense, because that's always going to [help] our offense.
"In the first half he thought we gave up too much, so in the second half we came out pretty strong."
BG, which led 46-30 at the break, started the second half on an 11-2 run to put the game out of reach.
But the Falcons were far from perfect in the second half.
"We fouled 19 times, and that's a lot of fouls for us [it tied a season high]," Miller said. "We put that team on the line 23 times [also a season high for an opponent], and that's a recipe for disaster with the way we play."
It also proved to be a disappointing night for Prochaska, who saw her NCAA Division I record for consecutive free throws made come to an end. She made her first three before leaving the fourth short off the front rim, ending the streak at 70.
"It has been fun to have the streak, but it had to come to an end sometime," Prochaska said. "It has been exciting, and it has been an honor -- I actually received a letter from Ginny Doyle, the person who had the record. That was really neat that she took the time to do that."
NOTES: Among those attending Tuesday night's game were nine members of BG's 2006 "Sweet 16" squad, including Ali Mann, Liz Honegger, and Carin Horne.
Contact John Wagner at: jwagner@theblade.com or 419-724-6481.

description.hltext_display: Parksville vehicle involved in fatal crash near Yale, B.C.
description.content:
Recommend on Facebook
others also read...
Parksville Qualicum News
Vancouver Island Central
HOPE - A crash in Yale Dec. 20 claimed the life of a woman and seriously injured three others.
A Dodge Caravan, which the woman in her fifties was driving, and an extended-cab pickup truck were involved in a head-on collision at approximately 10 a.m. Monday, December 20.
"Initial investigation indicates a northbound Dodge Caravan from Pitt Meadows entered into the southbound lane and struck a GMC Sierra pick up, from Parksville, head-on," said Sgt. Peter Thiessen, of the Lower Mainland District Regional Police Service, in a press release.
"Evidence at the scene indicates the Dodge Caravan was completely in the oncoming southbound lane prior to impact," added Thiessen.
The crash occurred in a two-lane section of Highway 1, within a series of curves, at the southern end of the small community.
— from the Hope Standard/Black Press

description.hltext_display: 18:14 - Avviava giovani alla prostituzione, 40enne in manette
维基百科筹资遇困 粉丝求助巴西亿万富豪
description.content:
四位热心� 的维基百科粉丝发起了一场经过精心策划的社交媒体活动，试图说服巴西亿万富豪艾克·巴提斯塔（Eike Batista，全球第八大富豪）向这个非盈利组织捐献部分现金。
维基百科是由志愿者编写的在线百科全书，据说每月有近4亿人浏览其网页。明年1月，维基百科将迎来十周年纪念，但它显然在达成筹资目� �方面遇到了麻烦（维基百科并不向用户收取费用或出售广告）。
维基百科正努力通过其维基媒体基金会（Wikimedia Foundation）筹集1600万美元资金，以“支付员工薪水和技术费用”。该基金会筹资网站（12月17日进行了最近一次更新）显示，维基百科距离2010年筹资目� �还有510万美元的缺口。 为了帮助该组织从巴提斯塔手中得到捐款，维基百科爱好者采取了简单的方法。他们使用Twitter和Facebook发起了一个经过精心策划的网站——艾克百科（Eikepedia.com）。这场活动已经引起了巴西国家媒体的关注，但在社交领域里的反响却似乎有些冷淡（到目前为止，艾克百科只有146条推文和150个Facebook爱好者）。
艾克百科网站显示：
“我们这场活动的目的，是让这位精明的商人意识到维基百科的重要性，希望他会慷慨地向维基百科捐款。” 目� �为什么是艾克·巴提斯塔？活动组织者向巴西《圣保罗页报》（Folha de So Paulo）表示，他们想起巴提斯塔曾在去年宣布向麦当娜的慈善团体捐款，于是他们认为巴提斯塔也会将维基百科视作一个有意义的事业。 � �据《福布斯》的最新记录，巴提斯塔拥有270亿美元资产。除了麦当娜的慈善团体之外，他还支持了其他多个慈善组织。他曾资助里约热内卢竞争2016年奥运会主办权，并承诺向自然保护事业捐款500万美元。在2009年，巴提斯塔共捐款约3,500万美元。
已有人向巴提斯塔发出邮件，以弄清他在向维基百科捐款这个问题上是何想法，但尚未得到这位亿万富豪的回应。
作者：Keren Blankfeld 译 于波
(本文来源：福布斯 )

description.hltext_display: Full-service care, from pregnancy to birth
description.author: Janice Neumann
description.content:
Hospital program pairs moms-to-be with dedicated nurses
X
Text Size
ct-x-s-health-great-expectations-20101222
After Angela Gazdziak discovered she was pregnant, the questions flowed: When should she go to the hospital after labor pains hit? Should she be worried if she didn't feel the baby move? What if she couldn't breastfeed?
Gazdziak didn't want to pester her obstetrician with repeated questions but still, she wanted answers.
The first-time mom lucked out at Little Company of Mary Hospital and Health Center in Evergreen Park, which pairs pregnant women with nurses who counsel them from their 20th week through delivery. Moms who deliver at the hospital's Family Birth Center receive periodic calls from their nurse, who answers questions and discusses concerns, reviews their pregnancy and shares information about prenatal classes and other hospital services.
"I have a mom and mother-in-law and we have friends who have all had kids, but to have somebody with a stronger medical background was great," said Gazdziak, who lives in Chicago. "She could step up and say, 'Look, here's what you should do' or 'here's what the game plan is' and I just instantly felt better."
A day after Gazdziak delivered a healthy baby girl, Hannah, in early December, Linda Rodriguez, her support nurse, was there to check up on the two.
Gazdziak said she was also relieved that her husband, Graham, could spend the night with her and Hannah after the delivery. The recovery suites offer a cozy setting with a queen-size bed, dressing table and adjoining room for visitors and meals.
Christmas decorations recently adorned the nurse's station and each time a baby was born, Brahms' Lullaby played over the hospital loudspeakers.
"I think they're less nervous because they have someone they can turn to, sort of like a big sister with medical knowledge to help them get through this," said Rodriguez.
The Great Expectations Nurse Program was started in 2008, when nurses were discussing plans for a huge hospital expansion and decided a new support program was also in order.
"It's like a partnership between the patient and a nurse," said Pam Gelezauskas, the nurse who oversees the program with the help another nurse, Mary Grimm.
The $150 million hospital expansion, which includes a new Comprehensive Women's Center, could be complete by the end of 2012.
The Great Expectations program appears to be unique in the region, though area hospitals typically offer prenatal classes and various amounts of support.
At South Suburban Hospital in Hazel Crest, nurses give tours of the Family Birth Center and high-risk moms come in weekly for tests, getting to know most staff members. Nurses also make follow-up calls to moms after delivery and coach moms on breastfeeding. New moms also receive a massage.
Adrienne Kyle of Evergreen Park said the support at Little Company of Mary made her delivery of her daughter Ella in 2009 that much easier.
"It was a really nice surprise," said Kyle, who plans to deliver another baby there in March. "I just had a great hospital to deliver a baby in, from prenatal to education to hospitalization, the whole nine yards," said Kyle.

description.hltext_display: Jackets take command early against Wildcats
description.content:
Perrysburg capitalizes on Northview turnovers
Perrysburg used a stifling defense to force 14 first-half turnovers while building a big early lead, and then cruised to a 57-42 Northern Lakes League win over Northview Tuesday night.
The Yellow Jackets knocked Northview out of its comfort zone right from the start, scoring the game's first nine points as the Wildcats committed turnovers on their first four possessions.
"We came out with some defensive intensity, and we got our hands on some balls," Perrysburg coach Dave Boyce said. "We made some smart decisions in the open court."
The Perrysburg lead was 15-2 when Tyler Gordon scored on a drive to the basket just over midway through the first period, and the margin stood at 21-8 when the first quarter was complete.
"That's been our biggest problem -- every single game we've been down in the first quarter," Northview coach Terry Shadle said. "That's something we're trying to work through, but it makes it tough when that happens."
The Wildcats continued to turn the ball over in the second quarter, and when Perrysburg scored on an inbounds play with about three minutes left in the half, the lead was 28-10. Northview got a little surge to end the half, but still was down 30-18.
"We made some bad decisions, especially in that first half, but it also had to do with Perrysburg's defense -- they put you into terrible position," Shadle said.
The Wildcats (1-4, 0-4 NLL) showed some life in the third period and knocked the lead down to 33-24 in the first two minutes, but each time Northview made a run, Perrysburg senior Kevin Schenk responded. Schenk, who finished with 22 points, hit five 3-pointers in the second half, with most of them coming after Northview had made some progress whittling down the lead.
Perrysburg (4-2, 3-1 NLL) led 44-35 after three quarters, but after Scott Milne scored in the lane and Schenk buried a triple from the corner early in the final period, the Yellow Jackets were back up by 16. Boyce said that despite his team's hot start, he fully expected Northview to make a run.
"You knew they were going to come back and play hard and not go away," Boyce said. "You see it all of the time, when you're hot earlier and you have a big streak, and then you have a bad possession or two, sometimes it turns into five or six. But we kept playing defense. We kept our poise on defense."
Shadle said he was encouraged that his team, which is primarily underclassmen, continued to battle the more veteran Yellow Jackets.
"We're young and we don't give up, but we're not consistent enough with our efforts," Shadle said.
"They're not quitting, but we just can't get over that hump. I'm getting tired of saying that we're young, because at some point they've got to get older. But we're definitely going through some growing pains."
Casey Schaffer led the Wildcats with 12 points, while Austin Schmidt had 10.
Karter Sell added 10 for a Perrysburg team that Boyce said is still evolving.
"The thing we have to realize is that it's December 21st and we're not as good as we're capable of being," Boyce said. "We've got to get better. We've got some big games coming up."
Contact Matt Markey at: mmarkey@theblade.com or 419-724-6510.

description.hltext_display: Deutsche Bank admits wrongdoing in tax shelter probe, faces $554 million fine
description.content:
AHN News Staff
Washington, United States (AHN) – Deutsche Bank has been ordered to pay a fine of $554 million, an amount that the Internal Revenue Service (IRS) failed to collect through taxes and interests.
The fine was imposed on the bank after it confessed of helping rich people to evade themselves from the U.S. taxes.
Federal prosecutors and the Justice Department stressed on the need of a non-prosecution agreement, under which the bank will be asked to continue cooperation.
They also sought an outside expert’s assurance that the bank would not do such criminal wrongdoing again. They said tax evasion happened between 1996 to 2002.
The Deutsche's fine also includes a $149 million civil penalty. The prosecutors also fined UBS bank a sum of $780 million for helping its clients hide their accounts from the IRS.
In a statement, the bank expressed its happiness that the case had been resolved. A statement said, "Since 2002, the bank has significantly strengthened its policies and procedures as part of an ongoing effort to ensure strict adherence to the law and the highest standards of ethical conduct."
The bank added that the settlement would not impact its current net income as it had already kept the money aside for this purpose.
Article © AHN – All Rights Reserved

description.hltext_display: 京东商城开卖土特产 已与17省市签署采购合同
description.content:
DoNews 12月22日消息，京东商城已与17个省市的地方供应商签署采购合同，计划将“各地商品大集”活动搬上网，为全国各地商品大流通提供新渠道。
据了解，京东商城目前已与来自陕西、云南、黑龙江、福建、江西等全国17个省市自治区的地方供应商签署采购合同，采购项目包括茶叶、酒类、休闲食品、干货食品、农产品等商品。
京东商城表示，该公司将不断加强物流服务体系建设，满足食品等特殊商品存储、运输需求。目前，京东商城位于北京、上海、广州、成都的京东四大仓储中心已专门建立了恒温恒湿仓库，保证特产的品质及安全。
2010年年初，北京市开始举办各地商品大集活动。来自北京市商务委公布数据显示，“各地商品大集”共计举办18期，现场累计销售额达1.16亿元，签约洽谈金额达16.27亿元，已有289个各地品牌通过大集平台进入北京市场。(完)

description.hltext_display: زارا حفيدة الملكة إليزابيث تتزوج لاعب رغبي
description.content:
زارا فيليبس، حفيدة الملكة إليزابيث من ابنتها آن
لندن، بريطانيا (CNN) -- ذكر بيان للقصر الملكي البريطاني، الثلاثاء، إن زارا فيليبس، حفيدة الملكة اليزابيث من ابنتها الأميرة آن، ستتزوج من لاعب رغبي، يدعى مايك تيندال.
ولم يحدد البيان موعد زفاف زارا، التي تبلغ من العمر 29 عاما، وهي ابنة الأميرة آن من زوجها الأول مارك فيليبس، التي أثارت بصورتها كفتاة متمردة قبل سنوات زوبعة ومتابعة من قبل الصحافة البريطانية.
وتحترف زارا ركوب الخيل، وهي حاصلة على ميدالية ذهبية للفردي في مسابقة عالمية للفروسية.
أما خطيبها، فكان ضمن الفريق الإنجليزي للرغبي، الذي فاز بكأس العالم عام 2003.
ويأتي نبأ الخطوبة، بعد شهرين من إعلان الأسرة المالكة في بريطانيا، عن موعد ومكان زواج الأمير وليام وخطيبته كيت ميدلتون، الذي تقرر أن يقام حفل الزفاف في كنيسة "ويستمنستر آبي"، في 29 أبريل/ نيسان 2011.
وقال المتحدث باسم الأمير تشارلز، وريث العرش البريطاني، في بيان آنذاك، إن "الأسرة الملكية سوف تدفع لحفل الزفاف، كما فعلت في السابق، خلال حفل زفاف أمير وأميرة ويلز عام 1981، والأميرة إليزابيث والأمير فيليب عام 1947."
وتُعد كنيسة "ويستمنستر أبي"، التي يبلغ عمرها أكثر من ألف عام، المفضلة لدى الأسرة المالكة، كما كانت مثاراً لتكهنات الكثير من وسائل الإعلام، بعد إعلان خطبة الأمير وليام، وهو الثاني في ترتيب ولاية عرش بريطانيا بعد الأمير تشارلز، على كيت ميدلتون.

description.hltext_display: 工信部：我国移动终端产能全球第一 智能终端远落后于国外
description.author: DoNews
description.content:
C114讯 12月22日消息（李明）在今天举行的2011中国通信技术年会上，工信部科技司副局级巡视员戴晓慧表示，我国移动终端产能排名全球第一，� 全球移动终端总产量超过50%，但是在智能终端发展方面我国还比较落后，尤其是高端智能终端� 乎都被国外企业� 领。戴晓慧指出，在未来的移动互联网发展中，中国大有希望。首先，我国移动用户总数排名全球第一，比世界排名第二和第三位的国家用户之和还高出12%；同时，我国移动终端产能排名全球第一，� 全球产量超过50%；此外，中国移动通信运营商已经迈入世界运营商前列。据C114了解，截至今年11月底，我国移动电话用户累计已达8.42亿户。 而对于即将到来的十二五，戴晓慧认为，在调结构、转方式的大背景下，大力发展战略性新兴信息通信产业将是主要方向，其中包括移动互联网、移动支付、三网融合、下一代互联网、智能终端、信息服务业、LTE、宽带以及物联网。
戴晓慧特别针对我国移动终端的发展进行了阐述，她表示，我国移动终端产能排名全球第一，� 全球移动终端总产量超过50%，但是在智能终端发展方面我国还比较落后，尤其是高端智能终端� 乎都被国外企业� 领。终端给用户带来很多便利，很多业务集中在终端上。戴晓慧肯定地说，在十二五期间，智能终端的发展将是我们重大� �局的一个发展方向。工信部科技司副局级巡视员 戴晓慧

description.hltext_display: 网络上悬疑的“给力快乐教练”大揭秘
description.content:
近日，一组“给力快乐教练”恶搞微博的宣传图片在网上传播开来，这组图片上包含了外国友人、普通工人、出租司机、情侣、儿童等十多种不同身份的人，他们都举着同一个带有“求关注，12月23日，给力啊！快乐教练”的公告牌，引来了网友的好奇和猜测。
这是一个活动的预先告知？还是什么商家在炒作？经过记者的调查，原来这个令诸多人摸不到头脑的“给力快乐教练”，原是12月23日，国内运动品牌贵人鸟在优酷上线的大型互动活动：给力啊！快乐教练(http://u.youku.com/user_show/id_UMzE2NTA2NTY0.html)。
据悉，“给力啊！快乐教练”这个活动与贵人鸟最近签约的隋菲菲、李琰等五位快乐教练有关，网友通过在线答题和互动，有机会获得丰厚的奖品，还可与五位教练探讨与运动相关。活动最终的目的，就是为了让网友了解“运动快乐”的理念，在2011年多参与运动，释放压力的同时收获运动带来的快乐。

description.hltext_display: India tests nuclear-capable, short-range missile
description.content: India successfully tested a short-range, nuclear-capable missile with a range of 220 miles (350 kilometers) on Wednesday, an official said.

description.hltext_display: Stop Sending Emails that Trick me into a Conversation.
description.content:
0 comments | 131 reads
Just because you can push a button and fire off an email to your closest 300 prospects, doesn’t mean you should.
In fact, if the emails you’re sending are anything like the emails filling up most our inboxes, you need to take a step back from the keyboard and get a new marketing plan.
We are breaking email marketing.
It’s true.
It’s hard to deny that most of the email conversations we send are downright silly.
They are the same type of stuff that we delete with hardly a second’s worth of time or attention.
We know better. Even when this nonsense gets mixed in between dozens of other emails that need our attention
We’ve seen it all before, right?
There’s always a holiday.
There’s always another “super, big, fantastical deal”.
There’s always another reason the buyer needs to “act now”.
We’re annoyed when we’re the guy in the “to:” line.
But we’re all to willing to generate this stuff by the truckload if we think it will help us generate a few extra leads.
And that’s a healthy goal.
Lead generation is the key to making sure you hit your sales goals.
But tricky leads into having a conversation is just about the worst sales and marketing idea of all time…
And before you stop and indignantly reassure me that you don’t do any of that type of thing, take a look at this email.
It probably looks pretty familiar.
And maybe I was just in a bad mood when I saw this last week, but it certainly started to drive me insane when I started to dive a little deeper in the conversation.
You are probably annoyed at a few of these things as well.
You feel like you are being tricked into a conversation that you don’t really want to have.
Here are five things you need to avoid:
Using trite imagery without a conversation that references it later — What’s the point of the email? The imagery makes me think that you might be trying to wish me a “Merry Christmas”. You don’t need to. I won’t be offended if you decide to go another direction. But it is confusing that you don’t ever reference why you have those images there. It’s distracting. And confusing. Instead of the conversation that you want to have with me, my mind is reexamining why it doesn’t all add up. And then I feel a little stupid that I can’t seem to understand it.
Writing confusing body content that has me thinking you sent the email to the wrong person — Why do I have to reread your paragraph to try to figure out what you are trying to say? It’s not helpful. It makes me stop and wonder if maybe you have the wrong person. Bad grammar, incomplete thoughts, and unclear assumptions force most people to just stop reading your pitch.
Referring to yourself (or the supposed sender) in the third person -- Are you having a conversation with me or not? There is nothing that destroys a conversations faster than you realizing that the person you are talking with doesn’t really care. Doesn’t really care about you. Doesn’t really care about the conversation that they started. That the person is happy to talk with you as long as you agree to do what they want you to do. Use the first person if you are sending a personal email. Use the first person if you are inserting a signature. Anything else is just pretentious.
Using white space to mask the mass email status of the conversation – Are you trying to hide something? If it’s a mass email, then use language that is personal, but directed to a group. Use wording that indicates that the recipient is important but part of a larger group of people that is being communicated with. That can even work to drive camaraderie between the the different people who are part of this communication thread. But being tricky (or appearing tricky) is just a bad way to start building rapport.
Trapping the reader into unreliable “unsubscribe” activity – Is there a link to get me out of you sending me future chicanery? If I email you with “unsubscribe” will you email back letting me know that you have removed me from the email list? After all the other screw-ups on this email and the “icky” way that I feel about you now, it just adds more distrust to your communication. This is super simple to solve too. Add a hyperlink that walks the read through their options as an unsolicited receiver of junk mail. Trapping people just makes them furious.

description.hltext_display: Was soll ich spielen? Mit Geld spielt man!
description.author: Redaktion KinderZEIT
description.content: Einmal Herr über das Geld sein – das wäre doch was! Man könnte zum Beispiel einfach so viele Scheine drucken, dass niemand mehr Not leiden muss. Doch halt: Zu viel Geld ist auch nicht gut, es erzeugt Inflation (vereinfacht bedeutet es, dass man weniger für sein Geld bekommt). In Europa ist es der Job der Europäischen Zentralbank, dabei die richtige Balance zu finden. Wer sich selbst als Währungshüter versuchen will, kann das jetzt in einem Onlinespiel tun. Es heißt €conomia und ist über die Internetseite der Zentralbank (www.ecb.int) zu erreichen. Ziel des Spieles ist, die Preise möglichst stabil zu halten. Das ist aber nicht leicht, wenn Finanzturbulenzen und Ölkrisen dazwischenkommen. Eben wie im wirklichen Leben. Bei der Entwicklung des Spiels haben nämlich Wirtschaftswissenschaftler der Zentralbank geholfen, also diejenigen, die sich in der realen Welt um den Euro kümmern.

description.hltext_display: 东风悦达起亚借K5重拾中高端信心
description.content:
本报讯 （记者 高杉）本次广州车展上，韩系品牌动作可谓大张旗鼓，而即将国产的起亚K5格外引人瞩目，不仅是因为其亮眼的造型设计，更因为它让东风悦达起亚曾经丢失在B级车市场的信心重新回归。
由从奥迪而来的世界著名设计师彼得·希瑞尔设计的全新家族徽征，在K5上得以最完整的诠释，从外形上看，似乎再难找到传统概念上韩系车的影子，而确实突显出了德国味道。东风悦达起亚最终将这款车型引入国产，也找到了在国内中高端的B级车市场，争得一席之地的武器。该品牌销售本部副本部长王敦明充满信心地表示：“我们明年的目标是进入行业前10名。”这款K5将把竞争对手锁定为所有B级车，而且自信其是最具竞争力和设计感的车型，而借由它在明年3月份推出市场之时，明年企业的年销售目标锁定在40万辆，要比今年33万辆的销售成绩高出20%的增长。而另一位销售本部副本部长蒋玉滨则更有信心：“我们预期明年销量为43万台，相对今年增长30%。”
有了中高端车的信心及对品牌的提升作用，东风悦达起亚还将在明年6月推出全新车型QB。此外，营销网络建设也将得到进一步拓展，王敦明透露，“销售网络将采取以4S店+直营店的模式立体式全面覆盖，数量将由现有的346家扩展到440家，并将开展24小时服务、上门服务等特色服务项目。”

description.hltext_display: Start cruises by defending champ Hathaway Brown
description.content:
Start's Maleeka Kynard goes for a layup against Hathway Brown during the Spartan Holiday Classic. Kynard scored 15 points as the Spartans earned a decisive victory over the defending Division II state champions.
( THE BLADE/LORI KING )
Zoom | Photo Reprints
Playing a two-time defending state championship team early in the season figures to only make Start better down the road.
Considering how Start took it right to reigning Division II state champion Hathaway Brown Tuesday night to score a decisive 58-42 victory in the final game of the Spartan Holiday Classic, the future is looking good for the Spartans.
Jaymie Jackson and Maleeka Kynard combined for 31 points to lead the way for the Spartans.
Jackson scored 10 of her game-high 16 points in the first half while Kynard finished with 15 points, erupting for 11 in the final period.
Azia Bishop also finished in double figures, scoring seven of her 10 points in the fourth quarter.
"I just picked it up on defense and my defense led me through," said Jackson, who made 9 of 10 free throws.
Kynard's fourth-quarter output led the Spartans to outscoring the Blazers 25-19 during the final period. Start outscored Brown 37-25 in the second half after taking a 21-17 lead into halftime.
"We just told each other at halftime that we need to go out and play harder in the second half," Kynard said.
Brown coach Paul Barlow said trying to defend against the Spartans (4-0), a team he considers one of the top Division I programs this season, proved to be a challenge. Start made seven 3-pointers, including three by Keia McCarver, who finished with nine points.
"We knew we were going to have our hands full," Barlow said. "I thought we played hard and I thought we did some good things defensively.
"The problem, we didn't cover their 3-point shooters."
The Spartans went into halftime with a slim four-point advantage over the Blazers (3-3).
Jackson's scoring in the first half carried the Spartans in the early periods. Eight of her points came in the second quarter and helped Start outscore Brown 13-9 during the period.
Jackson came down with an offensive rebound off a missed free throw by Bishop and scored from close range to give the Spartans an 18-10 lead with 2:48 left in the half. It was their largest lead in the game up to that point.
Brown closed out the half with a 7-4 run to end up trailing by only by four points at the break. Tanisha Lawler, who was held scoreless in the first half, led Brown with a team-high 13 points.
Start opened the third quarter with a 10-2 run and led 31-21 after Jackson made a pair of foul shots with just over three minutes left in the period. The Spartans finished the quarter with a 33-23 advantage, but ended up heading into the fourth quarter without one of their mainstays.
Bishop twisted her left ankle going for a rebound with less than a minute remaining in the third quarter and was taken into the locker room.
The University of Kentucky-bound post player, who appeared to be done for the night, actually returned to the court with just under five minutes remaining in the game.
She shook off the injury and played perhaps her best stretch of the game during the final quarter.
"When I hurt my ankle that was just telling me that I had to get back in there and be strong," Bishop said, who also grabbed 11 rebounds and blocked five shots.
Contact Donald Emmons at: demmon@theblade.com or 419-724-6302.

description.hltext_display: 内蒙移动80万条红色短信成党风廉政建设新载体
description.author: DoNews
description.content:
由内蒙古自治区纪检委，内蒙古自治区党委组织部、内蒙古宣� 部主办，新华社内蒙古分社、中国移动内蒙古公司承办的大型“i生活，爱家乡— 印象?内蒙古”系列主题活动在全区开展以来，通过各类手机媒体平台已� 播廉政信息八十余万条，有超过3万名党员、干部对此活动表现出极大兴趣并积极参与。 系列活动之一的“红色空中课� �”，面向内蒙古自治区党员干部和广大群众，创� 性的运用手机这种多媒体� 播平台，以短、彩信的形式，积极� 唱各行各业先进基层党组织、优秀共产党员的先进事迹和党的优秀� 统。借助手机媒体本身具备的便捷性和时效性，� �立了良好的社会风尚，兴起了创先争优的热潮，奏响了新时代红色学� 的最强音。有效地提升了广大干部群众的政治学� 热情和政治� 养，有力地推动了地区廉政建设的前进步伐。
据了解，印象?内蒙古“红色空中课� �”，借助“读红报-新华手机报（政务版）、新华快讯、读红书-手机阅读红色书籍”等媒体信息平台对全区党员进行红色教育；同时以蒙汉双语形式，将廉政要求和反腐倡廉案例、革命书籍和草原文化书籍准确、及时地� 达至全区各级政府、企事业单位党员干部和学生群体。内蒙古自治区纪委活动相关负责人表示：“红色空中课� �开设以来，有效地提升了广大干部群众的政治学� 热情和政治� 养，有力地推进了地区廉政建设。让广大干部群众通过移动多媒体平台，能够随时随地的接受廉政教育、进行先进性学� ，并为其积极自主的参与创先争优活动创� 了良好的� 道和平台。”让广大干部群众通过移动多媒体平台，能够随时随地的接受廉政和先进性教育，积极主动参与创先争优活动。

description.hltext_display: 赶集摘中国商业网站百强分类信息第一
description.content:
由中国科学院《互联网周刊》与中国社科院信息化研究中心主办、易观国际等权威调研机构参与评选的“2010中国互联网经济论坛”日前在京举行，赶集网荣膺“中国商业网站百强分类信息行业第一名”。
赶集网联合创始人兼首席执行官杨浩涌谈及此次获奖时的感受时称，分类信息网站的核心价值一定在于用户体验。赶集网目前已经成为中国最大最活跃的分类信息网，这应该得亏赶集网一直将用户良好的体验放在最核心部位。“如今赶集网的流量一直名列分类信息行业之首，一个好的网站要通过技术创新推动产品研发，以好的用户体验来获取良好的口碑，最终达到流量的增长，这才是一个好的网站发展的轨迹。”

description.hltext_display: Roger Federer vince il "Match for Africa" ma il trionfo è totale
Lipstick
联合利华进军互联网
description.content:
上周，快速消费品品牌联合利华在北京宣布与百度、搜虎两家网站达成战略合作伙伴，快消品企业通过生产加工获得的利润增值逐步走低，而价值链两端的技术研发和市场营销成为赢得未来竞争的关键。
百度每天汇聚超过7亿次搜索请求，并通过“竞价排名”等广告形式进行流量变现。囿于有限的广告位资源和竞价排名模式对用户体验的负面影响，百度迫切需要拓展更为符合用户个性化需求的精准搜索服务。
此次与联合利华的战略合作是对百度“生活服务信息”发展方向的有力支撑，并可能与百度有啊等其他业务线形成协同。
以此次合作发端的垂直搜索将成为百度二次发展的重要举措。 文/一凡

description.hltext_display: Round Up: The Best of the Worst Surveys of 2010
description.content:
0 comments | 70 reads
Posted by SYNDICATED BLOG on Dec 21, 2010
Share:
Since we launched Confirmit Stream, we’ve told a number of tales of surveys we’ve received that have either haven’t been followed up, which have sullied an otherwise good customer experience, or that were simply a bit, well, rubbish.
As we’re heading into that end-of-year-review kind of time, I thought it was an opportune moment to revisit some of these posts and allow ourselves to make an early resolution for 2011 that we’ll all try to create fabulous customer surveys in the next year.
If you missed any of the posts below, enjoy them. And feel free to share similar tales of woe (or comedy) of your own.
• Ooh! Say Something Nice about me!
• Customer Experience: The Clue is in the Title
• Comparing Apples to Bananas (Skins)
• Are you really going to do anything with that satisfaction survey?
• You can ask twice for my feedback!
• “We hope you had a good customer experience, now let us spoil it with a survey…”
Blog post currently doesn't have any comments.
Republished with author's permission from original post .

description.hltext_display: Basketball: Bowling Green notches close win over Springfield
description.content:
Maumee, Lake victorious
BOWLING GREEN 72, SPRINGFIELD 68
BOWLING GREEN -- The Bobcats prevailed over the Blue Devils in a high-scoring contest.
Chauncey Orr had 32 points for Bowling Green (5-0) to go with five assists. Vitto Brown had 15 points, six rebounds, and four blocks while Xavier Brown had 14 points and seven assists.
Springfield's LeRoy Alexander led all scorers with 34 points while Jeremy Weemes had 13 points for the Blue Devils (2-3).
MAUMEE 58, ANTHONY WAYNE 52
Shawn Flanagan helped Maumee hold off Anthony Wayne's fourth quarter rally to notch a win. Flanagan poured in 25 points for the Panthers (5-1).
Mark Donnal had 15 points for the Generals while Jake Conklin had 14.
LAKE 91, NORTHWOOD 73
Ra'Shad Smith notched 34 points as the Flyers offense clicked on all cylinders. Kurt McKee had 17 points and Josh Tantari 11 for Lake (3-2).
Zach Wielinski had 22 points and 16 rebounds for Northwood (1-5) while David Green had 20 points and John Romstadt 13.
CARDINAL STRITCH 42, DANBURY 39
London Ritzler, Connor Kelsey (10 rebounds), and Justin Staler each scored nine points for Cardinal Stritch.
Danbury was led by Hunter Stephens' 10 points.
MAUMEE VALLEY 56, EMMANUEL CHRISTIAN 39
Ryan Creech of Emmanuel Christian(2-2) led all scorers with 17 points. Teammate Tony Beehan added 15.
Ricky Deichert led Maumee Valley (4-1) with 15 points, Julius Turner scored 13, and David Brown had 11 in the well-balanced attack.
OTTAWA HILLS 58, TOLEDO CHRISTIAN 47
Andrew Jamieson scored 18 points, and J.J. Buckey and Lucas Janowicz chipped in with 11 and 10, respectively, to lead Ottawa Hills on the road.
For Toledo Christian, David Westmeyer scored 19 points, and Josh Whitlow added 11.
SOUTHVIEW 61, ROSSFORD 46
Southview's Cougars took a 23-7 lead at the end of the first quarter at Rossford. Four of the Cougars (2-3, 22 NLL) were in double figures. Brandon Sinram, Allen Gant, and De'Nard Pinckney each had 11 points; David Renner added 10.
Josy Perry led Rossford (2-4, 1-3) with 16 points and Drew Brock scored 11.
ELMWOOD 66, NEW RIEGEL 53
NEW RIEGEL -- Elmwood's TJ Waldock scored 21 points, and Jay Hannah knocked down six 3-pointers, finishing with 18 points.
Jake Waldock added 10 points and five assists for the Royals (4-1).
SWANTON 55, GIBSONBURG 47
SWANTON -- Swanton took a 55-48 lead after three quarters to hand Gibsonburg (3-1) its first loss of the season. Travis Hilton scored 15 points and Paul Kennedy and Shane Bloom each had 12 for Swanton (2-3).
Logan Jones with 12 and Gage Beaber had 11 to lead Gibsonburg at the Holiday Classic.
Girls
BOWLING GREEN 42, FREMONT ROSS 29
FREMONT -- Hayley Williford scored 17 points to lead Bowling Green to victory. The Bobcats got to a quick start, taking a 21-12 lead at halftime.
Abbi Hasselbach led Fremont with eight points.
GENOA 55, CARDINAL STRITCH 35
GENOA -- Jessica Feller scored 16 points and Brandi Schimming added 14 to lead the Comets.
Kady Schneider led the Cardinals with 13.
ANTHONY WAYNE 65, ROGERS 58
Emma Ricketts scored 25 points and teammate Jasmine Bonivel added 13 as Anthony Wayne (4-2) won.
Scoring in double digits for Rogers (4-2) were Jasmyne Smith (18), Sasha Dailey (16), and Cha'ron Sweeney (12).
NAPOLEON 58, LIBERTY CENTER 28
NAPOLEON -- McKenzie Myles led all scorers with 21 points as her Wildcats won at home. Napoleon took a 15-8 first-quarter lead and was neverthreatened. The Wildcats made 6 of 7 free throw attempts.
Tiffany McClain led Liberty Center with 7 points.
NOTRE DAME 69, MARION HARDING 29
Ashley Kynard and Cat Wells each scored 12 points to lead Notre Dame (6-0) to a win in Start's holiday classic.
Drenae Hairston led Marion Harding (3-4) with 13 points.

description.hltext_display: Twitter收购Fluther原因：社交问答大有可为
description.author: DoNews
description.content:
Twitter此前收购了Fluther，但Twitter并没有购买Fluther的产品或股份，而是接收了Fluther� �心团队的4名开发人员和1名设计师。Twitter将通过支付赔偿金的形式补偿Fluther的股东。
芬克尔表示，目前仍不方便透露交易的具体细节，现在他也不清楚在Twitter中将担任什么职务，一切都为时过早。虽然芬克尔仍不清楚自己的新职务，但Twitter收购Fluther肯定是要利用其在社交问答领域的专业才能，此举表明Twitter想管理好自身网站上的问答机制，与另一家社交问答网站Quora展开竞争。
芬克尔称，目前Fluther每月有100万的独立访客，并且这个数字还在继续增长，这足以说明社交问答网站目前的火爆程度。芬克尔强调，火爆的原� 在于问答网站是一种全新形式的信息搜索机制，� 统搜索领域已经非常成熟，人们希望与别人交流，问答网站可以把互不相识的人连接在一起。它的特点在于参与的人越多，给出的问题就越可能被回答，并且人们认同某个答案并不取决于是否认识某人，而取决于答案本身是否权威。社交问答领域仍然是广阔的，未经开垦的领域。
把互不相识的人连接在一起，这正是Twitter一直追求的目� �，它已经为此在多个方面做出尝试，收购问答网站是符合逻辑的一步。目前的问题是，Twitter在推出自己的问答服务产品之前，人们要等待多久。（柯山）

搜狗公告：暂时不要用360升级搜狗输入法
description.content:
【TechWeb消息】12月22日消息，搜狗公司今日发布公告，称大量搜狗拼音输入法的用户向搜狗公司反馈，在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法最新版本之后，出现无法正常使用的情况。并建议在问题解决前请广大用户暂时不要使用360软件管家升级搜狗拼音输入法。
搜狗公告称，用户在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法5.1.1.4954版本后，普遍出现“只能输入英文字符，无法输入中文”的故障。
搜狐公司表示，“本着用户至上的原则，我们正积极与360方面进行沟通解决。在此之前，敬请广大用户暂时不要使用360软件管家升级搜狗拼音输入法。”
据介绍，对于已经通过360软件管家升级安装并出现上述故障的用户，首先请将系统默认输入法设为“美式键盘”或其他输入法后重启电脑，然后从搜狗拼音输入法官网首页下载最新版本安装包(http://pinyin.sogou.com )，重新进行安装，即可解决问题。(可心)
关于“搜狗拼音输入法”在360软件管家出现升级安装问题的公告
近日，大量搜狗拼音输入法的用户向我们反馈，在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法最新版本之后，出现无法正常使用的情况。为保障用户利益、确保搜狗输入法良好的使用体验，搜狗特做如下紧急公告：
2、对于已经通过360软件管家升级安装并出现上述故障的用户，首先请将系统默认输入法设为“美式键盘”或其他输入
法后重启电脑，然后从搜狗拼音输入法官网首页下载最新版本安装包(http://pinyin.sogou.com )，重新进行安装，即可解决问题。
3、根据我们调查了解，除360软件管家提供的升级版本外，通过其他软件下载渠道下载、升级的搜狗拼音输入法相应版本，均未发现上述问题，请广大搜狗用户放心升级使用。
搜狗公司

description.author: DoNews
description.content:
腾讯科技讯（乐天）12月22日消息，据盛大网络最新发布的第三季度《员工发展报告》披露，在8月20日盛大游戏举办的第十届产品经理/总监招� �会上，共有35名来自巨人以及海外同行业的、拥有丰富运营经验的候选人参� 了招� �会，最终签约6人。盛大游戏产品经理/总监招� �作为“20计划”的重要载体之一，至今已举办十届。它在为优秀游戏运营人才提供挑战梦想、自我飞跃机会的同时，还分享给游戏运营团队最高达20%的分成。产品经理/总监招� �活动自举办以来，已为包括《龙之谷》在内的多款游戏大作吸引了� 十位精英人才。报告同时还披露，第11届产品经理/总监招� �于12月20日举行。盛大游戏正在为包括《� 奇3》等在内的游戏招募产品经理和运营团队成员。
据悉，盛大网络是互联网行业首个发布《员工发展报告》的企业，从2010年第二季度发布以来已获得良好的社会反响，该报告每个季度定期对外发布。
这份《员工发展报告》详细总结盛大每个阶段人才发展情况，从吸引人才、培育人才、留住人才、人尽其才等方面揭示盛大对企业软性环境的塑� ，为外界全方位了解盛大的人才战略和人才培养提供了一个直观的窗口。

description.hltext_display: Ancora neve, ma per Natale il sole (5 foto)
Buckeyes throttle UNC Asheville, 96-49
description.content:
Lighty leads Ohio State with 29 points, Buford chips in with 14
COLUMBUS -- David Lighty scored 13 of No. 2 Ohio State's first 16 points and sat out most of the second half while finishing with 29 points to lead the Buckeyes past UNC Asheville 96-49 Tuesday night.
Lighty, who came in averaging 11.6 points, had 23 at halftime. He left with 10:23 left -- one shy of his career high -- and did not return.
William Buford added 14 points, Deshaun Thomas 13, and Jared Sullinger added nine points and 16 rebounds for the Buckeyes (11-0).
J.D. Primm had 15 points, D.J. Cunningham 13, and Chris Stephenson 11 for the Bulldogs (5-6).
Lighty hadn't hit double figures in his past four games but had that covered in the opening 2:45.
He almost outscored the Bulldogs in the opening half by himself. He hit 9 of 12 shots from the field including 5 of 7 3-pointers as the Buckeyes led 48-24.
Down 26 points in the opening half, the Bulldogs scored 10 of the first 12 points in the second half to pull to 50-34, but then Lighty made a 3 and the Buckeyes were off and running again.
Asheville fell to 0-12 against Big Ten teams. The Bulldogs have played eight of their 11 games on the road, including an 80-69 loss at No. 24 North Carolina on Nov. 23 and an 87-72 defeat at No. 16 Georgetown on Nov. 27.
The 23-year-old Lighty is the Buckeyes' elder statesman. He came in with the "Thad Five" in the fall of 2006, a recruiting class that included three players (Greg Oden, Mike Conley, Jr., and Daequan Cook) who would be taken in the first round of the NBA draft after their freshman season.
He missed most of the 2008-9 season with a broken bone in his foot, had his finest season a year ago, and then re-broke a bone in the same foot this past spring, requiring more rehab.
The fifth-year senior from Cleveland was making his 99th start.

JBL推首款支持AirPlay音响 将登陆CES
description.content:
泡泡网iPhone频道12月22日 美国音响老牌大厂JBL是第一批宣布将支持苹果的AirPlay技术的公司，所以一点也不惊讶的是他们的首款具备AirPlay播放功能的音响如此之快就现身FCC（美国联邦通信委员会）。
根据资料显示此款AirPlay音响将在2011的CES展会上出现，加上了空中无线播放显然给JBL系列音响带来更棒的音乐体验。它延续JBL惯用swoopy-loop的环形风格设计，但是加上了一个显眼的彩色LCD液晶屏，它可以在音乐播放的时候显示专辑音乐的名称。这样的液晶屏设计还有一个好处是，WiFi远程控制的时候更为的直观与方便，不过它的具体价格以及出货时间我们还是要等到CES展会上才知道了。■
（信息来源于苹果中文资讯博客，经授权予以编译发布）

description.hltext_display: OpenView Partners Releases Research Report on Thought Leadership in Expansion Stage Companies
Who represents Starbucks – or all companies?
description.content:
0 comments | 150 reads
After my complaints last week about a Starbucks manager refusing to exchange a defective CD, I received 3 phone calls from different customer service folks at Starbucks (one of them was the ‘entertainment’ manager, and I’m not sure what that means) apologizing and offering to send me a replacement CD. All proclaimed that the manager who wouldn’t exchange the CD was not operating from Starbucks policy (although I never quite learned what that was, so I’m not certain if indeed it wouldn’t happen again to someone else).
So, thank you for making it right, Starbucks.
But here is the bigger story: every person in every company IS the company. So that manager, that one woman working in one tiny Starbucks in an out-of-the-way town outside of Austin, has created an international stir (i.e. my post), with the possibility of giving her company a bad name .
Obviously, they need to be doing better employee training. How can they make sure that their employees are on the same page? How can they be certain that each employee in the franchise chain - every single solitary employee – IS STARBUCKS. What do they need to be doing differently?
And what can we all take away from this? How many of us forget that we each represent our company brand – that the web has a very long reach, and there is nowhere to hide anymore?
As we enter a new decade, never forget to serve your employees as your first clients. And make sure they know how to serve your audience. Because without serving each of us and each of them, we have nothing.
Republished with author's permission from original post by info@sharondrewmorgen.com (Sharon Drew Morgen) .

description.hltext_display: Federer e Nadal, insieme 2.5 milioni di ... (10 foto)
ロシアの株式市場 小幅高での揉み合い
Commonwealth help sought over bypass dispute
description.content:
It has been revealed the Commonwealth is seeking an independent review of the Tasmanian Government's approval of the Brighton Bypass.
The State Government last week approved construction of a bridge over the Jordan River Levee site, which contains ancient aboriginal artefacts.
Tasmanian Aborigines have today called for a Commission of Inquiry into the process.
It has also been revealed the Federal Government is engaging an independent company to review the state government's decision to approve construction of a bridge over the bypass site.
Australian Greens Leader Bob Brown says he has been told by the Commonwealth they will review the process and costings involved in the approval.
"Government's are now challenged with making a good decision out of a bad planning process," he said.
A meeting of about 100 Aborigines at the bypass site voted to seek support for an immediate ban on all Aboriginal heritage surveys.
They plan to write to heritage officers and archaeologists working in Tasmania, requesting they walk off the job.
The Tasmanian Aboriginal Centre's Michael Mansell says the ban would cripple a number of projects across the state.
"The effect of that ban will be to put on hold all projects in Tasmania that have not already had an Aboriginal survey," he said.
"So it could effect Kingston, it could effect the Bagdad bypass, it will certainly effect the gas pipeline behind Westbury and a range of other projects."
The State Government has been contacted for comment.

description.hltext_display: 2010网络成揭贪利剑：网络揭贪背后的民意力量
description.content:
资料图片：经网络曝光的“局长桃色日记门”主角——广西烟草专卖局销售管理处处长韩峰，因涉嫌受贿犯罪，9月2日在广西南宁市中级法院接受审判。9月2日下午5时许庭审结束，并未当庭宣判。图为当日韩峰被法警押送至法庭。中新社发卢林峰摄
新华网南宁12月21日电（记者张周来 吴小康）由虚拟的网络到活生生的现实，由网民围观到进入调查机关视野……似乎每一起网络揭贪事件都遵循着这样一条轨迹。无论结果是确有其事，还是无中生有，2010年的网络揭贪事件再次证明：网络监督的力量正在放大。有专家指出，网络巨大的能量既为揭贪提供了新的出口，但其“双刃剑”效应也日渐显现，监督权和隐私权之间如何做到平衡正成为一道考量人们的课题。
今年年初，“广西这个局长日记啥都写”的帖子出现在天涯社区。这份帖子以第一人称、日记体的形式记录了广西烟草系统一名干部疑似受贿、发生不正当男女关系的情况。
帖子一经发布，就受到不少网民关注。一些网民除跟帖关注此事外，不少网民还对这份帖子内容的真实性进行比对核实。网络上形成的舆论漩涡很快在现实中得到回应。2月22日，广西壮族自治区烟草专卖局党组决定由纪检监察部门介入调查此事。
后经调查，这名广西烟草系统干部利用职务之便，在发包办公大楼、办公网络建设等工程中，多次收受承建商贿赂款以及商品房等物品，经由检察院立案侦查，这名干部于3月13日被批捕。并于近日被法院以受贿罪判处有期徒刑。
今年9月，一封针对广东省茂名市副市长的举报信疯传网络。发帖者自称是一名北京女记者，受这名副市长欺骗达7年之久，在发布的帖子中，她将这名副市长称为“大骗子、流氓、大贪污犯”。随后，广东省纪委证实，这名副市长因涉嫌严重违纪问题接受组织审查。

Cólera ha matado 2,591 haitianos
description.content:
Las autoridades sanitarias de Haití informaron anteayer que 2 mil 591 personas han fallecido, a causa de la epidemia de cólera que afecta el empobrecido país caribeño desde mediados de Octubre.
Un total de 121 mil 518 individuos han resultado afectadas por el brote, de las cuales 63 mil 711 tuvieron que ser hospitalizadas, aunque de ellas 61 mil 917 ya han recibido el alta médica, según el último boletín del Ministerio de Salud Pública y Población (MSPP), fechado el 17 de Diciembre.
La epidemia ha abarcado a los diez departamentos de la nación haitiana, pero el más afectado es Artibonite, en el Noroeste, donde han fallecido más de 800 personas a causa de la enfermedad.
El cólera, que ha afectado a 62 habitantes en la vecina República Dominicana, apareció por primera vez en Octubre en la ciudad haitiana de Mirebalais (centro).
Un estudio médico francés asegura que surgió por el vertido de heces fecales a un río desde un campamento de soldados nepalíes miembros de la Misión de las Naciones Unidas para la Estabilización de Haití (Minustah).
El secretario general de la ONU, Ban Ki-moon, confirmó la semana pasada que próximamente nombrará un grupo de expertos científicos para investigar el origen de esta epidemia.

description.hltext_display: ОП� ОВЕ� ЖЕНИЕ ВЪВ В� ЪЗКА С ПУБЛИКАЦИИ В МЕДИИТЕ ОТНОСНО СП� ЕНИ С� ЕДСТВА ОТ ЕВ� ОПЕЙСКАТА КОМИСИЯ
description.content: ОПРОВЕРЖЕНИЕ ВЪВ ВРЪЗКА С ПУБЛИКАЦИИ В МЕДИИТЕ ОТНОСНО СПРЕНИ СРЕДСТВА ОТ ЕВРОПЕЙСКАТА КОМИСИЯ 21 декември 2010 г. Във връзка с публикации в електронните медиите относно спрени средства от Европейската комисия за България по програма „Учене през целия живот", включваща подпрограмите Еразъм, Коменски, Леонардо да Винчи и Грундвиг, Министерство на образованието, младежта и науката предоставя следната информация: Средствата по програма „Учене през целия живот" за 2010 г. бяха спрени в началото на годината поради пропуски в управлението на програмата през 2007 и 2008 г., констатирани от страна на Европейската комисия при разглеждане на Декларацията за увереност за 2009 г. След провеждане на серия от срещи между представители на ЕК и министерството, както и три мониторингови проверки, на 27 април 2010 г. беше подписано споразумението между ЕК и Националната агенция по прилагането на програмата Центъра за развитие на човешките ресурси /ЦРЧР/ към МОМН за отпускането на 13 025 000 евро. На 30 септември 2010 г., с оглед на доброто представяне, Европейската комисия предложи допълнителни 1 484 000 евро към предварително договорените през април. Постигната беше договореност средствата за бъдат преведени на три транша. В изпълнение на тази договореност на 3 юни 2010 г. ЕК преведе първия транш от 2 605 000 евро по Програма „Учене през целия живот". На 15 декември 2010 г. се получи потвърждение от ЕК за превеждането на втория транш от 6 512 500 евро. Останалите 5 391 500 евро ще бъдат преведени веднага след изплащане към бенефициентите на поне 70 % от първите два получени транша. Освен тези средства, ЕК преведе на българската национална агенция ЦРЧР и средствата за оперативни разходи в размер на 700 000 евро, изплатени на четири равни части от по 175 000 евро съответно през месеците май, юни, септември и декември. По този начин Европейската комисия потвърди оценката си за работата на МОМН и ЦРЧР при отстраняването на слабостите и пропуските в администрирането на програмата, допускани в предходните години.

description.hltext_display: For teacher and student, four hands are better than two
description.author: Nancy Gier
description.content:
Longtime Wheaton piano professor and former student team up to form concert duo
Pianists Brian Lee, left, and his former teacher William Phemister, right are practicing for an upcoming performance. (Beth Rooney/ for the Tribune)
X
Text Size
ct-x-w-wheaton-piano-duo-20101222
When Brian Lee entered Wheaton College in 1991, he planned on earning a degree in music education.
But his professor, William Phemister, quickly persuaded him to concentrate on piano performance.
"Music education can be a safety net because it can lead to a job," said Phemister, now professor emeritus at the Wheaton College Conservatory of Music. "But with all the requirements, there isn't a lot of time to perform. I convinced Brian to walk the plank because he had what it takes. In every two or three entering classes there is one student who stands out, and that student was Brian."
Now the former teacher and student have formed the Chicago Piano Duo. They performed their inaugural concert of Schubert and Brahms Oct. 29 in front of an enthusiastic audience at Wheaton College, the campus where they met and formed a bond that has endured for nearly two decades.
Their paths have been both similar and divergent, and each has impressive credentials. After graduating from Wheaton College in 1995, Lee, 37, who grew up in the Toronto area, studied at the New England Conservatory in Boston, the Royal Conservatory of Music in Toronto and the Juilliard School in New York City, where he earned a doctor of musical arts degree. He has performed at an array of venues across the U.S., including the Aspen Music Festival.
Phemister, 69, began teaching piano at Wheaton College in 1972 and retired, or at least slowed down, in 2007. He is a graduate of the Juilliard School, the Ecole Normale de Musique in Paris and the Peabody Conservatory in Baltimore, where he received his doctor of musical arts degree. He has performed throughout the U.S. and on nearly every continent. He remains an adjunct professor at Wheaton College and works with four or five outstanding students in his home studio in Wheaton.
"I didn't want to quit cold turkey," he said.
Through it all, the two men not only kept in contact but maintained a friendship. Phemister and his wife, Mary Anne, hopped on flights to attend some of Lee's major concerts, and Phemister played at Lee's wedding. Lee calls Phemister "an amazing supporter."
After serving as a visiting professor at Northwestern College in Iowa for two years, Lee returned to the Chicago area in 2003 "to set down roots." He worked part-time at Wheaton College and the Moody Bible Institute. In 2004, he began working full-time at Moody, where he is associate professor and coordinator of piano studies. He and his wife and three sons live in Naperville. He is a church musician as a pianist and vocalist.
Phemister's retirement allowed him more time to perform, and the two men appeared on the same stage a few times. At first, neither had thoughts about playing together regularly. But in 2009, Phemister spent 30 days in the hospital after back surgery.
"The surgery knocked a hole in my performance plans," Phemister said. "But it was after the surgery that I realized what I wanted to do. I wanted to perform with Brian, either four-handed on one piano, or playing duets on two pianos."
"I told him it was amazing," Lee said, "because I was thinking the same thing. I said, 'Let's jam together once a week.'"
"Forming the duo was a part of my recovery therapy," Phemister said. "Now my back is strong and my playing is better than ever. It was a renaissance."
As for the number of pianos, sometimes they play together on one, and other times they each play on separate pianos.
Rehearsals began after some discussion and lot of thought. Could the two truly come together as a performing ensemble when there were apparent differences, including some cultural considerations?
Lee was 3 years old when his parents immigrated to the Toronto area from South Korea.
"It's part of the Asian culture for students to have great respect for their teachers," Lee said. "But Bill told me, 'I don't want to go into this as your teacher. We're equals.'"
"I wanted him to be free to disagree with me," Phemister said in reflecting on the relationship. "On paper we're very different. I'm from Southern California, basically European ancestry. Brian came from South Korea and grew up in Canada. We're from different generations. But we have shared musical values and shared spiritual values. We're intuitive. We think and feel musically in the same way. And we both agree it's fun."
Lee and Phemister are putting the finishing touches on a CD and their plans for 2011 include performing as part of the WFMT-FM radio concert series and at the Cultural Arts Center in Chicago.
Phemister is already looking for works that can be performed by six hands in order to integrate Lee's oldest son, Jason, age 8, into the ensemble.
"He'll steal the show," Phemister predicted.
For information, visit http://www.chicagopianoduo.com or follow them on

百度2010年度网络沸点颁奖晚会1月7日举行
description.content:
【TechWeb报道】12月22日消息，由百度与江苏卫视联手打造的“百度2010年度网络沸点”颁奖晚会将于2011年1月7日在北京正式拉开帷幕。活动由江苏卫视著名主持人孟非和蔡康永担任主持，共有来自政府、学界、媒体和互联网行业超过800名领袖及精英出席。
活动组织者透露，本次“百度2010年度网络沸点”打破一般年度盘点的评选惯例，不设专家评委，没有参选案例征集，不进行线上投票。完全依据网民的百度搜索结果为事件影响力的基准评判依据，并基于江苏卫视的媒体公信力、影响力和洞察力进行评选，最终评出年度十大文化作品、十大世说新语、十大网络行为、十大民生话题、十大热点事件、十大网络公益六大类榜单内容。
作为2010年中国社会缩影的最珍贵“网络胶片”，晚会现场将云集社会各界名人、明星及网络红人。不仅会有蔡康永和孟非两位风格迥异的明星主持同台调侃2010年的大事小情，姚晨、杨澜等更多神秘嘉宾会亲临现场，并为年度微博达人、年度亲善大使、年度公益人物等奖项进行颁奖。
据悉，在已经上线的专题页面“百度2010网络沸点”(hot.baidu.com)上发起的榜单竞猜和投票等活动，已经迅速吸引了众多网民的关注和参与。

description.hltext_display: Università/ Rete studenti: oggi in piazza per bloccare ddl
description.content: Roma, 22 dic. (Apcom)- "Oggi saremo in piazza a Roma e in molte città d'Italia ancora una volta contro il ddl università, contro i tagli a tutto il mondo della conoscenza della formazione e della ricerca". E' quanto afferma in un comunicato la Rete degli studenti che oggi aderisce alle proteste contro la riforma dell'uiniversità. "Siamo esasperati da un governo che continua a giocare con le nostre vite, tagliando il presente e il futuro, distruggendo scuola, università e ricerca e condannandoci ad un futuro precario", continua il comunicato. Oggi sono annunciate "forme di protesta creative e non violente: cortei, manifestazioni, flash mob, lezioni in piazza, occupazioni di stazioni e monumenti". La rete degli stidenti poi annuncia: "Anche se il ddl dovesse passare, infatti, noi continueremo a mobilitarci, anche dopo il periodo natalizio"."Protesta creativa e non violenta"

description.hltext_display: 1.5 million phones over a 6 week time period
description.content:
REDMOND, Wash. – Dec. 21, 2010 – There is one phrase that Achim Berg uses repeatedly to describe the new Windows Phone 7.
“It’s a different kind of phone, fast and easy,” says Berg, vice president of business and marketing for Windows Phones. It’s a sentence he relates with enthusiasm daily, whether he’s giving a Windows Phone 7 demonstration to a large crowd, or showing off his phone to someone he’s just met.
Achim Berg, corporate vice president, Mobile Communications Business and Marketing Group.
Berg arrived in his role this past summer and has spent time getting to know the team, his partners and the opportunities Microsoft has to re-establish itself in mobile. He made the move just as Microsoft was rolling out Windows Phone 7, which launched in Europe and the Asia Pacific region on October 21 and in the United States and Canada on November 8.
Prior to coming to Redmond, Berg was general manager of Microsoft Germany and area vice president of Microsoft International. Before working at Microsoft, he was a member on the board of directors of Deutsche Telekom T-Com, Europe's largest telecommunications company, where he was responsible for marketing and sales of the company's fixed line business.
The Microsoft News Center recently spoke with Berg on how Windows Phone 7 is doing in its first two months since launching worldwide.
News Center: You’ve just launched Windows Phone, how is it going?
Berg: We believe that to succeed in mobile you need, first of all, a great product, and we think we have that. What we’re hearing from our customers is that they’re thinking the same way. Additionally, early customer survey data on the overall software experience is very positive and the willingness to recommend our phone is very high. That’s really good for us.
What we see as well is that people like the new design and the different approach that we’ve taken. On the developer side, our tools are really good and leverage the skills they already have. Developers are validating that the tools make it easy to make great apps and games quickly – we have more than 4,000 apps in our marketplace. With more pouring in daily, this is an enviable pace for any new platform.
And just as we did something different with the phone, we did similarly with advertising. Our campaign, with the “Really?” ads, is completely different advertising, and it’s very gratifying to see the positive response we’ve received. Our campaign has been well-accepted and shows that our product has been correctly targeted.
News Center: Windows Phone 7 has been in market for almost two months now worldwide, how are sales going?
Berg: Sales are ramping well as our reputation is growing for offering users a unique experience and are in line with our expectations – especially when compared to other new platform introductions. With a new platform you have to look at a couple of things, first of all customer satisfaction. As I mentioned before, we’ve seen great response on the complete mobile phone experience.
Another is phone manufacturer sales – phones being bought and stocked by mobile operators and retailers on their way to customers. We are pleased that phone manufacturers sold over 1.5 million phones in the first six weeks, which helps build customer momentum and retail presence.
We know we have tough competition, and this is a completely new product. We’re in the race – it’s not a sprint but we are certainly gaining momentum and we’re in it for the long run.
News Center: Do these sales figures meet your expectations?
Berg: Yes, and I think our expectations are realistic for a new platform. We started fresh with Windows Phone 7, and it’s a different kind of phone. Measuring for success is more long term than short term. We launched with many of the top mobile operators in the world, and even more in the coming year in 2011. We have 18,000 developers who are developing for our marketplace. It’s just getting better and better.
News Center: How does this stack up against the competition?
Berg: It’s a bit of apples and oranges comparison; our numbers are similar to the performance of other first generation mobile platforms. We introduced a new platform with Windows Phone 7, and when you do that it takes time to educate partners and consumers on what you’re delivering, and drive awareness and interest in your new offering. We’re comfortable with where we are, and we are here for the long run; Windows Phone 7 is just the beginning. Our opportunity is to make sure people get to play with a Windows Phone. Once they do, they love it. This is very important for us.
News Center: The smartphone industry is so competitive, how will you catch up?
Berg: We all know that the competition is extreme in this industry, and we have to compete on multiple fronts. We have to deliver a great product that people want to use. We have a different point of view than just delivering apps, and we have received great customer feedback on our approach. We are working on updates that will take us to the next level. Plus, we have great support from the ecosystem including developers, operators and device manufacturers, which will add to momentum we are already seeing.
From this perspective, we’re in a good place. We are on a path to begin releasing the first of several updates in the next couple of months, and several more mobile operators around the world will introduce Windows Phone 7 on their network in 2011 and we will have a broader portfolio of devices from phone manufacturers at different price points delivering on our commitment of providing customers choice. We believe doing these things right will lead to continued success.

description.hltext_display: ロシアの株式市場 寄り付き乱高下し小幅高
360回应搜狗输入法冲突：技术Bug 昨天已解决
description.content:
【TechWeb报道】12月22日消息，今日搜狗发出《关于“搜狗拼音输入法”在360软件管家出现生机安装问题的公告》，称使用360软件的搜狗用户升级后无法正常使用。对此360官方回应称，有关使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法最新版本后，出现无法正常使用的情况，是一个BUG导致的，昨天(12月21日)已经修复，目前已恢复正常。
新闻回顾：
搜狗公告：请用户不要使用360升级搜狗输入法
【TechWeb消息】12月22日消息，搜狗公司今日发布公告，称大量搜狗拼音输入法的用户向搜狗公司反馈，在使用360软件管家升级安装搜狗拼音输入法最新版本之后，出现无法正常使用的情况。并建议在问题解决前请广大用户暂时不要使用360软件管家升级搜狗拼音输入法。

description.hltext_display: Omicidio/ Francavilla Fontana, 28enne ucciso in un agguato
description.content: Brindisi, 22 dic. (Apcom) - Agguato mortale questa mattina a Francavilla Fontana (Br). La vittima è un ventottenne con piccoli precedenti penali, Fabio Parisi. L'uomo è stato affrontato dai killer in via Regina Elena, pieno centro cittadino e freddato a colpi di pistola. Sul grave fatto di sangue indagano i Carabinieri. Quello di Parisi è il terzo omicidio messo a segno a Francavilla Fontana nel giro di tre mesi. Lo scorso 11 novembre sotto i colpi dei sicari finì per errore Francesco Ligorio, un diciottenne incensurato. A ottobre fu ucciso a colpi di pistola un imprenditore di 42 anni, Vincenzo Della Corte. E' il terzo omicidio in tre mesi nel comune brindisino

description.hltext_display: АКАДЕМИЦИ И ЧЛЕН-КО� ЕСПОНДЕНТИ НА С� ЕЩА С МИНИСТЪ� СЕ� ГЕЙ ИГНАТОВ ЗА УСПЕШНОТО � АЗВИТИЕ НА БАН
description.content:
АКАДЕМИЦИ И ЧЛЕН-КОРЕСПОНДЕНТИ НА СРЕЩА С МИНИСТЪР СЕРГЕЙ ИГНАТОВ ЗА УСПЕШНОТО РАЗВИТИЕ НА БАН
21 декември 2010 г.
На 10 януари, понеделник, от 10 часа министър Сергей Игнатов организира среща на действителните членове на Академията. На срещата, на която са поканени всички българи, носещи високите звания „ академик” и „член-кореспондент”, министър Игнатов ще представи Стратегията за наука и ще постави началото на дискусията по нейното приемане.
Академиците и член-кореспондентите ще коментират възможностите за успешното развитие на БАН, модернизацията на науката и иновациите в България. Ще се обсъдят възможностите след приемане на Закон за изменение и допълнение на Закона за БАН да се покани екип на Макс Планк, който да направи преглед на работата на научно-изследователските ни институти и да подготви препоръки.
На срещата са поканени вицепремиерът и министър на финансите г-н Симеон Дянков и председателят на Комисията по образованието, науката и въпросите на децата, младежта и спорта към Народното събрание г-н Огнян Стоичков.
С оглед улесняване на процесите по провеждане на първата среща молим многоуважаваните учени, които искат да вземат участие, но по някаква причина все още не сме влезли в контакт с тях, да се свържат с нас на мобилен телефон 0895508826 или на електронен адрес academy@mon.bg .

description.hltext_display: La doppietta di Bourque non basta nella lotta per ...
Windows Phone 7 sells 1.5 mil ? or not
description.content:
Microsoft has been very forthcoming with its Kinect sales statistics, but not so much with its Windows Phone 7 units shipped numbers, until now. Apparently they?ve shipped , but these figures don?t reflect actual sales. We?ve covered the Windows Phone 7 build up and critical reception extensively. Basically, the new mobile OS is Microsoft?s last ditch effort to remain relevant in an increasingly important smartphone world dominated by Apple, Android and, to a lesser extent, BlackBerry and Nokia. Of course, what we?ve all been dying to know is whether MS have managed to successfully pull off this effort and just how well they?re doing. Now we know, well, sort of, at least.
In a very forward-looking press release yesterday, the vice president of Microsoft?s mobile division finally let loose some sales statistics and other interesting tidbits of info on the current status of WP7. Cutting to the most interesting part first, it seems that MS have sold 1.5 million handsets in the first 6 weeks of the mobile operating system?s existence ? though only to retailers and network providers, not actual customers, that is.
Yes, these figures are only actually for the amount of phones Microsoft has shipped off to retailers and don?t reflect the much more important figure, namely the amount purchased by customers. On this front Microsoft have been far more vague and subdued, with mobile vice president Berg only saying that sales have ?met expectations? and are in keeping with the performance of other new mobile platforms ? in other words, they haven?t been all that great.
Even though MS has been skirting around the issue of sales, it seems clear they have no intentions of pulling the plug on Windows Phone 7 anytime soon, like with the KIN phone disaster. From the latest press release, it?s evident the company is looking to the future with confidence, even though they admit they?re facing some very well entrenched and established competition.
Unlike the KIN, Windows Phone 7 is actually a good product. It?s OS interface is inventive, fluid and easy to use. Plus, the gaming offered by the Xbox Live integration is basically unmatched among mobile phones today, even counting the iPhone. So why the failure to catch on? Well, there are a few important reasons.
First off, although the Windows Phone 7 OS and interface are very original and perform well, they haven?t been paired with any truly remarkable handsets. Yes, the or LG Optimus 7 are good phones, but nothing too original or spectacular. To sell a phone you need both excellent software and hardware, the latter of which WP7 handsets lack for the most part. A could solve this dilemma, however.
The big buzzword nowadays when it comes to smartphones is apps, and, as a new OS, WP7 currently trails far far behind Apple and Android. Although they?re off to a great start with 4000 apps and counting on the WP7 marketplace, they still have a long ways to go in order to offer the same quality and variety available on more established platforms. With that said, MS does have a leg up in terms of games, thanks to its . Then of course there?s the factor that MS themselves appear to be alluding to most: the competition. With Android?s recent explosion this year, and iOS4?s continuing dominance, there just hasn?t been much room for Windows Phone 7 to establish itself, or learn from its mistakes. Instead, the launch version of WP7 has had to compete with both the highly polished iOS4 and latest Android 2.2 (now 2.3) editions ? a tough task. Although we don?t know for sure, from these latest figures and the attitude of mobile vice president Berg, it?s safe to say aren?t doing too spectacular, nor for that matter are they failing abysmally. With rumours that WP7 might be included on Nokia phones in the future, and more apps and OS improvements coming online, there?s still a very good chance for WP7 to firmly establish itself in the future as a real contender.

event_or_fact.property: aren?t doing too spectacular, nor for that matter are they failing abysmally

description.hltext_display: Ba'asyir Batal Kembali ke Rutan Bareskrim
description.content:
REPUBLIKA.CO.ID, JAKARTA--Pimpinan Pondok Pesantren Al Mukmin, Ngruki, ustad Abu Bakar Ba'asyir Rabu (22/12) batal kembali ke Rumah Tahanan Badan Reserse dan Kriminal Polri. Rencananya, Ba'asyir akan kembali ditahan ke Rumah Tahanan Badan Reserse dan Kriminal (Rutan Bareskrim), setelah menjalani operasi mata di Rumah Sakit (RS) Mata Aini.
"Ustad Ba'asyir tadi pagi sekitar pukul 08.00 WIB diperiksa oleh dokter Isfahani dan ditemukan jahitan operasi kemarin lepas dan retina mengempis," kata Kuasa Hukum Ba'asyir, Luthfie Hakim di Jakarta.
Selanjutnya, Isfahani melakukan pemberian oksigen kepada Ba'asyir dan direkomendasikan untuk tetap dirawat inap satu hari lagi, ujarnya. "Insya Allah besok Kamis (23/12) sudah bisa ke luar rumah sakit, jika kondisi sudah memungkinkan," kata Luthfie.
Ba'asyir saat ini kondisi fisiknya stabil, pasca menjalani operasi mata sebelah kirinya yang mengalami katarak dan dirawat di lantai tiga ruang 308 RS Mata Aini. Ba'asyir menjalani operasi mata yang dipimpin oleh dokter Isfahani mulai pukul 10.45 sampai 11.20 WIB di lantai empat pada hari Senin (20/12).
Setelah dikembalikan ke Mabes Polri kembali, ustad akan menjalani rawat jalan, dimana dokternya yang akan mengunjungi. Permohonan operasi untuk Ba'asyir karena adanya keluhan yang serius pada mata sebelah kiri.
Ba'asyir pada mata sebelah kirinya hanya bisa melihat cahaya saja, dan kondisi itu sebenarnya sudah dialami sejak enam bulan lalu. Selain itu, lutut kaki sebelah kirinya juga dikeluhkan sakit. Gangguan fisik yang dialami oleh Ba'asyir, disebabkan kurangnya cahaya di dalam Rutan Bareskrim tempat Ba'asyir ditahan.
