description.hltext_display: Studie: Migranten karriereorientierter als angenommen
description.content:
Migranten in Deutschland sind einer Studie der Bertelsmann-Stiftung zufolge besser integriert als gedacht. Sie seien beispielsweise deutlich karriereorientierter als gemein angenommen, berichtete die Frankfurter Rundschau“ unter Berufung auf die Untersuchung der Bertelsmann-Stiftung. Neun von zehn Befragten mit Migrationshintergrund wollen demnach beruflich weiterkommen. Bei den Befragten ohne Migrationshintergrund seien lediglich 45 Prozent so sehr auf ihre berufliche Entwicklung bedacht.
74 Prozent der Befragten mit ausländischen Wurzeln lehnen der Studie zufolge die Vorstellung von der Frau am Herd ab. Auch 70 Prozent der Bürger aus muslimisch geprägten Ländern stimmten diesem Frauenbild nicht zu. Sie sind damit nicht konservativer als die Deutschen. Laut Bertelsmann-Stiftung ist auch bei der Aufteilung der Arbeit im Haushalt die Emanzipation bei den Migranten weiter: 41 Prozent der Männer mit Migrationshintergrund sehen Putzen, Kochen und Kindererziehung als gemeinsame Aufgabe von Paaren an. Bei den Befragten ohne Migrationshintergrund betrachten das nur 35 Prozent der Männer so.AFP/jmMigranten sind laut einer Studie besser integriert als gedacht. Neun von zehn Befragten mit Migrationshintergrund wollen beruflich weiterkommen.

description.hltext_display: The 'Rolling Stone' gift guide (Yes, there's whiskey)
description.content:
This Gibson guitar honors Lennon's 70th birthday. (Courtesy photo) Rocking "your stockings off" seems to be the theme for this year's edition of the "Rolling Stone" gift guide.
The magazine is recommending everything you'd expect: guitars, whiskey -- something called The BoomCase. But there are also a few surprises.
One of its stand-out ideas: the . It's made from reused candy-bag wrappers.

description.hltext_display: Avatar, la película más 'pirateada' de 2010
description.author: Efe
description.content:
'Avatar', la película de , es también el filme más pirateado en 2010, con más de 16 millones de descargas, según la web especializada TorrentFreak.
La obra de James Cameron, que ha recaudado cerca de 2.800 millones de dólares en todo el mundo desde su estreno en EEUU el 18 de diciembre de 2009, registró 16,5 millones de descargas este año a través de la tecnología 'bit torrent', lo que supone un incremento del 33% respecto a la cinta más descargada de 2009, que fue 'Star Trek', con algo menos de 11 millones de descargas.
En la lista de este año, tras 'Avatar' se encuentran 'Kick-Ass', de Matthew Vaughn, con 11,4 millones de descargas; 'Inception', de Christopher Nolan, con cerca de 10 millones; 'Shutter Island', de Martin Scorsese, con casi 9,5 millones, y 'Iron Man 2', con 8,8 millones.
La lista de las 10 obras más descargadas la completan 'Clash of the Titans', de Louis Leterrier, con algo más de 8 millones de descargas; 'Green Zone', de Paul Greengrass, con 7,7 millones; 'Sherlock Holmes', de Guy Ritchie, con 7,1 millones; , de Kathryn Bigelow, con 6,8 millones, y 'Salt', de Phillip Noyce, con 6,7 millones.

description.hltext_display: Trends for Senior Officers and Sales Leaders
description.content:
0 comments | 205 reads
My position as thought leader in business development allows me to also play futurist. As I look into the good fortunes that lie ahead in 2011, there are a few trends that my clients, senior officers and sales leaders need to be aware.
Here are some ideas to be aware of in the New Year. As you read ahead see if you see your organization making some changes based on them.
1. Customer Experience – As organizations continue to take on the numerous competitors it becomes increasingly important to remain close to clients. With the influence of customer-to-customer relationships, organizations must involve clients in new product development. Customers manifesting their loyalty will provide competitive differentiation.
2. Customer Service – There is not enough service minded organizations. There is a large cultural shift from profitability to service orientation. However, doing so provides brand cache. Exemplars here include Apple, Zappos and numerous others. The focus on service enables each to increase brand loyalty.
3. Sales Talent – During the recession many organizations missed their sales goals. Albeit some sales groups missed targets due to volatile economic issues, however after 28 years in this business recessions help separate the professionals from the wannabes. Sales leaders will be forced to look at staff for their talent. In the past too many were hired for behavior and this leads to poor hiring.
4. Using Knowledge Networks – During the last ten years many organizations have heavily invested in CRM, customer relationship management. However, with the plethora of information stored not many have really reviewed the content and used the valuable embedded information. The New Year will require the need to turn the vast of amounts of data into useful knowledge to better serve customers.
5. Expertise – Organizations will begin to hire subject matter experts rather than well rounded business professionals. As the need for productivity increases organizations will require individuals with specific knowledge to get them back on track.
6. The need to listen – Social media has become very influential to brands and will continue to do so. Senior leaders will need to listen to some of the cacophony to determine what customers are really saying. Many organizations have begun to do so and more will follow.
7. Fact from Fiction – Leaders will require more stringent sales reporting. Good economic times led to some leniency. Moving into the New Year selling professionals need to better gauge pipelines and competitive losses.
Are you ready to accelerate into the New Year? At the beginning of the New Year we are ready to launch new services, new value and a new look. Please return soon.
What things do you see in your future in the New Year? Please share what you learned in the comments below.
Republished with author's permission from original post by drew@drewstevensconsulting.com (Drew J Stevens Ph.D.) .

description.hltext_display: White Christmas looking like a possibility
description.author: Kareem Elgazzar
description.content:
Snow totals for December continue to climb, with another 1 to 2 inches falling across the region late Monday night into Tuesday.
Already this month, more than 14 inches has been reported with more fresh snow looming for Christmas Day. Depending on the forecast models, one is saying that there will only be some snow showers, while another is saying there could be 2 to 4 inches on Christmas, said Scott Hickman, a meteorologist at the NWS in Wilmington. But its too early to tell what really is going to happen. Throughout the next few days leading up to Christmas Eve on Friday, weather conditions are expected to remain stable with mostly overcast skies and temperatures hovering around freezing, but for those hoping for a white Christmas, they might just get their wish.
There is a 50 percent chance of snow precipitation for Friday night and a 30 percent chance of snow Christmas Day. Two low-pressure systems are moving into the region beginning Friday and lasting through early Saturday, a surface low will move south of the Ohio Valley while an upper-level low will drop in from the Great Lakes, according to the National Weather Service in Wilmington. The big question is how much of the merging of these two systems will happen across the Ohio Valley, and thats still highly uncertain at this point, Hickman said. If the second forecast model holds true, and up to 4 inches do fall in the area, that would break the record for the snowiest Christmas on record. The record for snowfall on Christmas stands a 3.7 inches recorded in 1909.
The combination of the two will bring an increased chance for measurable snowfall in the area, according to the NWS.

description.hltext_display: Kirk to miss 'don't ask' repeal bill signing
description.content:
WASHINGTON — Mark Kirk, the new Republican senator from Illinois, has said thanks but no thanks to an invitation from the White House to attend a Wednesday ceremony where President Barack Obama will sign into law a historic repeal of the ban on gays and lesbians serving openly in the military.
Kirk, 51, of Highland Park, who entered the Senate on Nov. 29, was one of eight Republicans to vote Saturday in favor of repealing the ban. He is a commander in the Naval Reserve.
Kirk spokeswoman Kate Dickens said it was unfortunate that the lawmaker could not attend. "We couldn't change his schedule from some hiring and leasing discussions" for offices, said.

description.hltext_display: Officials Warn SoCal Residents About Hitman Email Scam
Man hit by train overcame hearing loss, will be buried in Browns jersey
description.author: Tiffany Y. Latta
description.content:
TRENTON People who know William E. Kingrey say its fitting he will be buried in a Cleveland Browns jersey.
Kingrey, 44, of Camden, who was fatally struck Monday morning by a CSX train in Trenton while walking to his job site, is to be buried on Christmas Eve in his Colt McCoy No. 12 jersey. That was his favorite player. He was excited when Texas Longhorn Colt McCoy became part of the Browns. He loved it, said Kingreys pastor, the Rev. Greg Jackson of the First Southern Baptist Church in Camden.
At around 9 a.m. Monday, Kingrey, an Asplundh Tree Expert Co. worker known as Willie to his friends and family, was carrying a chain saw, a tree trimming pole and climbing gear as he crossed the train trestle over Elk Creek near the East State Street crossing. He was nearly clear of the south end of the trestle when he was struck from behind by the train headed from Cumberland, Md., to Cincinnati. He got caught on the trestle and couldnt get off the trestle in time before he was struck, said Trenton police Chief Tim Traud.
Clint Nigg, Butler County Coroners investigator, said Kingrey, who was pronounced dead at the scene, was pushed nearly 70 feet before the train stopped. Results of an autopsy performed Tuesday morning indicate Kingrey died of multiple trauma, he said. Toxicology tests were negative.
Gary Sease, a spokesman for CSX, said the train consisted of two locomotives and 40 rail cars 18 loads of mixed freight and 22 empty containers. It was traveling an estimated 50 mph at the time of the accident, Traud said.
The Occupational Safety and Health Administrations investigation into the accident will focus primarily on Kingreys employer, said Bill Wilkerson, assistant area director at OSHAs Cincinnati office. The Asplundh Tree Expert Co. office in Richmond, Ind., declined to comment.
Kingrey will be remembered as a fun-loving husband, youngest brother of three and a friend to many, who didnt let congenital hearing loss in both ears limit him, said his sister Nancy McMurray.
McMurray said her brother was born premature and weighed just over 2 pounds. Because of his hearing loss, Kingrey attended two schools and was a graduate of both Meadowdale and Eaton high schools. Still, he was always happy, cuttin up, and if you wanted anything done, hed try to help you do it, McMurray, 58, of West Alexandria said.
Kingrey also was known as one of the founders of the Lake Lakengren Ski Club along with his late father, Cletus, and for his love of breakdancing and water skiing. He could ski barefooted. He could breakdance. He just had to move, McMurray said with a laugh.
McMurray said Kingrey didnt wear hearing aids but got along fine without them, though others said people had to speak loudly when talking to him, she said. Jackson, who wouldnt speculate on whether Kingreys hearing loss was a factor in the accident, said his death was a shock to everyone who knew him. Services on Friday will be especially tough because of the holidays, he said. For some things in life there just isnt an answer for. We just have to trust God. Some things we just dont understand, but what we do know is that there is hope beyond the grave, Jackson said.

description.hltext_display: Zhang says Bale to start in Nanjing film
description.content:
Zhang Yimou says Christian Bale will star in the Chinese filmmaker's latest project about 13 young prostitutes struggling to survive during the attack by Japanese soldiers on Nanjing in 1937.
Zhang said Wednesday that Bale, the star of the boxing drama "The Fighter," will play an American priest in Nanjing during the Japanese invasion.

description.hltext_display: Sir Paco Prator Releases His Gift of Healing This Christmas Season
description.author: Sir Paco Prator
description.content: --(PR.com)-- As technology is radically and rapidly changing, so is Sir Paco Prator and how he relates to his audience and meets their needs. But, Sir Paco Prator isnt about following trends or keeping up with them. He is about letting inspiration show him how to use the newest trends and technology to spread his work of wisdom and healing. After having a positive experience with some of the newer eBook readers and their built in social networking capabilities, Sir Paco Prator knew that the next step for Shyamas Book of Life and Healing, was to become a part of the eBook and eBook reader experience. He talks about his epiphany, I was messing around with one of the newer eBook readers in a store, not expecting to fall in love with it and then had an epiphany that this will be the future, especially when it comes to education and teaching. I saw ways of how book clubs and seminars can happen virtually through the built in social networking and multi-media features of the eBook reader. I got excited and wanted my book to be a part of that experience.On December 13, 2010, Sir Paco Prator released Shyamas Book of Life and Healing as an eBook experience, in time for Christmas, exclusively through Lulu.com. The release of the eBook around Christmas has a special meaning for Sir Paco Prator. He explains why, Shyamas Book of Life and Healing, as many readers will tell you, is a gift that emanates unconditional love, light and healing. The book is aligned with the universal aspect of Christ, which is all encompassing, no matter what religion you practice. I have great love and reverence for Christ as I do for all religious Masters. Many people will forget the real meaning of Christmas and Christ, as is evident in how Christmas is often referred to as Xmas. Our actions do not match our words. We celebrate Christmas, but little to no Christ is in our giving or actions. I thought about buying myself an eBook reader, but I knew better than to buy one because of Christmas. But, I know others will gift and receive eBook readers for Christmas and I wanted to offer them my gift that is significant of Christ and Christmas.Shyamas Book of Life and Healing is available as an eBook download for $5.99, exclusively at Lulu.com in the Adobe Digital Edition PDF format. The eBook is compatible with most open eBook readers such as, The Nook, Nook Color, Sony eBook readers and Kobo devices. You can also download free eBook reader apps for your PC/Mac like the Nook Study app (recommend) and Kobo app.Shyama's Book of Life and Healing (eBook):http://www.lulu.com/product/ebook/shyamas-book-of-life-and-healing/14301562###Following the current trends of technology and increased demand for eBooks and eBook readers, Sir Paco Prator repackages his book, Shyamas Book of Life and Healing into the eBook experience, just in time for Christmas. Not only does the eBook release meet the demand of devoted and prospective eBook and eBook readers, but the message of Shyamas Book of Life and Healing is apropos this Christmas season.

description.hltext_display: Jobless rates in Butler, Warren counties dip to lowest point all year
description.author: Chelsey Levingston
description.content:
Unemployment rates in Butler and Warren counties dipped last month to their lowest points all year.
The unemployment rate in Butler County was 9 percent in November, a decrease from 9.2 percent in October, according to Ohio Department of Job and Family Services.
In Warren County, the unemployment rate was 8.4 percent in November, a decrease from 8.5 percent in October.
Along with that, Ohios unemployment was 9.8 percent in November, the eighth straight month of declines, according to Job and Family Services. Pam Lubbers wasnt included in this jobless count, but she will be in the December count released in January. Thats because Lubbers, 44, was told she lost her job as an electrician Monday before work started. The next day, she was at Workforce One of Butler County in Fairfield for orientation, with the intent to get retraining in the medical field. I think its something thats more dependable, said Lubbers, who has worked six months out of the past 18 months.
Meanwhile, the unemployment rates in Middletown and Hamilton rose, according to state figures. Hamiltons rate last month was 10.5 percent, an increase from a flat rate of 10.4 percent in October and September. Middletown had an unemployment rate last month of 9.8 percent, up from a flat rate of 9.7 percent in October and September. While Hamilton has the highest unemployment of any city in Butler County, Fairfield has the lowest. Fairfields rate was 8.5 percent last month, down from 8.9 percent in October.
In Warren County, unemployment in Mason was a flat 7.6 percent last month.
The release of county level figures today from Job and Family Services is the last jobless report this year. Butler County started the year with an unemployment rate of 10.9 percent, which has since decreased almost 2 percentage points. Warren County went from 10.5 percent unemployment in January to lose 2.1 percentage points last month.

description.hltext_display: Суд Дубая изменил приговор фигурантам дела об убийстве Сулима Ямадаева
description.content:
Апелляционный суд Дубая заменил пожизненное заключение фигурантам дела об убийстве Героя России Сулима Ямадаева иранцу Махди Лорния и гражданину Таджикистана Максуджону Исматову на 27 месяцев лишения свободы, передает РИА "Новости". Суд назначил новый срок наказания - три года тюремного заключения по мусульманскому календарю, где год равен девяти месяцам, то есть общий срок - 27 месяцев. По словам адвоката Лорнии Абдулы аль-Мадани, осужденные уже провели в тюрьме около 21 месяца, и этот срок им будет засчитан.
Покушение на Сулима Ямадаева было совершено в Объединенных Арабских Эмиратах (ОАЭ) в конце марта 2009 года, в апреле 2010 года дубайский суд приговорил Лорнию и Исматова к пожизненному лишению свободы (в ОАЭ 25 лет). Прокуратура настаивала на высшей мере наказания - смертной казни.
Обоснование апелляционного суда не оглашалось, оно должно быть озвучено в течение 15 дней после вынесения решения.

description.hltext_display: Expert: Latest unemployment data shows 'slow recovery going on'
description.author: Chelsey Levingston
description.content:
The last unemployment data for the year indicates the economy is slowly recovering.
The unemployment rate in Butler County has declined 10 out of the past 11 months, from 10.9 percent in January to 9 percent last month, according to Ohio Department of Job and Family Services. Because Decembers numbers wont be released until next year, its the years last local economic indicator. I guess theres a slow recovery going on, which is the positive side of the story, said Stephen Lippmann, assistant professor of sociology for Miami University, who said unemployment rates are an indicator of the overall state of the economy.
On the other side, Lippmann said, are those who have quit looking for work, which means theyre not included in the unemployment figures. According to Census data, there seems to be a 50 percent increase in discouraged workers in the past year, he said. To the degree the declining unemployment rates are related to the economic recovery, he also said the rates could decline more in coming months.
Butler County saw an additional 6,800 people enter the work force since the beginning of the year for a total 173,700 employed people in November, according to Job and Family Services. Thats more than last years average work force of 173,600 employed people with an average unemployment of 9.4 percent. But its still not what it was four years ago in 2006, before the recession took hold, average unemployment was 5.6 percent.
Unemployment is perhaps the worst in Hamilton. Both Hamilton and Middletown started the year with unemployment of 12.5 percent, or more than 3,000 people each, according to the state. They ended the year with unemployment in Hamilton of 10.5 percent, or 3,200 people, and in Middletown 9.8 percent, or 2,500 people.
Fairfield seems to have the lowest unemployment of 8.5 percent in November, or 2,100 people, down from 10 percent in January.

description.hltext_display: 楽天トラベル、米国に Rakuten Travel USA Inc 設立（japan.internet.com）
description.content:
japan.internet.com12月22日(水)17時31分配信
楽天トラベルは、米国に現地法人「Rakuten Travel USA Inc」を設立し、2010年12月23日から営業を開始すると発表した。
Rakuten Travel USA Inc の設立により、これまで米国内で展開していたハワイ支店を Rakuten Travel USA Inc 傘下に移管するとともに、アメリカ大陸では初の拠点となるニューヨーク支店を新設し、米国旅行取扱高のさらなる拡大を図るとともに、日本人旅行客だけでなく、米国国内の旅行需要を取り込んでいく。
楽天トラベルは、2002年から海外拠点を設け、現在は中国(上海・北京・広州・大連)、韓国、台湾、香港、タイ（バンコク）、グアム、ハワイに進出し、アジアや太平洋のリゾート地を中心に業容の拡大を図ってきた。

description.hltext_display: El Congreso tumba la 'Ley Sinde'
description.author: Pablo Romero | Agencias
description.content:
Día de infarto en el Congreso de los Diputados a causa del debate a las enmiendas de la Ley de Economía Sostenible. Al final, con nueve horas de retraso y 'in extremis' entre el PSOE y sobre todo CiU, no se ha podido salvar la polémica parte de la LES cocida como 'Ley Sinde' que prevé el cierre de sitos web que faciliten las descargas no autorizadas.
Eran alrededor de las 22.30 horas, cuando se votaba por separado la disposición final segunda del texto de la Ley de Economía Sostenible, conocida como la 'Ley Sinde'. La inclusión de esta disposición fue rechazada al final por 20 votos -todos los grupos políticos de la oposición- frente a los 16 del PSOE. Hubo aplausos entre los diputados.
Anteriormente se habían rechazado las enmiendas 20 de Barkos, del Grupo Mixto, y 237 y 458, de ERC, IU y IPCV, que también pedían la supresión de la 'Ley Sinde.
A lo largo de la jornada de este martes, los socialistas trataron sin éxito de llegar a un acuerdo en el último momento con CiU, PNV e, incluso, con el PP para el salvamento de la ley.
Tampoco han respondido los grupos al llamamiento realizado por la ministra de Cultura, Ángeles González-Sinde, quien apeló al "buen criterio" de los diputados para que la ley antidescargas fuese aprobada.
Los argumentos esgrimidos por todos los grupos parlamentarios, salvo el PSOE, transitaron desde las dudas sobre la constitucionalidad del texto, en el caso de CC, PP y ERC-IU-ICV, hasta considerar la disposición "un chapuza propia de Pepe Gotera y Otilio", como aseguró el portavoz de ERC Joan Ridao, o "la ley de la patada al módem", como expresó la diputada de ICV Nuria Buenaventura.
Los nacionalistas catalanes de Convergència i Unió (CiU) iban a apoyar inicialmente la medida, concebida para luchar contra la piratería, pero el lunes y a cambio de su voto presentaron varias exigencias que el Ejecutivo no estuvo dispuesto a asumir.
Ahora el texto de la Ley de Economía sostenible sin la disposición final segunda irá al Senado, en donde se debatirá en el primer Pleno del año de la Cámara Alta, el próximo 18 de enero. No obstante, aún no se puede descartar que las medidas 'antipiratería' que han suscitado tanta polémica pueda volver al articulado de la LES en su paso por la Cámara Alta.
El debate parlamentario despertó gran controversia en el país. La apuesta del gobierno de Zapatero por la medida antidescargas, impulsada por la ministra de Cultura, Ángeles González-Sinde, desencadenó gran rechazo en España entre los internautas. Ante la inminente votación, las el pasado domingo para dejar patente su protesta.
Y el lunes, distintos foros de internautas llamaron a de los Diputados y de varios partidos, entre ellos el PSOE.
En el otro lado se situaron artistas como Alejandro Sanz y Miguel Bosé, que defendieron la necesidad de la medida. "Qué cobardes los políticos españoles, no van a votar la ley Sinde de protección a la propiedad intelectual", escribió este martes Sanz en su página de Twitter.
"Vaya mi apoyo total e incondicional a la 'Ley Sinde'. Ya era hora. Y mi vergüenza hacia los políticos que intentan canjear nuestros derechos contra otros beneficios que nos lesionan", manifestó por su parte Bosé en su perfil de Facebook.
Por su parte, más de 150 escritores, entre ellos Almudena Grandes, Rosa Montero, Juan José Millás, Ángeles Caso, Elvira Lindo, Fernando Savater y Enrique Vila Matas, han firmado un manifiesto en favor de los derechos de autor ante el "saqueo que se está produciendo desde hace años en los productos digitales".
El 'Manifiesto por el Copyright', al que ha tenido acceso Efe, señala que "internet debe ser un medio libre y neutral, pero eso no quiere decir que no deban existir reglas en su administración y que pueda conservar la impunidad quien las infringe".
Frente a las manifestaciones de apoyo a la 'Ley Sinde', internet ha experimentado una cascada de comentarios en redes sociales, blogs y foros en contra de la norma, hasta el punto de que se convirtió en "trending topic" del día en Twitter.
Más de 5.000 internautas se han sumado en las últimas 24 horas al manifiesto de Facua-Consumidores en Acción, cuyo manifiesto 'Si es legal, es legal' supera las 35.000 firmas que defienden que la ley está realizada "al dictado de la multinacionales que dominan la industria cultural y del Gobierno de EEUU".
Tras la votación, la Red ser convirtió en escenario de celebraciones por parte de los internautas frente a los creadores, consternados al no aprobarse la normativa contra la piratería.

description.hltext_display: Met 'faces toughest period yet'
description.content:
The Metropolitan Police is facing its most challenging period since Commissioner Sir Paul Stephenson took over, he has said.
Sir Paul, who was deputy commissioner five years ago and took the top post last year, said a combination of violent disorder on the streets, budget cuts, and the forthcoming Olympics were stretching his force.
And he acknowledged the student tuition fees protests were being driven by "a real passion about a cause".
Sir Paul, interviewed on BBC Radio 4's Today programme, was asked how far the protests, cuts, and other events, were stretching his force.
He replied: "When you put all the various challenges that face me and my colleagues in the Metropolitan Police service together, this is as challenging a period as we have ever faced."
He stressed he did not doubt the operational capability of the force. But he said: "I think the challenges we are facing, that stretch we are facing, is not as we have known for a long, long time.
"We can make significant economy savings, but how far we can stretch those savings is a real issue. I am concerned about our current budgetary situation."
On the student protests, Sir Paul said: "There's clearly a sense of anger out there that's led to a level of violence."
He said some protesters were determined to breach police lines and had come prepared, and added: "I think we have got a sense of a real passion about a cause out there. Within that, there are various levels of passion that lead to extremism."

中国天主教新领导集体获全国神长教友拥护
description.content:
中评社北京12月22日电／中国天主教第八次全国代表会议日前在北京召开。来自全国31个省区市的地方教会代表341人满怀喜悦齐聚一��，共商中国教会美好的未来。记者日前就本次大会的有关情况和取得的重要成果，专访了中国天主教爱国会、中国天主教主教团（“一会一团”）负责人房兴耀主教和马英林主教。
新华网报道，房兴耀主教和马英林主教表示，这次会议全面回顾了6年来全国天主教会在牧灵福�、圣召培育、神职进修、出版宣�、神学��究，以及�强爱国主义和独立自主自办教会教育，推进民主办教，力行仁爱，服务社会、见证信仰，促进和谐，开展对外交往等方面所做的大量而富有成效的工作，全国广大神长教友以自己的善言善行光荣了在天大父，得到了社会的赞誉和好评。会议总结了近年来中国教会服务社会取得的成功经验，并对今后五年的工作作出了部署，为中国天主教事业的健康发展指明了方向。
两位主教表示，此次会议审议并通过了《中国天主教爱国会�程》和《中国天主教主教团�程》修正案。�程对“独立自主自办教会”原则的表述做了进一步的明确，并就爱国会和主教团的主要任务和范围做了更为切合时代、更为清晰明确的阐述。中国教会秉承宗徒�教的精神和�统，以及“为一切人而成为一切”的宗徒圣训，��据中国国情在政治、经济和教会事务上奉行独立自主自办教会原则，在当信当行的教义教规上，与宗徒之长伯多禄的继承人保持共融，表明中国教会努力实践梵二大公会议精神，�强教会的内部团结，促进与普世教会的共融，万众一心，共同致力于向具有五千年文明历史和灿烂文化的中华民族�播福音的伟大使命。 会议以举手表决的方式，民主选举产生了中国天主教“一会一团”的新一届的领导集体。长期为全国教会服务、有着崇高威望的�位老主教、老主席，高风亮节主动退出了领导岗位，一批德才兼备、爱国爱教的中青年神长、修女、教友走上了前台，实现了“一会一团”领导班子的新老交替。新的班子集体平均年龄46.9岁，是一个年富力强、锐意进取、充满朝气的团队，赢得了与会代表的一致赞许，得到了全国神长教友的信任和拥护。
两位主教说，参会代表一致认为，这次大会是一次承前启后、继往开来、凝聚力量、团结奋进的盛会，��志着中国天主教爱国爱教的圣善事业从此进入新的时代，迈向了新的征程。
房兴耀主教和马英林主教表示，我们真诚地希望国际社会和国际天主教友好人士，理解和尊重中国天主教神长教友秉承天主赋予我们的�播基督福音、建��基督奥体－教会的责任与使命，以及我们��据国情和牧灵实际所做出的有利于教会发展的选择，为中国教会的发展以及中梵关系的改善而共同热切祈祷。

description.hltext_display: На шахте в Львовской области произошел пожар
description.content:
На шахте "Межиреченская" в Львовской области накануне вечером вспыхнул пожар, 77 горняков были эвакуированы. Об этом сообщает РИА "Новости" со ссылкой на пресс-службу МЧС Украины.
Пожар возник во вторник в 20.18 (21.18 мск) на горизонте 485 метров (верхняя площадка северного квершлаге). Произошло возгорание деревянной крепи. Шахта принадлежит государственному предприятию "Львовуголь".
В шахте работали 77 горняков, в 22.30 (23.30 мск) они были выведены на поверхность. Жертв и пострадавших нет. В 01.30 (02.30 мск) 22 декабря тремя отделениями государственной военизированной горноспасательной службы Минуглепрома пожар локализован.
Сейчас на шахте проводятся работы по ликвидации пожара. Добыча угля временно приостановлена. Причина пожара устанавливается. На месте происшествия работает оперативная группа главного управления МЧС в Львовской области.

description.hltext_display: ESPN's "Monday Night Football" tops competition
description.content:
LOS ANGELES (Hollywood Reporter) - The Chicago Bears vs. Minnesota Vikings match up on ESPN's "Monday Night Football" was the evening's most-watched primetime program on broadcast and cable, as 17.1 million viewers tuned in for the blow-out 40-14 victory by the Bears.
The game ranks as the ninth most-viewed program in cable history (excluding breaking news), said Nielsen. "Monday Night Football" is so far trending slightly higher this season than last season.

event_or_fact.property: The game ranks as the ninth most-viewed program in cable history (excluding breaking news)

description.hltext_display: Madoff Secretary Annette Bongiorno Jailed Over Ponzi Millions
description.author: Allan Dodds Frank
description.content:
Annette Bongiorno, the Ponzi king's loyal assistant of 40 years, chose jail over helping the feds get hold of the $14 million they accuse her of stealing as part of Madoff's shady operation. Annette Bongiorno, the 62-year-old longtime confidante of Bernard Madoff, is trading country-club living for a cell rather than help federal prosecutors recover millions of dollars they say she stole.
The Ponzi king's executive assistant of 40 years, escorted by her husband Rudy, surrendered to U.S. marshals in Florida Tuesday, even as the couple angered authorities by playing hide-and-seek with their alleged Madoff millions. "She did not come in with any property," Wayne Pickering, the supervising deputy at the U.S. Marshals Office in West Palm Beach, Florida, told . "When you get here, it is basically with just the clothes you have on your back."
The surrender came less than three hours after a New York hearing in which U.S. District Judge declared Bongiorno a "substantial flight risk," revoked the Madoff confidante's $5 million bail, and ended discussions about reducing bail to $3 million, a number Bongiorno might have been able to meet.
The judge ordered Bongiorno jailed after reviewing, in secret, a list produced by the defense of undisclosed millions of dollars in assets held by Bongiorno and her husband. Prosecutors disputed whether Rudy Bongiorno, who retired as an electrician on disability in 1986, could have earned any significant money or obtained cash outside of what his wife gave to him from her Madoff stash. This process has been excruciating Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanzaa, she didnt want to go to prison, said one of Bongiornos defense lawyers. The unusual procedure by Swain of reviewing documents "ex parte" amounted to the judge going an extra mile to be fair. It backfired on Bongiorno, who could spend as much as 75 years in prison if found guilty of being a co-conspirator in Madoff's Ponzi scheme.
The judge said she was "persuaded that there is an abundance of unrestrained assets that pose a real potential for the facilitation of flight. There is no condition, or combination of conditions, that will assure her presence at trial."
The secret examination was part of the judge's consideration of a Bongiorno defense proposal to have her bail reduced from $5 million to $3 million and to have her still-hidden assets monitored by an outside accounting firm to prove that she has neither the capability nor the intention to flee.
The prosecutors, who were denied access to the Bongiorno list, want to seize the millions she and her husband have squirreled away. Neither the prosecutors nor the judge would consider permitting the hidden assets to be used to post $5 million bail on the grounds that it may well be "victim money" that represents the fruits of her participation in the Madoff conspiracy.
The indictment against Bongiorno says she got more than $14 million from the Ponzi scheme while working on . Other court papers indicate she may have transferred more than $1 million to her husband.
She was quickly transported about four miles to the Palm Beach County Jail in West Palm Beach, where she will be held until she can be transferred to the Federal Detention Center in Miami.
One of her defense lawyers, Maurice Sercarz, told reporters that his clientshort, overweight, unhealthy, and afraid of flyingdeserved to remain out of jail pending trial, which has not yet been scheduled.
"While it may be that a person has the wherewithal to flee, it does not mean she has the intention to flee," Sercarz said. "If there is no will to flee, there is no way to find she is a risk of flight I am far from convinced that this is the end of it."

description.hltext_display: Al-Qaeda group 'considered' poisoning US food
description.content:
The same Al-Qaeda-linked group that attempted to send bombs on cargo planes earlier this year considered putting poison in food served at US hotels and restaurants, US media reported.
US intelligence officials told CNN on Tuesday that the Yemen-based Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula (AQAP) were considering poisoning food supplies with the deadly chemicals ricin and cyanide.
The Department of Homeland Security however also emphasized the threat was akin to the plots discussed in numerous online jihadist publications, where militants and their sympathizers routinely consider ways to attack western interests.
"We're talking months, not weeks (ago), that this came into the threat stream," an official told CNN.
An anonymous source in the US intelligence community told CBS News earlier this week that the threat was "credible."
Authorities have met with representatives in the hotel and restaurant industry to discuss the threat and "best practices" for ensuring food safety, according to CNN.
Al-Qaeda has "publicly stated its intention to try to carry out unconventional attacks for well over a decade, and AQAP propaganda in the past year has made similar reference," said DHS spokesman Sean Smith in a statement to CNN.
"We get reports about the different kinds of attacks terrorists would like to carry out that frequently are beyond their assessed capability," Smith said.

description.hltext_display: 俄：未来将向印度推荐最新秘密军事技术
description.content:
中评社香港12月22日电／国际线上引述东方网12月22日消息，据俄罗斯军工新闻网12月21日报道，俄罗斯驻印度大使卡达金在梅德韦杰夫总统访印前夕接受俄记者采访时表示，俄视印为军事技术合作领域战略伙伴，准备向印方转让最现代化的军事技术，甚至是秘密技术。
卡达金大使说：“从维持我们在印度武器市场上的存在的角度来看，俄罗斯向印度推荐那些不准备和其他任何一个国家分享的最新技术和秘密技术，具有原则性的意义。” 至于在印度武器市场竞争日益�剧的条件下俄罗斯能否保持自己的主导地位的问题，俄驻印大使卡达金指出，印度现在大约70%的武器装备是苏联和俄罗斯生产的。在可见的未来，这种比例当然可能会发生一些变化，但是俄武器装备的地位将是不可动摇的。 ��据俄罗斯国防出口公司的评估，2001-2010年间俄印军事技术合作计划项目总额高达180亿美元，俄方已经完成或即将完成大部分武器和军事装备供应合同，目前最大的军售项目主要是向印度空军供应米-17V-5运输直升机、协助印方许可生产苏-30MKI歼击机和T-90S坦克、改进伊尔-38反潜机。另外，俄企业还在履行印方采购米��-29K、米��-29KUB舰载歼击机和卡-31直升机的订单。而在过去的40多年里，俄印军事技术合作规模超过了350亿美元，约�此间俄武器和军事装备出口总额的三分之一，其中空军武器装备�主要部分。 ��据俄战略和技术分析中心的预测，在2015-2016年前，俄罗斯在印度武器市场上的地位将由苏-30MKI和米��-29K歼击机合同保障，而在2020年前印度还将得到80-90架苏-30MKI歼击机。另外，俄罗斯米��-35歼击机和卡-26直升机还在参�印度126架多功能歼击机和200架轻型直升机的采购招��活动。

description.hltext_display: Top 4 Large-Cap Stocks In The Telecom Services-Foreign Industry With The Highest Dividend Yield (TEF, PHI, FTE, BT)
India slashes onions customs duty
description.content: High prices of essential commodities such as onions have previously sparked unrest in IndiaIndia has abolished import taxes on onions in the latest attempt to control prices of the staple food which have more than doubled in a week.The customs duty would be cut from 5% to zero, Finance Secretary Ashok Chawla told reporters in Delhi.The price of onions has risen to an eye-watering 85 rupees ($1.87; Â£1.20) per kg from 35 rupees only last week.The rise has been blamed on unusually heavy rains in growing areas, as well as on hoarders and speculators.On Monday, the government banned exports of the food, a basic ingredient in many Indian dishes, until 15 January.The country has also begun importing onions from its neighbouring rival, Pakistan, to ease shortages.High prices of essential commodities such as onions have previously sparked unrest and helped bring down the national government in 2004.Indian onion crops have been damaged by unseasonal rains in the bulk producing western states of Maharashtra and Gujarat and in southern states.In an editorial on Wednesday, the Times of India newspaper called for "tough punitive action" if claims that officials have colluded in the hoarding of onions in growing areas were found to be true.NDTV reports that Bangalore hotel chefs are racking their brains for ways to serve up popular south Indian dishes such as onion dosas (pancakes) - without any onions.The rising cost of living is a pressing concern for most Indians.Food price inflation has retreated over recent months, but remains at a high of nearly 10%, a worry for the ruling Congress party ahead of a number of important state elections next year.

event_or_fact.property: The customs duty would be cut from 5% to zero

description.hltext_display: Portavoz ACS en Alemania dice oferta por Hochtief sin cambios
description.content:
FRANCFORT, 22 dic (Reuters) - La portavoz de ACS (ACS.MC: Cotización) en Alemania dijo el miércoles que la oferta de la empresa por la alemana Hochtief (HOTG.DE: Cotización) y su estrategia se mantiene sin cambios.
Esta mañana, ACS informó que a 21 de diciembre posee el 27,26 por ciento de los derechos de voto de Hochtief y que hasta la misma fecha habían acudido 5.825 acciones de la alemana a la opa.

description.hltext_display: 赖清德拟邀李安拍电影 秀台南的美
description.content:
中评社台北12月22日电／台南是文化之都，赖清德心中对于擘画台南成为台湾文化“首都”，有一个大梦，“台南有诸多珍贵文化资产与宝藏，理应备受重视”。他认为，“中央”应该针对台南的特殊性需求，挹注特别经费，如此，台南的升��才具意义。 五都预算编列，不增反减，看似可以分食的资源变多，然则，实际获得的统筹分配款反而少了，赖清德直言，“以目前公式计算，我看不出升��的意义。” 中国时报报道，赖清德说，过去两个“直辖市”分配四三%，新增三都不该只有四三%。国民党目前有一套计算公式，但对台南非常不公平，以现行可分配到的经费约三百多亿，虽比原本增�八十四亿，但伴随升��，有些经费反而不补助或补助变少，实际算起来，增�的经费才一亿多。 尤其，最让赖清德不解的是，“中央”在编列预算时，自始至终未纳入文化经费预算，未成全大台南合并的公正性；“台南是文化古都，‘中央’却一点都不重视，思维非常奇怪，这在其他的国家，��本不可能发生。” “台湾历史从台南发迹，这块土地构筑了蓬勃文化潜力。”文化、观光，是他未来施政的重点项目之一，打�台南成为台湾的文化首都，让全世界的人来到台湾，就知道要来台南，品评台湾的人文与文化精髓。
此外，热爱电影的赖清德，计划邀请海内外导演来台南取景拍片。赖清德已与国际名导李安接洽筹拍属于台南的电影，希望能透过电影，成功行销台南，拍出一部让人看了就想来台南、分享台南美好的电影。

description.hltext_display: Molto social e un po? smart ormai parliamo in itanglese
Electron Boy! Buy a comic = donate to the Make a Wish Foundation
description.content:
Fourteen year old Erik Martin had his wish granted by Seattle's Make A Wish Foundation last year (he wanted to be a superhero) and now he has his very own comic book! You can buy it for just $5 and the family is donating all profits to the Make a Wish Foundation.
Click here to buy a comic book:
Erik Martin AKA Electron Boy on his special Make-a-Wish superhero mission around Seattle last Spring.
Erik has terminal cancer & lives with his adopted parents and 2 brothers in Bellevue. The Martins have taken in 30 medically fragile kids since 1995.

description.hltext_display: Alphalogix Workflow Server Powers New Release of IBM Forms with Workflow 4.0
description.author: Alphalogix
description.content: --(PR.com)-- Alphalogix, an Independent Software Vendor and IBM Premier Business Partner, announced today that their Tasica Workflow Server, version 3.4.1 now powers IBM's newly updated and released IBM Forms with Workflow version 4.0. IBM combined their electronic forms product, IBM Forms, with the Tasica Workflow Server by Alphalogix, creating IBM Forms with Workflow in September of this year.IBM Forms with Workflow 4.0 now offers a combination of enhanced electronic forms with a modern look and feel, lower total cost of ownership and time to values, in addition to wider platform support enabling higher levels of improved productivity. Tasica Workflow Server adds tighter integration with electronic forms in addition to improved performance for installation.In the combined offering, users of all skill levels can easily apply business logic and decisions to dynamic electronic forms in a highly graphical design environment requiring no programming. Designers can build self-service applications for a web or portal environments making it easy for businesses to customize web experiences for their customers or employees. IBM now sells IBM Forms with Workflow to their clients in addition to IBM Forms 4.0.In late Q3, IBM signed an OEM agreement with Alphalogix to sell the Alphalogix product bundled with IBM Forms in a new IBM SKU number and offering called IBM Forms with Workflow to their clients.In a recent Proof of Technology for IBM Forms with Workflow, Alphalogix CEO Bob McCandless, stated, The Tasica Workflow Server and IBM Forms product are extremely integrated, so much so our [development] labs almost seem as if we are one team working together. The products have the same design environment and the same security model. Both products also operate on the IBM WebSphere Application Server platform. This seamless integration along with IBM's newest updates, makes IBM Forms with Workflow the preeminent tool for the future of building self-service applications for web delivery.Alphalogix recently announced Tasica Workflow 3.4, adding robust workflow capabilities including web services support, linked workflow support and documents repository support.About Alphalogix Alphalogix is the manufacturer of Tasica Workflow solutions and Independent Software Vendor. Tasica Workflow Solutions provide human centric workflow and real-time workflow reporting in web-based or portal based self-service applications. Tasica Workflow helps reduce operational costs, become energy efficient and enhance the communication and collaboration of business processes. Alphalogix has been an IBM Business Partner for over 15 years. IBM now provides their customers with a combined offering of IBM Forms and Tasica Workflow called IBM Forms with Workflow. For more information about Alphalogix, Tasica Workflow Solutions and its integration with IBM software please contact Alphalogix at 714-901-1456 or visit us online at www.Alphalogix.com.Alphalogix Media Contact:Victoria SauerAlphalogix.Tel: 714-901-1456Victoria_Sauer@Alphalogix.comwww.alphalogix.com###IBM's core electronic forms and process automation offering is updated to IBM Forms with Workflow 4.0. This new offering is powered by Alphalogix's enhancements of the Tasica Workflow Server.

description.hltext_display: В Нальчике задержан один из лидеров боевиков
description.content:
В Нальчике задержан один из лидеров бандподполья Кабардино-Балкарии, причастный к ряду резонансных преступлений. Об этом заявили в пресс-службе Главного управления МВД России по Северо-Кавказскому федеральному округу, передает ИТАР-ТАСС.
Как стало известно, в результате спецоперации в Нальчике накануне был задержан лидер бандподполья. При задержании он оказал сопротивление, бросил в сотрудников МВД гранату. Однако был ранен ответным огнем.
Пострадавших среди сотрудников милиции и горожан нет. На месте происшествия обнаружены граната Ф-1, десять патронов, 200-граммовая тротиловая шашка и электродетонатор. Имя задержанного не указывается в интересах следствия.

description.hltext_display: ¿Piratería audiovisual: Y ahora, que?
description.author: José Manuel Tourn
description.content:
El Congreso de los Diputados acaba de rechazar hace apenas unas horas la disposición final de la Ley de Economía Sostenible (LES) que pretendía introducir unas reformas para proteger la propiedad intelectual en Internet.
Tras años de pérdidas económicas cuantiosas y ante la inseguridad jurídica generada por las contradictorias decisiones judiciales que se iban produciendo, el Gobierno de la Nación decidió asumir la responsabilidad de regular tanto desequilibrio y realizó una propuesta razonable, equilibrada y que limitaba el ámbito de aplicación "al responsable del servicio de la sociedad de la información que estuviera realizando la conducta presuntamente vulneradora" de los derechos de propiedad intelectual. Resultaba imperativo para nuestro país hacer algo para eliminar la vergonzante marca de capital pirata que algunos medios de prensa, extranjeros y nacionales, otorgan a España, cuna de música, literatura y cine con respeto universal.
La Ministra de Cultura, censurada injustamente desde el mismo momento de asumir el cargo, se reunió con todas las partes afectadas y presentó una norma imaginativa que procuraba ceñir su actuación contra un número limitado de páginas infractoras de los derechos de propiedad intelectual. Creaba la 'Autoridad competente' a la que hace referencia la Ley de Servicios de la Sociedad de la información (LSSI).
De nada ha servido el esfuerzo del Gobierno por dejar fuera de la norma a los usuarios ni introducir la judicialización parcial del procedimiento manteniendo un mínimo de agilidad: la gran confusión ha triunfado.
Confusión alimentada por quienes no les preocupa la vulneración de la propiedad intelectual con tal de seguir ampliando el número de conexiones ("bájate lo que quieras que son X megas") más protestaron por los precios de las conexiones o de los elementos tecnológicos necesarios para tal acceso, confusión en fin, alimentada por quienes eluden su responsabilidad de dotar a nuestro país de un marco equilibrado para la protección de la propiedad intelectual con tal de no perder un solo voto.
Existe un claro desequilibrio entre la defensa de los derechos de los usuarios de Internet y los derechos de los titulares y creadores de los contenidos que aquéllos desean disfrutar y sólo un ejercicio de responsabilidad por parte de los partidos que han votado en contra de la Ley podía solucionar tamaña injusticia.
España, integrada en la Unión Europea, goza de una tecnología y comunicaciones de primer orden, sin embargo, la legislación para proteger la propiedad intelectual en la sociedad de la información se ha quedado varios pasos atrás con respecto a la implementación de las Directivas que otros países han realizado. Así, la responsabilidad de los prestadores de servicios basada en el conocimiento que de la ilicitud de los contenidos pudieran tener se condiciona en nuestro país, a la notificación por una 'Autoridad competente'; la confusión del concepto de copia privada digital vigente en toda Europa ha llegado a afirmar que el pago de un canon "da derecho" a copiar todo con independencia del origen ilícito de las descargas no autorizadas; por último, el titular de derechos de propiedad intelectual no dispone de un procedimiento civil adecuado para defender sus derechos, viéndose obligado a acudir a la vía penal.
Hace unas semanas, en el procedimiento en el que Telecinco reclamaba la protección de sus contenidos frente a su difusión sin su autorización en Youtube, el Juzgado de lo Mercantil Nº 7 de Madrid denegaba la adopción de medidas cautelares por entender, acudiendo a los artículos 16 y 17 de la LSSI que no ha habido una Autoridad competente que determine la ilicitud de los contenidos.
Paralelamente, las Audiencias de diversas provincias han mantenido criterios distintos en los procedimientos penales que se sustentan contra los responsables de páginas de descargas. Lo lamentable es que en muchos casos, tras cuatro años de instrucción, aún no se ha abierto el Juicio Oral. Durante este tiempo, los imputados han continuado con la actividad consistente en acudir a las salas de cine, grabar las películas y subirlas a la red, ocasionando gravísimos perjuicios que han llevado ya al cierre de muchos negocios y empresas con la consiguiente pérdida de puestos de trabajo. Está claro que algo hay que reformar en nuestras Leyes para impedir que estas situaciones se mantengan.
Un mínimo ejercicio de responsabilidad por parte de los prestadores de servicios hubiera propiciado un régimen de autorregulación que fue el preferido desde el principio por los creadores y las industrias de contenidos, sin embargo, en ningún momento estuvieron dispuestos a crear un procedimiento para la protección de la propiedad intelectual, ni siquiera cuando el desarrollo del nuevo modelo de negocio es una realidad y existe ya una oferta legal de descargas de contenidos que muy difícilmente podrá mantenerse frente a la competencia desleal. El modelo 'gratis total' sobre el que se está desarrollando la oferta de contenidos en Internet es insostenible pues condena a los titulares de derechos de propiedad intelectual a renunciar a la explotación comercial de sus obras y a eliminar la calidad de los contenidos que ofrecen a los ciudadanos.
La oferta actual de contenidos en el p2p no es acorde a una sociedad del siglo XXI: Tanto la calidad de las películas (grabadas en salas de cine con una cámara) como la selección de contenidos e información al usuario son impresentables.
Todo esto se contemplaba en la disposición final. Muchos comerciantes, empresarios y trabajadores de los sectores de la música, el libro, los videojuegos o el cine habían depositado sus esperanzas de futuro en la misma. Los Grupos políticos, lejos de mejorarla se han limitado a rechazarla. El Gobierno buscará en el Senado, los apoyos que le faltaron en el Congreso y quizá algún día España se asimile a otros países de su entorno que ya han entendido la importancia de proteger la propiedad intelectual. Lamentablemente, para muchos de los empresarios, comerciantes y trabajadores que antes mencionaba, la norma llegará demasiado tarde.
José Manuel Tourné es Director General de la Federación para la protección de la propiedad intelectual (FAP) y Secretario General de la Unión Videográfica Española (UVE).

description.hltext_display: 3 849 hodín premiér v STV!
description.content:
Rok 2010 bol v oblasti domácej seriálovej, dokumentárnej i filmovej tvorby pre Slovenskú televíziu mimoriadne úspešný. Po dlhom čase došlo k oživeniu pôvodnej slovenskej tvorby, a to najmä vďaka finančným prostriedkom, prideleným STV na základe Zmluvy so štátom. Celkovo sa ňou program STV obohatil o 58 hodín premiérového obsahu.
Divácky najatraktívnejším domácim seriálom na Jednotke bola v roku 2010 prvá séria Kriminálky Staré mesto, ktorá priniesla na obrazovky bezmála 7 hodín napätia, nadľahčeného humoru, ale aj výkonov slovenských hercov a herečky, ktorých mohli dovtedy diváci sledovať viac v iných slovenských televíziách (Zuzana Fialová, Milan Lasica, Alexander Bárta, Ján Koleník a ďalší). Aj druhý výpravný projekt STV sa dočkal uznania nielen diváckej verejnosti, ale aj odbornej kritiky – cyklus samostatných televíznych filmov Nesmrteľní predstavuje nové naštudovanie desiatky silných a pútavých príbehov z pera velikánov domácej i zahraničnej tvorby. V roku 2010 odvysielala Slovenská televízia spolu 7,5 hodín Nesmrteľných – v režisérskom kresle sa vystriedali napríklad Stanislav Párnický, Laco Halama, Emil Horváth, Roman Polák, Karol Vosátko; hlavných úloh sa zhostili o.i. Elena Podzámska, Vladimír Kobielsky, Kristína Svarinská, Róbert Jakab a ďalší.
Na sklonku roka začala Jednotka vyrovnávať aj programový dlh voči detskému divákovi. Slovenská televízia vyrobila a nasadzuje do vysielania nových 14 častí animovaného seriálu Jurošík, na Štedrý večer to bude dlho očakávaná hraná rozprávka Orest z rodu čarodejníkov, ktorá vznikla na základe Zmluvy so štátom, rovnako ako veľké hrané projekty pre deti a mládež Aj kone sa chcú hrať, O Cecílii a Kováč z podlesia, ktoré sú v pláne vysielania na január 2011.
Ak dnes niekto poukazuje na krízu pôvodnej tvorby v Slovenskej televízii, tak štatistické fakty hovoria presný opak: len v pôvodnej dramatickej tvorbe došlo oproti roku 2009 k 1,5 násobnému nárastu v počte hodín programu a suverénne najvyššiemu percentuálnemu podielu premiér dramatických programov za posledné štyri roky. V dokumentárnej tvorbe sú čísla ešte presvedčivejšie: 97 hodín premiérových dokumentov z vlastnej tvorby v roku 2010 (z toho viac ako polovica financovaná zo Zmluvy so štátom) je viac ako kedykoľvek v minulosti! Programy ako Poklady SK, Encyklopédia slovenských obcí, Fenomén či Hlava XXI si získali pozornosť a vyslúžili obľubu u desiatok tisíc divákov.
V roku 2010 STV odvysielala celkovo 3 849 hodín premiérových programov (vrátane spravodajstva, publicistiky a športu), čo je – prerátané na dni – skoro pol kalendárneho roka! Aj toto číslo svedčí o bezprecedentnom oživení pôvodnej slovenskej televíznej tvorby.
Za správnosť:
Útvar komunikácie STV

description.hltext_display: Vysielanie Ta3 počas Vianočných sviatkov
description.content:
V piatok na Štedrý deň odvysiela TA3 o 16.30 v priamom prenose Evanjelické služby božie z Veľkého evanjelického kostola. Od 22.00 si budú môcť diváci taktiež v priamom prenose pozrieť Polnočnú omšu z Vatikánu. TA3 privíta v tomto čase v štúdiu katolíckeho kňaza Dušana Kolenčíka, ktorý poskytne komentár k omši.
V sobotu na Prvý sviatok vianočný o 12.00 prinesie TA3 naživo omšu Urbi et Orbi z Vatikánu, hosťom v štúdiu bude tentokrát katolícky kňaz Marek Vaňuš.
Politické diskusné relácie budú v čase sviatkov nahradené spravodajskými blokmi.

Streaming media
Websites in the Fairfax Digital Network offer streaming video and audio in the Flash format. Streaming media allows you to watch video on a website as a continuous feed, as opposed to waiting for an entire audio or video file to download to your computer before you can use it.
Download the software
To play a video or multimedia clip, you need to have the Flash player installed. You can download one for most systems (including Mac OS X) for free if one is not already installed on your system.
Which Speed?
Our automated system will test your connection speed and send the best video stream so it plays smoothly and continuously.
Alternatively, you can manually choose the speed setting that corresponds most closely with your network connection. We produce clips in a range of speeds to deliver the best quality possible-- the better the quality the faster connection you'll need.

Acidente complica trânsito na Avenida Brasil, no Rio
description.content:
Dois caminhões bateram no final da madrugada desta quarta-feira (22).
Acidente foi na pista central no sentido Centro.
Do Bom Dia Rio
Dois caminhões bateram no final da madrugada desta quarta-feira (22), na pista central sentido Centro da Avenida Brasil. O acidente, segundo a CET-Rio, ocorreu nas imediações de Parada de Lucas. O trânsito ficou complicado na região.
Segundo a CET-Rio, os veículos já foram retirados do local e o tráfego começa a fluir melhor na área. Não houve feridos.
O trânsito está com retenções nas proximidades da Linha Vermelha e na saída da Washington Luiz.

description.hltext_display: Carro cai em cratera na Zona Sul de SP
description.content:
Região da Estrada do M'Boi Mirim foi bastante atingida pela chuva.
Do G1 SP
Um carro caiu em uma cratera na Rua Albino, na região da Estrada do M’Boi Mirim, na Zona Sul de São Paulo. Por volta das 6h30 desta quarta-feira (22), a Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego interditava a região. Até o horário, ainda não havia informações sobre possíveis feridos no acidente.
A região foi bastante atingida pela chuva desta terça-feira (21). Apenas meia hora de temporal foi suficiente para alagar ruas e casas dos bairros Piraporinha, Novo Santo Amaro, Capela do Socorro e Campo Limpo. A Estrada do M’Boi Mirim e as avenidas Guarapiranga e Guido Caloi foram tomadas pela água suja e barrenta dos córregos Ponte Baixa e Jurubatuba. Uma mulher morreu arrastada pela enxurrada.

description.hltext_display: Heartburn Drugs Linked to Pneumonia Risk
description.content:
Common Treatments for Gastric Acid May Contribute to Bacterial Overgrowth and Infection, Researchers Say
WebMD Health News
Reviewed By Laura J. Martin, MD
Dec. 20, 2010 -- New research suggests that one out of every 200 patients being treated with gastric acid-suppressive drugs for heartburn and other conditions may develop pneumonia.
Researchers led by Chun-Sick Eom, MD, MPH, from Seoul National University Hospital in South Korea, conducted a review of studies published between 1985 and 2009, looking at the use of gastric acid-suppressive drugs and the risk of developing pneumonia.
Acid Suppressives Strongly Linked to Pneumonia
The researchers found a significant association between the use of one class of gastric acid suppressive, called proton pump inhibitors, and pneumonia. Eom and his colleagues also found a dose-response relationship between proton pump inhibitors and risk of pneumonia, meaning the more acid suppressive a patient took, the higher the risk of developing pneumonia. Examples of proton pump inhibitors include Aciphex, Nexium, Prevacid, Prilosec, Protonix, and Zegerid.
The researchers also found a strong association between the use of another class, histamine 2-receptor antagonists, and pneumonia. Examples of histamine 2 receptor antagonists include Axid, Pepcid, Tagamet, and Zantac.
The results are published in the Dec. 20 issue of the Canadian Medical Association Journal.
Forty percent to 70% of hospitalized patients receive acid suppressive medication. The researchers say frequent use of these drugs may be contributing to hospital-acquired pneumonia illnesses and deaths. The findings suggest that doctors should exercise caution when prescribing these acid suppressives, particularly among patients at high risk for developing pneumonia.
Biological Explanations
There may be several reasons as to why acid suppressives may have this association with pneumonia, Eom and his team report. Acid-suppressive drugs may increase the risk for pneumonia by blocking gastric acid, which could lead to bacteria overgrowth in the upper gastrointestinal tract that may travel to the lungs. It's also possible the acid-suppressive medication inhibits immune cells, reducing their ability to fight off bacteria and infection.
Acid-suppressive drugs are the second most commonly sold and used medication worldwide, totaling more than $26 billion in sales in 2005 in the U.S. They are prescribed to treat conditions such as heartburn, gastroesophageal reflux disease, and ulcers. Previous studies have examined a possible link between these drugs and pneumonia in the past, but the results have been mixed.
"Several previous studies have shown that treatment with acid-suppressive drugs might be associated with an increased risk of respiratory tract infections and community-acquired pneumonia in adults and children,” Eom and his colleagues wrote. "Given the widespread use of proton pump inhibitors and histamine 2-receptor antagonists, clarifying the potential impact of acid-suppressive therapy on the risk of pneumonia is of great importance to public health."
SOURCES:
Eom, C. Canadian Medical Association Journal, published Dec. 20, 2010.
© 2010 WebMD, LLC. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: Tiroteio no Alemão assusta moradores no Rio
description.content:
Militares impediram assalto a ônibus e criminoso foi baleado.
Segundo o Exército, ao mesmo tempo, grupo de soldados foi atacado.
Do Bom Dia Rio
Vinte e quatro dias após a ocupação no Conjunto de Favelas do Alemão, moradores da região voltaram a se assustar com um tiroteio na área. Militares evitaram um assalto a ônibus no local.
Segundo testemunhas, passageiros que estavam no veículo alertaram um grupo e militares de que o ônibus estava sendo assaltado. Logo em seguida, os soldados viram um homem armado desembarcar correndo e fizeram disparos para o alto. Como o homem não parou, acabou atingido nas nádegas.
Ele foi socorrido pelos próprios militares, que o levaram para o hospital, e estava com uma arma de brinquedo. Algumas balas perfuraram paredes de uma vila de casas na região.
Criminosos abriram fogo contra soldados
De acordo com o Exército, quase ao mesmo tempo, cerca de 100 metros mais a frente um outro grupo de soldados teria sido atacado por bandidos.
"Dois carros abriram fogo contra a nossa tropa, o que causou a reação dos nossos militares", contou o oficial de comunicação social, Fabiano Carvalho.

description.hltext_display: Counterfeit goods giving cops a hard time
description.author: Caroline Kyungae Smith
description.content:
In a raid that might snuff out a few Christmas shopping bargains, Cook County sheriff's police this week seized between $250,000 and $500,000 worth of unlicensed Bears and Blackhawks sweatshirts, T-shirts and hats from a West Side warehouse.
"There was a seemingly never-ending basement of boxes filled with clothes," said Steve Patterson, spokesman for the Cook County sheriff's office, of Monday's raid. "It was boxed, ready to ship somewhere."
Counterfeit goods valued at more than $260 million were seized by U.S. Customs and Border Protection in the 2009 fiscal year. The most popular knockoff item was shoes, which accounted for nearly $100 million of last year's seizures, followed by electronics, handbags and clothing.
It's a crime dependent on people's love of a bargain. So the gift-giving frenzy of the holidays can be prime time for counterfeiters, said Steven Kirby, whose Elmhurst-based investigative agency specializes in counterfeit cases.
"As retailers gear up for the holiday season, so do counterfeiters because more people are shopping," said Kirby, chairman of Edward R. Kirby & Associates.
Kirby began handling counterfeit product investigations in the mid-1980s. It is now a third of the agency's business. Clients, which have included Nike and Microsoft, train Kirby's investigators how to spot counterfeit products.
The agency just completed a monthlong investigation with Chicago police that last weekend led to the arrest of a man on the North Side who was allegedly in possession of hundreds of fake Casio watches and knockoff Air Jordan shoes, as well as unlicensed sports apparel, said Town Hall District Lt. Bob Stasch.
The value of the seized goods was estimated at $40,000, Stasch said.
"A lot of items are sold to unsuspecting customers," Kirby said. "They'll take the fake Nike shoes and put them in a real box. We're finding more mixing of legitimate shoes with fakes in fixed storefronts."
Many people remain blase about counterfeiting. On Tuesday, a couple of holiday shoppers in Wrigleyville said they didn't think a woman would be offended by a knockoff gift.
"Because of the economy and lack of jobs, I don't think someone would say too much," said Margaret Martin of the South Side as she window-shopped along Clark Street. "At least she got something."
Counterfeit items are usually priced about a fifth to a third of the retail price, Kirby said.
"I would be fine if I (received a knockoff purse) because it's just a purse," said Yolanda Sims of Chicago Heights. "I'm more impressed by someone who saves their money."
Counterfeiting remains a serious crime and can lead to charges that range from a misdemeanor to a felony calling for 15 years in prison, according to the Illinois Counterfeit Trademark Act, said Andy Conklin, spokesman with the Cook County state's attorney's office.
So how can shoppers who want the real thing protect themselves?
"It comes down to where you're making your purchase," said Brian Bell, a spokesman with U.S. Customs. "If you're purchasing from a legitimate retailer or authorized (reseller), you're getting the real product. Be careful with online purchases."
Simply put, shoppers should use common sense, Stasch said.
"If you're looking for a name-brand item, specifically clothing or sportswear, look on that brand's Web site and find an authorized dealer in the area," Stasch said. "If you see a deal that looks too good to be true, it probably is."

description.hltext_display: Assange sa sťažuje na uniknuté dokumenty o jeho osobe
description.content:
The Guardian selektívne zverejňoval časti policajnej správy, tvrdí Assange
Zakladateľ webovej stránky WikiLeaks Julian Assange dnes uviedol, že on sám je obeťou zákerných zverejnení uniknutých dokumentov z prokuratúry vo Švédsku, kde čelí obvineniam zo sexuálnych deliktov.
Assange sa rozhovore pre britské noviny The Times sťažoval na ďalší denník, The Guardian, že "selektívne zverejňuje" časti policajnej správy.
Ako dodal, materiál bol denníku poskytnutý minulý týždeň, deň pred začatím jeho pojednávania o prepustení na kauciu.
Zakladateľ WikiLeaks v súčasnosti bojuje proti úsiliu o vydanie do Švédska. Švédsko požiadalo o jeho vydanie, aby ho mohlo vypočuť pre obvinenia zo sexuálnych útokov na dve dobrovoľné spolupracovníčky WikiLeaks.
Assangea minulý týždeň prepustili z britskej väzby na kauciu. Ďalšie pojednávanie na súde bude mať 11. januára.
Informovala agentúra AP.

description.hltext_display: The Year in Media From WikiLeaks to Facebook
description.author: Peter Lauria
description.content:
From Julian Assange's WikiLeaks to Mark Zuckerberg's Facebook2010 felt many quakes in the media world. See Peter Lauria's gallery of the 17 biggest stories of the year.
Two people who are redefining traditional notions of media, Julian Assange of WikiLeaks and Mark Zuckerberg of Facebook, dominated it this year. Indeed, part of the reason Assange and Zuckerberg so captivated the media world in 2010 was that journalists were trying to figure out what the duos emergence means for the future. In a sense, Zuckerberg and Assange are two sides of the same coin, writes Managing Editor Richard Stengel by way of introducing the Facebook founder as . Both Assange and Zuckerberg take one of journalisms central tenetsthat information should be freely available and openly exchangedto uncomfortable extremes. Or, to put it another way, unlike most people who view privacy as an unconditional constant, both Assange and Zuckerberg view it as malleable depending on the situation. Both are prolific coders who use technology to interact with society, mainly because they are more comfortable with computers than they are with people. Yet both have created platforms with WikiLeaks and Facebook that feature audiences far larger than any other individual form of conventional mass media. Assange, 39, and Zuckerberg, 26, made headlines in 2010 as much for their characters as for their creations. And their characters were called into question. Assange is out on bail fighting potential extradition from London to Sweden to . Zuckerberg, of course, was the subject of Oscar favorite , a film that painted him less as a world-changing entrepreneur and more as a technological savant who didnt create Facebook so much as steal it in an act of revenge after a lifetimes worth of abuse at the hands of the more popular kids (and women). Assange and Zuckerberg provided ideal bookends for yet another raucous year in media. Filling in the space between them were such stories as the dysfunction at CNN and MSNBC, the rise of the Tea Party, the emergence of Sarah Palin as a television star, and Comcasts takeover of NBC Universal. And, not to be immodest, but two of the years biggest media stories directly involved : our merger with Newsweek and Viacom Chairman Sumner Redstones attempt to bribe me into divulging my sources on an MTV story in July.
Still, none of these stories even comes close to the media dominance of Assange and Zuckerberg in 2010. This year in media belonged to themthe rest of us were all playing for third place.
Peter Lauria is senior correspondent covering business, media, and entertainment for . He previously covered music, movies, television, cable, radio, and corporate media as a business reporter for The . His work has also appeared in Avenue, Blender, and Media Magazine, and he's appeared on CNBC, Bloomberg, BBC Radio, and Reuters TV. Like and for updates all day long.
For inquiries, please contact at editorial@thedailybeast.com.

description.hltext_display: China's most laborious railway in operation
description.content: A train starts its maiden journey from Wanzhou of Southwest China’s Chongqing municipality to Yichang in Central China’s Hubei province at Wanzhou Station, Dec 22, 2010. The Yichang-Wanzhou railway, which goes through some of the most difficult terrain, is considered one of China's most expensive rail projects. A 22.57 billion yuan ($3.4 billion) project, the 377-kilometer railway features 253 bridges and 159 tunnels, including 34 that run through karst topography, or landscape formed by the dissolution of soluble rocks. The length of track that runs through bridges and tunnels is 278 km, or 73 percent of the line's total length. [Photo/Xinhua]

description.hltext_display: Euro se detiene en Asia cerca de mínimos contra franco suizo
description.content:
TOKIO, 22 dic (Reuters) - El euro se detenía en Asia tras caer a nuevos mínimos contra el franco suizo y el dólar australiano pero la moneda única estaba atrapada en un lento descenso, en opinión de operadores.
La agencia de calificación Moody's advirtió que podría recortar el rating de Portugal mientras que Fitch podría hacer lo mismo con Grecia.
"Aunque se puede suponer que el mercado se había vuelto insensible a estas noticias, la evidencia sugiere lo contrario ante una ampliación de los spreads de los periféricos y la presión para el euro", dijo David Watt, estratega de divisas de RBC Dominion en una nota a cliente.
(Additional contribution by Wayne Cole and Reuters Analyst Krishna Kumar in Sydney; Editing by Michael Watson)

description.hltext_display: Yargıtay'dan habere kınama
description.content:
Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı, "ÇYDD'den Başsavcıya "Kapat' Baskısı" haberlere ilişkin olarak, "Başsavcılığımızın siyasi parti kapatma davalarını açma konusunda yönlendirildiğine ilişkin yazı, haber, yorum ve düşünce açıklamalarını kınıyor, hukuk devletinin de güvencesi olan Başsavcılığımıza yapılan saldırıları kabul edilemez nitelikte görüyoruz" açıklamasında bulundu. 21.12.2010 17:53
ANKARA (ANKA) -
Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı'ndan bazı yazılı ve görsel basında "ÇYDD'den Başsavcıya "Kapat' Baskısı" başlıklı haberlerin yer alması nedeniyle yapılan yazılı açıklamada, "Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcısı ile protokol dışındaki kişi ve kuruluş temsilcilerinin görüşme istemlerini özel kaleme iletmeleri sırasında görüşme nedenleri sorulmakta ve nezaket gereği dışındaki siyaset, ülke sorunları, temyiz başvuruları ve görev kapsamında kalan diğer konulara ilişkin görüşme istemleri olan kişi ve kuruluş temsilcilerinin görüşme istemleri kabul edilmemektedir. Yoğun is yükü de gözetilerek verilen randevular 10-15 dakika ile sınırlı tutulmaktadır" denildi. Görüşme sırasında ziyaretin kapsamına sadık kalınmasına önem verilmekte olduğu ve kapsam dışına çıkılmaması konusunda da gereken duyarlılık ve özenin gösterildiği ifade edilen açıklamada şöyle devam edildi:
"Başsavcılığımız görev ve yetki kapsamına giren hususların paylaşılması, istişare edilmesi söz konusu olmamaktadır. Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcısı Abdurrahman Yalçınkaya göreve basladıgı 21 Mayıs2007 tarihinden bu yana yukarıdaki anlatıma uygun biçimde ayda yaklaşık 30 civarında görüşme yapmaktadır. Söz konusu haberde yer verilen ve 12 Subat 2008 günü saat 14.00'de adı geçen sivil toplum kuruluşlarının temsilcileri ile görüşme yapılıp yapılmadığı kurum kayıtlarına göre hatırlanılmamakla birlikte, kuruluş yetkilileri tarafından faks yolu ile randevu talebinde bulunulduğu anlaşılmış ve bu kapsamda nezaket gereği yapılmış bir örüşme olmasına karsın haberlerin verilmiş biçimindeki gerçek dışı yorum, ima ve değerlendirme içeren görüşmeye farklı bir anlam yükleme gayretleri dikkat çekici bulunmuştur. Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı, yürüttüğü soruşturmalarda ve açtığı davalarda hiçbir organ, makam, merci veya kişilerden emir veya talimat almayan, tavsiye ve telkinlerle hareket etmeyen bağımsız bir kurumdur."
Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı'nın siyasi açıklama ve gelişmelerden etkilenmeksizin, demokratik düzenin korunması için Anayasanın verdiği yetki ve görev ile siyasi parti kapatma davalarını açtığı belirtilen açıklamada, "Aksinin düşünülmesi, Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı'nın kurumsal ve işlevsel yapısı ve hukuk sistemi içerisindeki konumu ile bağdaşmamaktadır. Yargıtay Cumhuriyet Başsavcılığı'nın görev ve yetkilerini yerine getirme sırasında yönlendirilemeyeceği, aykırı düşünenlerin hukuk devleti ilkesi ile demokratik değerlerden yoksun bulunduğu, bu yöndeki yazı ve beyanların kurumumuzu yıpratmaya yönelik olduğu açıktır. Başsavcılığımızın siyasi parti kapatma davalarını açma konusunda yönlendirildiğine ilişkin yazı, haber, yorum ve düşünce açıklamalarını kınıyor, hukuk devletinin de güvencesi olan Başsavcılığımıza yapılan saldırıları kabul edilemez nitelikte görüyoruz" denildi.(ANKA)

description.hltext_display: James E. Knee of Sterling Financial Services, LLC Receives National Health Care Service Award
description.author: Sterling Financial Services, LLC
description.content: --(PR.com)-- According to the Bureau of Labor Statistics, there are approximately 700,000 physicians in the United States who work in excess of 60 hours per week. While the earning potential is the highest among any profession in the U.S., demand on time and pressure from a host of sources impairs physicians ability to oversee their personal finances. In response, an elite group of financial advisors is emerging as specialist to the medical community. In recognition of his work with area health care executives and physicians, James E. Knee, of Sterling Financial Services, LLC, has been named a 2010 MD Preferred Service Award recipient.Each year, U.S. Medical Specialties, Inc., a national medical consulting firm, recognizes excellence in service to the medical community in a number of disciplines including financial services, real estate, insurance and legal services. The goals of the MD Preferred Program for Financial Advisors include identifying, acknowledging and promoting service excellence to the medical community.The program provides medical professionals with a recognizable national icon that assures specialized services and an understanding of the unique needs of physicians and their families. Doctors are very busy professionals, observed Michael OMalley, Project Manager of MD Preferred Services. When it comes to finding a service professional that specializes in serving physicians, they appreciate an organization that has done the research for them and has pulled a team together to make their lives easier.Every MD Preferred Financial Advisor is a SEC registered fiduciary that must meet stringent professional and ethical standards to eliminate any potential conflict of interest. Award recipients are listing in an on-line directory available at www.MDPreferredServices.com. In addition to community based service providers, the directory recognizes national organizations that serve the health care industry and support the MD Preferred program. The on-line resource center is available at no cost to physicians and other medical professionals. MD Preferred also publishes a free monthly E-Newsletter that is distributed to over 26,000 graduating physicians providing them with advice and information compiled and written by MD Preferred Service Award recipients.James E. Knee is one of less than 500 Financial Advisors nationwide that has received the prestigious MD Preferred Service Award.About Sterling Financial Services, LLCSterling Financial Services, LLC, a registered Investment Advisory Firm, located in Central New Hampshire, serving the New England area, offering individuals, corporations, and non-profit corporations:· Investment Management or Second Opinion· Strategic alliances with Fidelity Investments, Pershing and Investors Capital Corporation· Independent, Unbiased, Objective Investment Advice· Retirement Income Planning· Financial Planning Services· Estate and Wealth Management ServicesSterling Financial Services is open Monday through Friday 8:30 am to 4:30 pm if you have any questions please feel free to call us at (603) 224-1010 or contact us via email at info@sfs2.net.For more information about Sterling Financial Services, LLC, please visit us on the web at www.SterlingFinancialServices.net.Registered Representative Securities offered through Investors Capital Corporation a Broker/Dealer, Member FINRA/SIPC, Sterling Financial Services, LLC, 6 Loudon Road, Suite 505, Concord, NH, 03301Investment Advisor Representative Sterling Financial Services, LLC, Concord, NHAbout the MD Preferred Service AwardThe MD Preferred Service Award is presented by U.S. Medical Specialties, Inc., each year to a diverse group of professional service providers. Award recipients can be identified by the award icon that they display and can be found in an on-line resource center at no cost to the medical community at www.MDPreferredServices.com. U.S. Medical Specialties also provides job services on-line at www.MedicalMatch.org, published a daily medical blog at www.RoundsOnLine.org and distributes a monthly E-Newsletter, The Advisor, to graduating residents and fellows in 32 different medical specialties. For additional information contact Ron Davis, VP Business Development at 800-260-8366, ext 701.###James E. Knee, of Sterling Financial Services, LLC, recognized for excellence in service to area medical professionals.
