description.hltext_display: Route 72 In Lebanon Reopens; Water Boil Advisory Still In Effect
description.content:
Images: LEBANON, Pa. -- A water boil advisory remains in effect for Lebanon following a water main break Tuesday.
The Lebanon County town experienced the main break in the area of 12th and Maple streets near the entrance of Coleman Park.
The boil water advisory affects customers in Lebanon City, North Cornwall Township and South Lebanon Township.
Officials are recommending residents boil water for the next 48 hours for drinking or cooking.
Workers closed Route 72 early Tuesday to work on the water main.

description.hltext_display: Mom facing arson charge
description.author: Metro Calgary
description.content:
A Bashaw mother has been charged with attempted murder and arson following a fire at her family’s home early Monday.
RCMP joined firefighters at the blaze at 6:30 a.m. to find that a father, mother and their two children had made it out of the burning structure.
Following an investigation, RCMP charged the mother with three counts of attempted murder and two counts of arson with disregard for human life yesterday. She will appear in provincial court in Stettler tomorrow morning.
The cause of the fire and the identity of the accused and her family have not been released.

description.hltext_display: OpenView Partners Releases Research Report on Thought Leadership in Expansion Stage Companies
description.content:
(PRWeb.com via COMTEX) -- Today, Boston-based venture capital firm OpenView Venture Partners released its latest research report on the importance of thought leadership for growing technology companies. Thought leadership may be a key indicator of success at the expansion stage.
According to OpenView, to be a thought leader a company must look past its internal thoughts and focus on examining the needs and dynamics of its target markets.
The research report combines data from an analysis of websites from 50 software and technology companies with annual revenues between $5 million and $25 million from the 2010 Inc 5000 list in addition to surveying readers of the OpenView blog. OpenView focused on comparing the practices that people perceive to indicate thought leadership with the practices and content that actually appeared on the surveyed websites. Specifically, the content types that were considered included blogs, ebooks, books, whitepapers, webinars, podcasts, bylined articles, newsletters, and speaking engagements.
"Thought leadership is an incredibly powerful tool that every expansion stage technology company should harness," said Scott Maxwell, Founder and Senior Managing Director of OpenView Venture Partners.
OpenView's research revealed the following: Regular blogging was viewed as the most effective practice for developing thought leadership 62% of the expansion stage companies surveyed featured a resource link on their home page that redirected to non-product or service related content Only 56% of company websites surveyed display a regularly contributed blog on their websites Visit OpenView Partners to see the report in full and learn the findings.
About OpenView Partners OpenView Venture Partners is an expansion stage venture capital fund with a focus on high-growth software, Internet, and technology-enabled companies. Through its staff of seasoned operating executives, who collectively bring several decades of technology and management experience to the firm, OpenView is able to help portfolio companies with quickly ramping up Product, Go-To-Market, and Organizational and Operational functions to best practice levels. Founded in 2006, the firm has a total capital under management of approximately $240 million. OpenView Venture Partners is based in Boston and invests on a worldwide basis. OpenView recently released OpenView Labs, an idea site for senior managers at expansion stage technology companies. For more information, visit OpenView Labs directly.
# # # Read the full story at http://www.prweb.com/releases/2010/12/prweb8034717.htm PRWeb.com
[ Back To greentechnologyworld.com's Homepage ]

description.hltext_display: 아름다운 다리, 각� 미 비결은 허드슨 진
مصر تفرج عن مراسل الجزيرة نت
description.content:
بدر محمد بدر (الجزيرة نت-أرشيف)
الجزيرة نت-القاهرة
أفرجت السلطات المصرية الأحد عن مراسل الجزيرة نت بدر محمد بدر بعد احتجازه لمدة ثلاثين يوما.
وروى محمد بدر كيف أفرج عنه صباح الأحد من السجن وبقي لمدة ساعتين في سيارة الترحيلات بمقر مباحث أمن الدولة بمدينة السادس من أكتوبر قبل أن يزج به داخل إحدى زنازين المباحث حتى قبيل صلاة المغرب، حيث أطلق سراحه.
وأرجع المراسل الإفراج عنه إلى جهود زملائه بنقابة الصحفيين، لأنه لم يعرض على وكيل النيابة، كما كان مقررا أن يحدث صباح اليوم الاثنين.
وبسؤاله عن شعوره بعد تجربة السجن التي مر بها، أجاب بأنه شعر بمرارة الظلم التي "يعاني منها المواطن المصري العادي الذي ليست له ممارسات سياسية" أو المعني بالعمل العام، مشيرا إلى أن "الرسالة التي يتحملها أصحاب الأقلام كبيرة تجاه أمتهم، وبخاصة في مجال الحريات".
وأكد الزميل بدر أنه أصر على عدم دفع الكفالة التي اشترطتها النيابة الأسبوع الماضي للإفراج عنه، وذكر أنه لم يتسلم الأموال التي أخذت من منزله وهي مثبتة في محضر التحقيقات وتبلغ حوالي ثمانين ألف جنيه مصري حتى الآن.
وكان الزميل بدر قد ذكر في وقت سابق لوكيل النيابة أن سبب اعتقاله يعود لإصرار زوجته على ممارسة حقها القانوني والدستوري بالترشح لعضوية مجلس الشعب، فقط لا غير.
يذكر أن عزة الجرف -زوجة بدر- كانت مرشحة الإخوان على مقعد الحصة النسائية في دائرة 6 أكتوبر، وقد امتنعت مديرية 6 أكتوبر عن استلام أوراق ترشيحها، رغم حصولها على العديد من الأحكام القضائية التي تمكنها من تقديم الأوراق، وإدراج اسمها ضمن المرشحات.

تعليقك على الموضوع
الإسم:
كتابة الإسم الثلاثي خيار إجباري والإبتعاد عن الكنية واللقب تفاديا للتشابه
البريد الإلكتروني:
ادخال البريد الإلكتروني اجباري ولا يظهر عند النشر
العنوان:
يكتفى بذكر اسم البلد أو المدينة .
التعليق: *
- المشاركة لا تتجاوز 500 حرف.
- المشاركة يجب أن تلتزم بالمادة المنشورة والمختار التعليق عليها، وبخلافه سيتم إهمال التعليقات التي تكون خارج الموضوع.
- يهمل كل تعليق يتضمن شتائم أو تعابير خارجة عن اللياقة والأدب.
- يهمل كل تعليق يقدح بشخصيات بعينها أو هيئات.
- تهمل التعليقات المتسمة بروح الطائفية والعنصرية أو التي تمس بالذات الإلهية أو تمس المعتقدات الدينية.
- تهمل التعليقات التحريضية والتعليقات التي تتضمن تهديدات لشخص او لجهة معينة.
- تهمل التعليقات التي تتضمن ترويجا لجهات أو هيئات أو لأشخاص بعينهم.
- تهمل التعليقات التي تتعرض للكاتب وشخصه في مقالات الرأي أو التحليلات أو تقارير المراسلين.
- يهمل التعليق المتضمن ملاحظات حول إدارة التعليقات أو ملاحظات أخرى عن الموقع بعيدة عن الموضوع المختار للتعليق عليه، حيث أن مثل هذه الأمور لها بريدها الخاص لتزويد الموقع بالملاحظات والاقتراحات العامة والطلبات هو Supportnet@aljazeera.net
- الموقع عربي فلا تنشر إلا المشاركات المكتوبة باللغة العربية.

description.hltext_display: 宜万铁路正式通车 从拟定修建到通车历时百年
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
12月22日，4806次列车准备从恩施站出发。当日，我国建设难度最大的山区铁路宜万铁路正式通车。新华社记者 程敏 摄 12月22日，4806次列车到达宜昌东站。当日，我国建设难度最大的山区铁路宜万铁路正式通车。新华社记者 程敏 摄 新华网湖北恩施12月22日电(记者 刘紫凌 黎昌政 田建军)22日10时18分，随着汽笛鸣响，4806次列车徐徐离开恩施火车站，川渝地区东出的沿江铁路快速大通道??宜万铁路正式开通，中国西南山区陆上交通的咽喉被打通，天堑变通途。
隆冬时节的恩施火车站，彩旗飘飘，锣鼓喧天，龙狮飞腾。恩施土家族苗族自治州各族群众从四面山寨赶来，他们身着盛装，载歌载舞，一派喜庆热闹景象，新近投入使用的火车站成了一片欢乐的海洋……
恩施土家族苗族自治州位于武陵山区腹地，是华中进入西南的咽喉、川渝东出的重要门户，州铁路办主任周昌发看着远去的列车不禁热泪盈眶。这位土家族汉子说：“宜万铁路从1903年拟定修建到2010年正式通车，几度开工几度停建，历经百年沧桑。经过百年的期盼，火车终于开进了土苗山寨，各族群众千百年来为山所阻、为路所困、为运所难的状况一去不复返了。”
宜万铁路总长377公里，5万建设者历时7年才建成，是我国单公里修建时间最长的铁路。今年58岁的曾明权是恩施市红庙开发区枫香坪村的农民，最近天天带着孙子来火车站看火车。他说，盼啊盼，修了7年，终于开通了。乡亲们可真高兴啊，很多人买了首发列车的车票。以前坐汽车去宜昌，要花100多元钱不说，还要搭上一天时间。现在坐火车去宜昌，空调硬座票只要30元，不到两个小时就到了，又快又便宜。
宜万铁路运营初期开行旅客列车5对，明年1月11日起将开行14对，这将极大地方便武陵山区的人民出行。
当地群众唱道：“(过去)出门就爬山，要爬九十九道坎，过河到对岸，要绕九十九道弯，土家儿女哟，扁担挑岁月，背篓背辛酸……(今天)蜀道不再难，宜万铁路连川汉，巨龙进山把梦圆，日子越过越香甜！”

시즐팬 관계자는 "12월이 들어서면서 송년 모임을 갖는 사람들이 증가하� 있다"며 "이와 관� �해서 연말모임에 시즐팬에서 즐길 수 있는 프로모션을 진행중이며 현재 송년모임 예약을 각 가맹� �에서 받� 있으니 참� 하길 바란다"� � �했다. 한편 시즐팬이 가맹� � 개설 문의는 � �화 1600-9959 또는 홈페이지 www.sizzlepan.co.kr로 하면 된다.
(끝)

description.hltext_display: Heb opens London office
description.content:
Heb, the Nottingham-based firm of chartered surveyors, has opened a London office headed by former CBRE retail man Rob Detheridge. The office, based in Heddon Street in Londons West End, is Hebs first expansion out of Nottingham.
Jonathan Emmerson, partner at Heb, said: Our range of work has increased greatly over the last 12 months, primarily due to our diversification of our services. We are now involved in national sectors including local authority advice, statutory body work, a far eastern investment fund as well as our more traditional roles such as retail and industrial and office agency. I have personally known Rob for several years from his CBRE days and he is an exceptional agent and is well connected throughout the London and south of the country. I am very confident our London office under Robs stewardship will be a great success in terms of servicing current clients and expanding into other sectors. Detheridge said: Jon and I have always had a productive work relationship and Heb is a company I admired from my days at CBRE. Hebs energy, communication and marketing skills coupled with their excellent agency and development expertise are attributes that will serve the London office well in the future. Hebs clients include Caffe Nero, Samworth Brothers, Pulp, KFC, Westfield, Sony, Sainsburys, Specsavers, Lloyds Banking Group and Aviva.

description.hltext_display: 무안국� �공항에서 만나는 관광 담양
description.content:
무안국� �공항 2층 로비에 관광명소 사진 � �시 무안국� �공항에 가면 대숲맑은 생태도시 담양군의 아름다운 관광명소를 한눈에 볼 수 있다. 담양군은 무안국� �공항 이용객들에게 담양을 홍보하기 위해 '남도 웰빙관광 1번지 담양'을 주� �로 담양의 대표� �으로 아름다운 관광명소 사진 25� �을 � �시한다� 밝혔다. 대나무 테마숲인 죽녹원을 비롯한 � �국에서 가장아름다운 숲으로 이름난 메타세쿼이아 가로수 길과 3∼400년 된 풍치림이 장관을 이루는 관방� �림, 명승 40·57·58호인 소쇄원과 식영� �, 명옥헌원림, 금성산성 등 담양을 대표하는 명소를 담았다. 이번 사진� �시는 지역의 국� �공항으로서 지역을 알리� 홍보하는데 일조하기 위한 한국공항공사 김종성 무안지사장의 배� �로 사진� �시회를 위한 공간을 무료로 이용� 수 있게 됐다. 군 관계자는 "출·입국 시 맨 처음과 마지막으로 � �� 수 있는 공항의 장소� � 특성으로 각인효과가 높아 홍보·마케팅의 효과가 클 것으로 기대된다"며 "앞으로도 공항과 지하� 역사 등 많은 사람들이 이용하는 중요지� �에 대한 홍보를 통해 관광객 � 치와 지역경� � 활성화에 만� �을 기하� 다"� 말했다. (끝)
출처 : 담양군청 본 콘텐� 는 해당기관의 보도자료임을 밝혀드립니다.

인천경제자유구역의 성장 잠재력을 홍보하고 2단계 투자유치 목표를 조기 달성하기 위해 마련된 이날 행사에는 송영길 인천시장과 이종철 인천경제청장, 국내.외 기업인, 금융기관, 법무.회계법인, 주한외국 공관.상공단체 관계자 등 300여명이 참석했다.
인천경제자유구역은 작년 말까지 기반시설 조성을 마무리 하고 올해 2단계 투자유치 사업을 시작했으나 세계적인 금융위기와 경기침체에 이어 천안함 사태, 연평도포격 등 잇단 악재로 투자유치에 어려움을 겪고 있다.
이종철 인천경제청장은 "최근 인천경제자유구역을 찾는 중국 일본 등 아시아 지역의 기업인과 기관 관계자들이 크게 늘고 있다"면서 "적극적인 홍보 활동을 통해인천경제자유구역의 경쟁력과 강점에 대한 정확한 인식을 대내.외에 알리겠다"라고 말했다.
[지홍구 기자]
[ⓒ 매일경제 & mk.co.kr, 무단전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Yamaha boss reflects on âfabulousâ 2010
description.content:
Yamaha boss reflects on ‘fabulous’ 2010
MotoGP
2010 was the year in which Yamaha continued its unrivalled domination of the MotoGP world championship as Jorge Lorenzo won his first world title in record-breaking fashion.
But it was also the year that the Japanese factory had to recover from the blow of losing talisman and nine-times world champion Valentino Rossi to rivals Ducati.
On the track, Yamaha was unstoppable again with Lorenzo and Rossi claiming 11 wins between them with the Spaniard amassing a record 383-points as he finished all 18 races.
Yamaha won the prestigious triple crown of rider, team and constructor titles for the third successive season and race boss Lin Jarvis told MCN: “It has been a fabulous year for Yamaha again having got the triple crown for the third year running.
"What more could we hope for? It is superb and seeing a new rider like Jorge that is staying with us win, it was important. Seeing his dominant performances at the end of the season reaffirmed to everybody that he was a justified and deserved champion. I was also happy to see our bike come back to full speed at the end of the season.
"Mid-season our competition had a little bit more horsepower than we did and at the back end of the season we took a new engine and even though we didn’t use it in Valencia, we came back to full speed, so that bodes well for the future.”
Jarvis, who did try and convince Rossi to extend his Yamaha deal earlier last season, also reflected on the Italian icon’s move to Ducati for next season.
Rossi enjoyed a glittering career on board a factory YZR-M1 winning four world titles and 46 races.
But he opted to quit and finish his career with Ducati back in late June and Jarvis added: “Valentino’s departure of course has been one of the big themes of the year, as has his injuries.
I think this was handled well. A divorce is always a difficult thing but I think at the end of the season we managed to keep a good understanding and a good mutual respect between Valentino and Yamaha and we were able to close this very important chapter of our racing history in the best way that we could.
"Seeing Valentino riding the Ducati is kind of weird and strange. But it is okay. We have also got Ben (Spies) and Jorge together in our factory team and we are quite satisfied and optimistic of their chances for the future.”
Jarvis said he was also delighted to see the emergence of American Spies after an impressive first full season in MotoGP.
Spies produced a series of eye-catching performances for the Monster Yamaha Tech 3 squad and he will move to the factory team alongside Lorenzo in 2011 following Rossi’s departure to Ducati.
Jarvis added: “Seeing Ben get best rookie is great and he had a very solid first year. To finish sixth with this level of opposition is good.
"Jorge was fourth in his first year but the competition is more difficult and intense now and we are very happy with Ben. We are optimistic and all set for next year.”

event_or_fact.property: he was also delighted to see the emergence of American Spies after an impressive first full season in MotoGP
?Seeing Ben get best rookie is great and he had a very solid first year
?Valentino?s departure of course has been one of the big themes of the year, as has his injuries
?It has been a fabulous year for Yamaha again having got the triple crown for the third year running

description.hltext_display: Angry Samba seeks Rovers exit
description.content:
Captain Christopher Samba is intent on leaving Blackburn after being angered by the decision of new owners Venky's to sack manager Sam Allardyce.
The Indian food group axed Allardyce within a month of completing their takeover of the club, with Steve Kean currently in temporary charge as a long-term replacement is sought.
"If this is the way the club's going to be run from now on, I don't want to be part of it and I want to leave," said the 26-year-old in remarks reported by the Sun.
"As captain it's very difficult to say this but I've thought long and hard about it. Nobody in football understands the decision to sack Sam.
"We could have been relegated last year and Sam saved the club, so how can he be treated like this now?"
Samba exempted chairman John Williams from blame, though, before pleading for a swift decision over Allardyce's replacement.
"I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision. He's a football man and respects what a great job Sam has done," he said.
He added: "The players and fans need answers about the club's future. Unless we commit to who the manager is, how can we attract big players in January?"

event_or_fact.property: The players and fans need answers about the club's future.
I'm sure Mr Williams would not have made this decision.

description.hltext_display: 광양시보건소, 2010. 음식� �이용 견문통보� � 최우수기관 � � �
description.content:
남도 좋은식단 실천 성과 광양시보건소는 � �남도 주관 '2010년 음식문화개� 분야 종합평가'에서 '음식� � 이용 견문 통보� �'운영 최우수 기관으로 � � �되는 영예를 안았다. 광양시는 2009년에 이어 2010년에도 '음식� �이용 견문통보� �' 운영 평가 결과 음식문화개� 2년연속 최우수기관으로 � � �되는 영예와 함께 포상금 2백만원을 받게 된다. 시는 음식문화 개� 에 공직자부터 � �극 참여하여 공감대를 확산시키� 자 � 관기관 직원및 사회단체 회원을 대상으로 음식문화개� 실천 동참 결의문을 채택하였으며, 좋은식단 실천업소 � �극 이용을 위한 자발� � 참여를 � 도함으로써 좋은 평가 결과를 거두었다. 견문통보� �는 남도의 푸짐한 상차림의 낭비� � 음식문화를 개� 하여 양(量)보다는 질(質)위주의 � (新)음식문화 � �착을 도모하기 위해 음식� �이용 후 문� �업소 및 우수업소의 사례를 관� �부서에 통보하므로서 � � 공직자가 식품위생감시원 역� 을 하여 깨끗하� 위생� �인 남도좋은식단 실천 조기� �착에 기여하게 된다. 광양시보건소 관계자는 � 진 음식문화 � �착을 위해 음식� � 이용시 앞� �시 � �공 및 개인용 집게, 국자사용, 남은 음식 싸주� 싸가기 등 � �라남도가 역� �� �으로 추진하� 있는 음식문화개� 사업이 조기에 � �착� 수 있도록 영업주 및 시민의 � �극� � 참여와 협조를 당부했다. (끝)

description.hltext_display: 我国城镇职工和居民医保参保人数达到4.24亿人
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
中国网12月22日报道 十一届全国人大常委会第十八次会议于12月20日至25日在人民大会堂举行。本次会议定22日下午第二次全体会议听取国务院的3个报告，即关于加快少数民族和民族地区经济社会发展工作情况的报告、关于深化医药卫生体制改革工作情况的报告、关于加快服务业工作的报告。中国网对会议进行了实时报道。
国家发展和改革委员会主任张平表示：全民医保是医改提出的重要目标，旨在减轻群众个人支付的医药费用负担。一是着力扩大医保覆盖面，从制度上实现基本医保全覆盖。提前一年在全国范围内推开城镇居民医保，将在校大学生纳入城镇居民医保范围。中央投入509亿元，解决了历史遗留的600多万关闭破产国有企业退休人员参保问题，同时统筹解决了200多万其他关闭破产企业退休人员和困难企业职工参保问题。4573万农民工也已纳入城镇职工医保范围。截至10月底，城镇职工和城镇居民医保参保人数增加到4.24亿人；新农合参合率持续稳定在90%以上，参合人数达到8.35亿人。

description.hltext_display: 케이티스, 가천의대길병원과 손잡� u-Health 사업 진출
description.content:
병, 의원 � �문 � 객서비스를 기반으로 수준 높은 의료서비스 � 보일 터 � 객만족 서비스 기반의 마케팅 � �문 기업인 케이티스(대표이사 노태석, 이하 ktis)는 가천의대길병원(원장 이태훈)과 'u-Healthcare'사업 공동추진에 관한 양해각서(MOU)를 체결했다� 밝혔다. 22일 가천의대길병원 뇌과학연구소 1층 회의실에서 진행된 MOU 체결식에는 가천의대길병원 이태훈 원장, ktis 노태석 대표이사를 포함한 양측 주요 임원이 참석하였다. 이번 MOU로 양사가 보� 하� 있는 역량을 바탕으로 u-Healthcare 사업을 공동으로 추진하게 된다.
ktis는 서울 지역 종합병원 및 지방 병원을 포함하여 약 30여개 병, 의원 예약센터를 운영하며 쌓아온 � �문 � 객서비스 운영노하우와 � �문인� � 인프라를 기반으로 수준 높은 의료진과 의료 컨텐� 를 보� 한 가천의대길병원과 u-Healthcare 사업모델을 공동으로 개발하� 사업화� 계획이다. ktis 노태석 대표이사는 "IT환경에서 � 비쿼터스 시대로 변하� 있는 의료환경에서 언� � 어디서나 예방, 진단, 치료, 사후관리의 의료서비스를 기대하는 � 객의 요구가 높아짐에 따라, u-Healthcare 산업이 급성장� 것으로 예견되� 있어 이번 MOU에 거는 기대가 크다. 향후 가천의대길병원을 비롯한 타병원과의 u-Healthcare 및 예약센터 운영에 대한 협� �을 지속� �으로 확대해 나갈 예� �이다"라� 밝혔다. 가천의대길병원 이태훈 원장(사진 가운데 우측)과 함께 한 ktis 노태석 대표이사(사진 가운데 좌측)
(끝)
출처 : ktis 본 콘텐� 는 해당기관의 보도자료임을 밝혀드립니다.

description.hltext_display: Мировой суд утвердил мировую Киркорова и Яблоковой
description.content:
, Москва, 11:25 Мировой суд в Москве в среду утвердил мировое соглашение между певцом Филиппом Киркоровым и режиссером Мариной Яблоковой по делу о ее публичном избиении, сообщает РИА "Новости" со ссылкой на адвоката Яблоковой Сергея Жорина. Статьи УК РФ "Оскорбление" и "Нанесение легкого вреда здоровью" относятся к делам частного обвинения и подлежат прекращению после примирения сторон.
Заключение мирового соглашения поставило точку в деле, в рамках которого Яблокова обвиняла Киркорова в избиении и нанесении оскорблений во время репетиции церемонии "Золотой граммофон-2010".
Условия соглашения остаются конфиденциальными, однако отмечается, что Киркоров признал вину в избиении Яблоковой.
Суд прекратил уголовное дело в отношении Киркорова в связи с примирением сторон. Судья отметила, что Киркоров судим впервые и преступление, в совершении которого он обвиняется, относится к деяниям небольшой тяжести. Судья подчеркнула, что Яблокова сама подала в суд письменное ходатайство о прекращении дела. В свою очередь, как говориться в постановлении суда, Киркоров на заседание не явился и подал ходатайство о прекращении дела в канцелярию суда.
По окончании заседания адвокат Яблоковой Жорин выразил благодарность всем поддержавшим его подзащитную. "Мы благодарны всем, кто, не испугавшись, выразил ей поддержку", - сказал Жорин.
По его мнению, уголовное дело в отношении Киркорова продемонстрировало, что "абсолютно любой человек в нашем обществе, вне зависимости от статуса, понесет наказание за оскорбление и избиение женщины". Жорин также подтвердил, что Яблокова не получит от Киркорова денег, а ограничится извинениями.
В свою очередь адвокат Киркорова Александр Добровинский не подтвердил и не опроверг информацию некоторых СМИ о том, что по условиям мирового соглашения его подзащитный обязан перечислить в благотворительный фонд Чулпан Хаматовой пять миллионов рублей.
Отвечая на вопрос журналистов, какой "моральный сигнал" обществу дает произошедшее, представитель Киркорова Александр Добровинский ответил: "Дружите с адвокатами".
Между тем, до сих пор неизвестна судьба заявления Марины Яблоковой, поданного в милицию, об избиении ее Филиппом Киркоровым. "Мы до сих пор не получили какую-либо информацию о судьбе этого заявления", - заявил в среду журналистам адвокат певца Александр Добровинский.
Как сообщила ИТАР-ТАСС пресс-секретарь суда Ольга Сутяпова, Киркоров и Яблокова в понедельник явились в судебное заседание и попросили суд утвердить соглашение, заключенное ими ранее. Условия мирового соглашения не разглашаются, однако представитель Киркорова Александр Добровинский отметил, что Яблокова отказалась от денежной компенсации. Адвокаты также заявили накануне, что мировое соглашение стало возможным благодаря тому, что Киркоров принес публичные извинения Яблоковой, и никак не связано с видеозаписью произошедшего между ними инцидента.
Между тем, сразу после заключения соглашения адвокат Киркорова Александр Добровинский заявил, что оно стало возможным, в том числе, на условии уничтожения видеозаписи произошедшего инцидента. "Мы похоронили эту пленку с почестями", - сказал Добровинский, добавив при этом, что у него сохранился дубликат видеозаписи.
Напомним, мировое соглашение между Киркоровым и Яблоковой было заключено в ночь на 16 декабря, его условия официально не разглашаются. После заключения соглашения адвокат Киркорова Александр Добровинский сообщил журналистам, что артист доволен заключением мирового соглашения с режиссером Яблоковой и даже обещает ей новогодний подарок. "Филипп доволен, что все это закончилось, он обещает новогодний подарок, наверное, он споет", - сказал адвокат. Несмотря на заявления о конфиденциальности условий мировой, об одной детали соглашения Добровинский все-таки проговорился. В ответ на вопрос журналистов он сказал: "Компенсации нет, Марина отказалась от денег".
9 декабря в производство мирового судебного участка номер 417 Пресненского района Москвы поступило заявление от Марины Яблоковой, в котором она просила суд принять к производству уголовное дело в отношении Киркорова по обвинению в совершении преступлений, предусмотренных ч.1 ст.115 УК РФ "Умышленное причинение легкого вреда здоровью" и ч.1 ст.130 УК РФ "Оскорбление", и возбудить уголовное дело частного обвинения.
Согласно законодательству, данные статьи УК РФ относятся к уголовным делам частного обвинения, преследование по которым подлежит прекращению в случае примирения сторон. Постановлением мирового судьи Яблокова была признана частным обвинителем, а Киркоров - подсудимым.
По словам Яблоковой, инцидент произошел 4 декабря на репетиции вручения премий "Золотой граммофон" в Государственном Кремлевском дворце. "Когда мы показывали Филиппу Киркорову декорации и выставляли свет для его выступления с Анной Нетребко, он заявил, что софиты светят ему в глаза. Я начала объяснять артисту технические нюансы, на что он в грубой форме ответил, что мое мнение его не интересует, и начал угрожать физической расправой. Практически сразу Киркоров ударил меня по лицу", - заявила Яблокова.
Как отметила режиссер, это произошло в присутствии многих звезд шоу-бизнеса и, таким образом, нанесло ей, помимо физических, еще и большие моральные травмы. Как писали СМИ, в результате избиения Яблокова получила ушибы бедра, голеней, нижней челюсти, разрыв десны, сотрясение мозга, а также повреждение шейного отдела позвоночника. Из-за сотрясения мозга теперь женщина страдает от постоянных головных болей.
Сам Киркоров первоначально отвергал все обвинения. Затем на своем официальном сайте певец признался, что иногда у него случаются проблемы со здоровьем. "Два раза в год у меня случаются серьезные приступы, вследствие которых я ничего не помню и не понимаю, что делаю. Я сам в ужасе от этого. И только теперь понимаю, что мне нужно серьезно лечиться", - заявил певец.
Лечиться Киркоров улетел в Израиль. В психиатрическом отделении тель-авивской больницы Тель а-Шомер певец прошел обследование и в прошлый четверг выписался оттуда.
Затем стороны то заявляли о готовности подписать мировое соглашение, то отказывались от своих слов. В результате мировое соглашение было подписано в ночь со среды на четверг в офисе посредника - известного адвоката Анатолия Кучерены.
Подробнее читайте на http://www.oilru.com/news/222830/

description.hltext_display: � 흥 참다래 컬러로 재배한다
description.content: 참다래 골드, � �드 계통 재배기� 및 � �망 과� �교육 실시 � 흥군(� 흥군수 박병종)은 지난 12월 21일 농업기� 센터 회의실에서 참다래 재배 농업인 50여명이 참석한 가운데 참다래 골드계통 재배기� 및 � �망에 대하여 � �국 참다래 � �시골드협회 장영길회장이 과� �교육을 실시했다. 이번 과� �교육은 기존 그린계통 헤이워드 품종 재배에서 단맛이 높� � 맛이 � �어 � 세대들이 즐겨찾는 골드, � �드계통으로 재배면� �을 확대하기 위해 실시했다. � �국 참다래 � �시골드협회 장영길 회장은 교육을 통해 "� �주도 � �스프리골드는 로열티로 매년 약 30억원을 지불하� 있어 농가에 부담이 큰 반면, 우리나라에서 육성한 � �시골드, 한라골드, 해금은 품질도 양호� 뿐만 아니라 나무 수세가 양호하여 재배가 용이하다"� 말했다. 그리� "헤이워드는 10a당 2,000∼3,000Kg을 생산, 가격은 Kg당 2,500∼3,000원 � �도이나 � �시골드와 해금은 4,000∼6,000Kg까지 생산이 가능하며, 가격도 4,000∼5,000원으로 소득이 3배 � �도 높게 형성되� 있어 시장� �망이 밝다"� 밝혔다. 또한 "골드계통은 헤이워드에 비해 습해, 병해충, � �온에 약하기 때문에 반드시 비가림 재배를 실시하여야 하� , 일시에 재배면� �을 확대하는 것 보다는 � �진� �으로 면� �을 늘� �가야 한다"� 강조했다. 군에서는 2008년부터 골드, � �드계통 재배면� �을 확대하기 위해 시범사업을 실시했으며, 해금은 현재 참다래 재배면� �의 14%까지 확대되었� 앞으로도 지속� �으로 재배면� � 확대를 추진하여 재배면� �의 30%까지 확대하여 농가소득 증대에 기여� 계획이다. 한편 � 흥 참다래는 158ha를 재배하여 연간 2,430톤을 생산하� 약 66억원의 소득을 올리� 있는 효자 농산물이다. (끝) 출처 : � 흥군청 본 콘텐� 는 해당기관의 보도자료임을 밝혀드립니다.

description.hltext_display: New Release Tells Compelling Story of Bosnian Refugees in Germany; Dog Ear Publishing Releases Book by William S. Walker
description.author: Dog Ear Publishing
description.content: --(PR.com)-- More than two million people were forced from their homes by the 1992-1995 war in Bosnia, the most violent chapter in the breakup of the former Yugoslavia. Germany provided sanctuary for nearly 350,000 Bosnians fleeing the fighting and German and Bosnian Voices in a Time of Crisis tells the story of what happened to these refugees during the war years and afterwards. The author, a journalist who lived in Germany for more than 30 years and has reported from the Balkan region for two decades, interviewed hundreds of refugees, humanitarian aid workers, politicians and ordinary Germans in reconstructing the story of the Bosnians in Germany. He notes the refugees found peace, freedom from persecution, abundant good will and financial support from the overwhelming majority of Germans. But almost as soon as the Dayton Agreements ending the war were formally signed in December 1995, the refugees were threatened with deportation as German politicians, some crassly attempting to profit politically from the refugee issue, demanded that the Bosnians leave. Walker concludes that Germans learned during this time there were few politicians who spoke for Germany as a nation. But there were many who promoted narrow political interests while ignoring what was best for the country as one of the great nations of the coming century.Walker wrote the book as his doctoral dissertation in East European History at Heidelberg University where he earned a Ph.D. with honors in 2009. He notes that the initial inspiration to write the book came from the many afternoons spent listening to refugees in Germany as they futilely sought to understand the war and the devastation it brought to Bosnia. The experience of being a refugee and the hardship and loss of that time period proved the single greatest emotional experience for many of those individuals, Walker writes. The book resonates with the emotions of the refugees struggling to make new lives for themselves and their families.One of the Heidelberg University dissertation evaluators noted: German and Bosnian Voices in a Time of Crisis is an eloquently written, groundbreaking document. This work brings us closer to an understanding of the basic problem of German history in the 1990s. Above all it puts our focus on the victims of the history.Walker wrote from more than 50 countries during nearly 30 years as a reporter and editor for the newspaper Stars and Stripes. He covered the NATO peace mission in Bosnia and visited all parts of the former Yugoslavia to write about the aftermath of the war. He retired in 2001 as the newspapers worldwide Executive Editor.For more information, visit www.InsideBosniaBooks.comGerman and Bosnian Voices in a Time of Crisis: Bosnian Refugees in Germany 1992-2002William S. WalkerDog Ear PublishingISBN: 978-160844-660-5 244 pages $10.99 USAvailable at Ingram, Amazon.com, Barnes & Noble and fine bookstores everywhere. Also available directly from DogEarPublishing at www.InsideBosniaBooks.com###More than two million people were forced from their homes by the 1992-95 war in Bosnia, the most violent chapter in the breakup of the former Yugoslavia. Germany provided sanctuary for nearly 350,000 Bosnians. German and Bosnian Voices in a Time of Crisis tells the story of what happened to them during the war years and afterwards. The author, a journalist who has reported from the Balkan region for two decades, interviewed hundreds of people to tell this story.

description.hltext_display: База Манас в Киргизии вновь оказалась в центре скандала
description.content:
, Москва, 09:55 База "Манас" в Киргизии вновь оказалась в центре скандала. В Вашингтоне вчера был представлен доклад Конгресса, в котором утверждается, что по меньшей мере четыре года США водили Россию за нос по вопросу снабжения этого объекта. Одна из структур "Газпрома", по данным конгрессменов, поставляла Пентагону топливо на миллиарды долларов для войны в Афганистане. Поставки якобы осуществлялись по сфабрикованным документам. В Москве "НГ" подтвердили, что проблема существует. Россия теперь поставит вопрос о повышении прозрачности сотрудничества с США и НАТО по Афганистану.
Вчера в Вашингтоне был обнародован скандальный доклад, подготовленный Подкомитетом по национальной безопасности и иностранным делам Палаты представителей Конгресса США.
New York Times приводит выдержки из этого расследования по поставкам авиационного топлива американским военным в Афганистане, которое проводилось восемь месяцев. Газета сообщает: "Подрядчики Пентагона приобретали авиационное топливо у дочерней компании российского энергогиганта "Газпром" (предположительно, это "Газпром нефть". – "НГ") и представляли российским властям сфабрикованные экспортные документы, указывающие, что топливо пойдет только на нужды гражданской авиации".
На самом деле оно поставлялось на базу (Центр транзитных перевозок) "Манас" в Киргизии и использовалось для заправки американских самолетов, участвующих в войне в Афганистане. Называется сумма контрактов, которые выиграли по пентагоновскому тендеру две посреднические компании, зарегистрированные на Гибралтаре, Red Star и Mina Corp., – 2 млрд. долл. Но однозначного объяснения мотивов "подлога" не приводится. Это якобы потребовалось для того, чтобы обойти экспортные ограничения на поставку топлива иностранным вооруженным силам. Возможно также, что американцам пришлось лукавить, чтобы избежать повышенных экспортных пошлин.
Чарльз Сквайес, занимающий руководящий пост в обеих упомянутых компаниях-подрядчиках, заявил, что "российские власти были в курсе ситуации с документами, но не реагировали, поскольку "Газпром" получал прибыль с продаж". "НГ" вчера обещали прокомментировать ситуацию в офисе компании Amsterdam & Peroff, обеспечивающей правовую поддержку Mina Corp. Но Дин Перофф, непосредственно работающий с Mina Corp., с нами так и не связался. В пресс-службе ОАО "Газпром нефть" "НГ" заявили: "В настоящее время "Газпром нефть" осуществляет оптовые поставки авиатоплива для нужд гражданской авиации Киргизии. Какие-либо договоренности в отношении поставок топлива Центру транзитных перевозок "Манас" отсутствуют. Поставки авиакеросина в Киргизию осуществляет ЗАО "Газпромнефть-Аэро", являющееся дочерним обществом ОАО "Газпром нефть". Там вчера не смогли ответить, были ли у "Газпром нефти" контрактные отношения с Red Star или Mina Corp.
Судя по словам источника "НГ" в дипломатических кругах, у этого скандала будут политические последствия. "Проблема с поставками существует. Факты будут изучены, выводы сделаны", – подтвердил российский дипломат. В Совете Россия–НАТО будет поставлен вопрос о "транспарентности сотрудничества по Афганистану". Напомним, что на ноябрьском саммите РФ–НАТО было решено создать Трастовый фонд по технической поддержке вертолетов российского производства в Афганистане. Москва не намерена "допускать нецелевое расходование средств".
Российские дипломаты напоминают, что это не первый сигнал о нечистоплотности американцев в Афганистане. Кстати, в понедельник Арнольд Филдс, специальный генеральный инспектор США по реконструкции Афганистана заявил, что обман и растраты в ходе восстановления страны и борьбы с "Аль-Каидой" и "Талибаном" могли обойтись налогоплательщикам в "миллиарды долларов".
Как бы то ни было, Россия будет вынуждена продолжать содействовать американцам и силам НАТО в Афганистане, поскольку это отвечает интересам ее собственной безопасности. Очевидно, Москва будет и дальше обеспечивать авиа- и железнодорожный транзит американских и натовских грузов в страну и готовить афганских наркополицейских. Вашингтон, как сообщается, добивается сейчас от Москвы возобновления поставок более дешевого российского горючего для "Манаса", которые прекратились 1 апреля после того, как вскрылись подробности сотрудничества с загадочными гибралтарскими компаниями. Пентагон, видимо, доволен действовавшей схемой: в минувшем месяце Mina выиграла тендер на новый контракт с Минобороны США по снабжению "Манаса" стоимостью 315 млн. долл. При этом в Бишкеке, по данным американской печати, не хотят иметь с этой компанией ничего общего. А авторы доклада предупреждают о пагубности чрезмерной зависимости от поставок российского авиатоплива.
Об этом пишет "Независимая газета", как передает www.centrasia.ru.Подробнее читайте на http://www.oilru.com/news/222734/

description.hltext_display: 广东一彩民30元中2822万 创当地彩票最高纪录
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
中新社茂名12月22日电 (葛燕梅 杨炯)广东茂名福利彩票发行中心22日证实，21日晚，中国联销双色球电脑福利彩票2010149期开奖，茂名市区一名彩民投注30元人民币，命中2822万元大奖，创当地彩票史上奖金最高纪录。
据检索，中奖彩票出自茂名市区人民北路电力招待所对面的44161008号福利彩票投注站，中奖彩民仅以一张投注额为30元的5倍单式票命中，就轻松获得2822万元的大奖。
茂名福彩中出2822万元历史大奖的消息不但震撼了铁杆福彩迷，更让想粘财气的广大市民“心痒痒”。当街头巷尾的福彩迷们都还在兴致勃勃地谈论这位幸运的“千万富翁”时候，彩民林先生对记者感叹地说：“原来用爱心、善心支持福彩，想一夜暴富也不是梦。”
据介绍， 21日茂名福彩可谓双喜临门。先是在20时44分，茂名福彩“中福在线”高凉中路销售厅刚刚喜中全国累积奖25万元大奖。后在21时30分双色球开奖，该市又一幸运彩民中得双色球2822万元大奖。
茂名福利彩票发行中心负责人叶秀盛称，茂名自1988年发行福利彩票以来，奖金千万元以上的已有5次，21日晚“出炉”的2822万元大奖再次刷新历史纪录。(完)

description.hltext_display: Man Shot, Killed In Reading
description.content:
READING, Pa. -- A 19-year-old man was shot and killed Tuesday in Reading.
Henry Caston Jr. was found lying in the street after being shot in the chest in the 900 block of Elm Street after 7 p.m., police said.
He was pronounced dead at Reading Hospital.

description.hltext_display: � 흥군, 2012년 해양수산사업 � 청 받아
description.content: 어업인 직� �소득사업으로 내년 1월 25일까지 읍면을 통해 � �수 � 흥군(� 흥군수 박병종)은 농림수산사업 실시규� �에 의거 2012년도 해양수산 사업 � 청 요� �을 군 홈페이지를 통해 공� 하� 2010. 12. 22∼2011. 01. 25까지(34일간) � 규사업 발굴 및 희망량을 � 청 받아 � �라남도 및 중앙부처에 � 청� 계획이다. 주요사업으로는 어업소득 기반시설, 친환경 양식경영, 해양환경보� �, 해양 관광 기반시설, � 흥 해양수산 브랜드 개발 등 어업인이 직� � 소득을 올릴 수 있는 사업으로 읍면을 통해 � 청 받게 된다. � 청건에 대해서는 타당성 조사를 실시� 계획이며, � �라남도 수산기� 사업소 � 흥지소에서는 총사업비 5천만원 이상 사업성 검� 를, 융자취급기관에는 융자금 5천만원 이상 � 용조사를 실시하여 심의 자료로 활용� 예� �이다. 군에서는 � 청 받은 해양수산사업을 내년 2월 하순경 군 수산조� �위원회 자체 심의를 거쳐 2월 말까지 � �라남도 및 중앙부처에 예산 요구� 계획으로 있다. 한편 � 흥군은 � 품질 수산물을 안� �� �으로 생산하기 위하여 과잉생산을 억� �� 수 있도록 어업인 지도와 병행하여 첨단 가공시설물을 지속� �으로 확충하� , 주 5일� � 근무� �에 따라 천혜의 해양관광 자원을 활용� 수 있는 기반시설물이 � 치� 수 있도록 최� 의 노� �을 다하� , 수산물의 기능성 물질을 이용 건강식품 개발사업 등 � 규사업을 발굴 사업� 청 계획으로 있다. (끝) 출처 : � 흥군청 본 콘텐� 는 해당기관의 보도자료임을 밝혀드립니다.

description.hltext_display: Heavy Metal Weekend 2010
description.content:
Our Most Enjoyable Anti-Event Ever?
Photography by Jay Kopycinski, Off - Road Staff, John Walters
As the daylight broke, gas tanks were filled up, tires were aired down, flags were attached to rear bumpers, and...mustaches and mullets were groomed? Yes indeed, that could only mean one thing: it was time for our annual Heavy Metal Weekend camping trip at Pismo Beach!
This was our third semi-official outing to the Oceano Dunes ORV Area (perhaps more well known simply by its former name, Pismo) on the second weekend of September, and we were again looking forward to our yearly celebration the four S's: Sand, Stomping (as in the accelerator pedal), Slayer, and once we got back to camp for the evening, Suds. Add a nice nighttime bonfire to the mix and the recipe is complete for our favorite type of outing, one that is more focused on fun, togetherness, and shared good times than any kind of competition or strict organization.
Sure enough, the goal was met. Everyone seemed to have a good time, trucks held together (except for Editor Jones' truck), and we drained the batteries each night playing heavy metal music. After long days of running the sand dunes, attendees cooked hot dogs and whatever else while enjoying some suds as the sun set and bonfires were sparked.

description.hltext_display: 장성군, 농기계 임대사업 운영 Very Good
description.content:
농기계 임대 활용실� � � �남 최� ...1대당 평� 이용 17.5일, 생산비 30% � �감 올해 농업인에게 큰 호응을 받아온 농기계 임대사업이 � 종의 미를 거뒀다. 군에 따르면 농업기� 센터 농업인회관에서 농업인 등 200여명이 참석한 가운데 2010년 농기계 임대사업 운영 평가회를 가졌다� 말했다. 이번 행사에서는 2010년 농기계 임대실� �을 분석 및 평가하� , 이용효율 � �� 를 위한 개� 사항 등 내년도 사업 활성화 방안에 대한 구체� �인 협의가 이뤄졌다. 아울러 동� �기 농기계 보관요� �과 농기계사용 안� �교육을 실시하� , 내년도 사업운영에 따른 농업인의 의견을 수� �하는 시간을 마� �했다. 한해 동안 군 농업기� 센터는 농기계 46종 149대를 � �국에서 가장 � �� �한 임대료(구입가의 0.25%)로 농가에 대여해 왔다. 그 결과 연 1,917대를 1,068 농가에 임대했으며, 임대료 수입만 4천2백여만원에 달했다. 이는 1대당 평� 이용 일수가 17.5일로 � �남 20개 농기계 임대사업 운영 시·군 중 최� 높은 수치이다. 아울러 군 � �체 농가수 6,495호 대비 16.4%가 이용, 작업면� � 증가 및 노동� � � �감으로 농업생산비 30% � �감 효과를 거둔 것으로 나타났다. 군은 밭작물의 농작업 기계화와 농기계 임대 추가수요에 부응하기 위해 국비예산 확보 등을 통해 임대 농기계 추가 구입 및 농기계 임대사업장 증설사업을 추진� 방침이다. 군 관계자는 "농기계 임대사업으로 농기계 구입부담은 물� 농가경영비 � �감과 � �기 영농 추진에 크게 기여했다는 평가를 받� 있다"며, "어� �운 농업현실에서 농업인들이 더 많은 혜택을 받을 수 있도록 지속� �인 노� �을 기울이� 다"� 말했다. (끝)
출처 : 장성군청 본 콘텐� 는 해당기관의 보도자료임을 밝혀드립니다.

description.hltext_display: Joliet man accused of shooting son, 12, in head
description.author: Mary Owen
description.content:
Wife wrestled gun from husband before calling 911, police say
X
Text Size
ct-met-joliet-shooting-1222-20101221
Roderick Tademy was a stay-at-home dad who was regularly seen in his Joliet neighborhood walking his twin daughters to school.
But a less wholesome image emerged this week after he was arrested and accused of shooting his 12-year-old son in the head, leaving the boy in grave condition Tuesday at Loyola University Medical Center in Maywood, police said.
"There are still a lot of unanswered questions," said Joliet police Chief Fred Hayes. "The most obvious of which is what could possibly possess this father to shoot his 12-year-old son."
The boy, Obedyah Tademy, is a seventh-grader at Hufford Junior High School in Joliet, police and school officials said.
"He is a really nice kid," said Elizabeth Tellez, 13, who lives across the street from the Tademy home in the 1200 block of Cutter Avenue. "I'm really sad. I'm really shocked."
Roderick Tademy, 35, is set to appear in Will County Circuit Court on Wednesday. He was initially charged with aggravated battery with a firearm, but officials said the charges likely will be upgraded.
The incident happened about 5:30 p.m. Monday in an upstairs apartment of a two-family residence in a middle-class neighborhood. The boy's 36-year-old mother called 911, saying her husband had shot their son, Hayes said. She apparently had wrestled the gun from her husband's hands, Hayes said.
Police found the boy in the living room with a single gunshot wound to the head, Hayes said. Police recovered the .22-caliber handgun believed to be used in the shooting and also an AK-47 rifle, semi-automatic submachine gun and a .380-caliber handgun. Hayes said Tademy did not have a firearm owner's identification card.
The couple's 6-year-old twins were in the home when the shooting occurred. The girls, who were not harmed, were taken into protective custody.
"We don't know exactly what they witnessed," Hayes said.
Hayes said the family had moved to Joliet less than two years ago and are originally from the Atlanta area.
He said Joliet police had no prior contact with the family.

description.hltext_display: Surviving Christmas after losing a loved one
description.content:
In this season of gathering, giving and grace, Maryanne Pope adds another word — grief.
“The first Christmas after John’s death was absolutely horrible,” she said. “All you can do is focus on what’s not in your life.”
Pope’s husband John Petropoulos was killed in 2000 while he was on duty as a Calgary Police officer. Petropoulos stepped through a false ceiling during a break and enter investigation and hit his head.
Ten years later, Pope has relocated to Sidney and is preparing to launch the second run of her book A Widow’s Awakening; a new book titled Barrier Down; a Tough Love Guide to Why, How and When to Pursue Your Dreams; and the sequel to a Widow’s Awakening due out in September 2011.
Now 42, Pope spent eight years writing A Widow’s Awakening, which was published in 2008. “I started two weeks after John died, it took that long to proof it, go through editors and send it to publishers … I had a wicked literary agent, the feedback I got was the problem with it is, it’s a memoir about a person who’s not famous,” she said. Undaunted, Pope reworked her manuscript and used creative non-fiction to bring her story to readers.
“It’s a book for people who like a good story,” she said.
It’s also a good read for those trying to support a friend or loved one through the initial stages of grief.
“People love a good story — that makes me pleased as punch. It’s a good grief resource, but it’s not for everybody. If you want a good book for somebody going through loss I would recommend Tuesdays with Morrie which gives a lot of lovely sage advice. Mine is great for people who are supporting someone who is grieving. It puts them in touch with what might be going on,” she said.
Pope’s book takes the reader into the depths of magical thinking, depression, anger and Pope’s questioning of her own and others’ spiritual and religious beliefs.
Three months after her husband’s death, Pope faced her first Christmas without him. “I had several beautiful plaques given to me from his team mates, co-workers and recruit classmates and photos, it was almost like a shrine, I wove lights through it and that was my Christmas tree. I couldn’t bear to go through everything thinking ‘we hung this together last year.’ Five, six, seven, eight years later those things did bring me comfort.”
Pope said it’s important to set traditions aside if you need to. The first year you should take traditions with a grain of salt. “What provided you comfort in the past like the tree, lights and buying gifts suddenly might bring nothing but horrible pain … give yourself permission to honour what you feel. Don’t cook a turkey, go out for dinner. Don’t buy presents or have a tree if they don’t bring you comfort.”
She also recommends saying no if you want to. “Christmas is a really busy time and everybody and his dog will think of you and you’ll get invitations to every function. I ran into trouble because I didn’t learn to say no. You go and everyone around you is happy and you feel less and less happy. You can end up dangerously sad when you get home, building up a lot of anger and resentment toward others because you’re comparing what you’ve lost to what they’ve got. The magic word is no, even if it’s family. Having quiet and time to cry might be better for you than getting out and ‘getting your mind off it’ — good luck with that — you will still be thinking of your loved one.”
Pope also encourages family members to remember the recent loss of a loved one. “People tend not to bring them up so they don’t cause more pain, but then the person thinks everybody has forgotten them. So don’t be afraid to bring (the deceased) into the conversation.”
This Christmas will be her first at her new home in Sidney. Pope moved here this summer and will host her mom and a friend for the holidays. “We’re going to a friend’s house Christmas eve and we’ll spend Christmas morning eating chocolate oranges and drinking coffee with Bailey’s … I’m glad my mom is coming. The best Christmas present for me is that my dog, the dog John and I had, is still here with me.”
A Widow’s Awakening is available at Dragon Horse in Sidney, 20 per cent of the proceeds from the sale of the book go to the John Petropoulos Memorial Fund, a non-profit organization that helps educate the public that workplace safety for emergency services personnel is a shared responsibility.

description.hltext_display: Основатель сайта WikiLeaks Джулиан Ассанж пишет мемуары: права на них уже проданы
description.content:
, Москва, 09:54 Основатель WikiLeaks Джулиан Ассанж решил написать мемуары. Об их выходе Ассанж уже договорился с рядом издательств. Рукопись появится в марте 2011 года, сообщает "Росбалт".
О планах Ассанжа сообщил в своем микроблоге Twitter Клаудио Лопес - глава литературного подразделения испанского издательского дома Random House Mondadori. Он заявил: Manuscrito listo en marzo, что означает "Рукопись будет готова в марте".
В Великобритании воспоминания Ассанжа выпустит издательство Canongate, а в США - Knopf, являющееся подразделением Random House, сообщает "Комсомольская правда". По сведениям британской газеты The Guardian, все права на перевод книги перейдут к британскому издательству Canongate. Само издательство отказалось подтвердить или опровергнуть эти сведения. О сумме гонорара Ассанжа также ничего не сообщается.
По некоторым данным, право на издание книги Ассанжа на английском языке закрепила за собой литературный агент Кэролайн Майчел, но литературное агентство Peter, Fraser and Dunlop отказалось подтвердить эту информацию.
Но, несмотря на скорое появление мемуаров Ассанжа, они все же немного запоздают - прежде будут обнародованы воспоминания его бывшего соратника, немца Даниэля Домшайт-Берга. Его книга "Внутри Wikileaks: моя работа на самый опасный сайт в мире" должна выйти в Германии уже 27 января следующего года, ее выпустит издательство Econ Verlag.
Австралиец Джулиан Ассанж был освобожден под залог из лондонской тюрьмы, где находился по обвинению шведских властей в преступлениях сексуального характера. Адвокат Ассанжа Марк Стефенс заявил, что считает процесс политизированным, а сам австралиец стал "жертвой вендетты" за деятельность его скандального ресурса, продолжающего публиковать материалы закрытой переписки дипломатической службы США.
Подробнее читайте на http://www.oilru.com/news/222732/

description.hltext_display: Mosley to give Pacquiao 'little more trouble' than Margarito
description.author: abs-cbnNEWS.com
description.content:
MANILA, Philippines – Boxing trainer Freddie Roach wants his ward Manny Pacquiao to undergo 6 weeks of training for the Shane Mosley fight next year.
In an interview with Filipino veteran sports analyst Ronnie Nathanielsz, Roach said Mosley is not one to be taken lightly.
“He did beat our last opponent [Antonio Margarito] also,” the venerable boxing coach said. “He's very fast and had [Floyd] Mayweather out for a moment and kind of let that slip out.”
Roach made the statement 2 days before Top Rank promoter Bob Arum announced that the Pacquiao-Mosley fight is a done deal.
The fight will take place on May 7, 2011 in Las Vegas, Nevada.
Aside from speed, Roach said Mosley is experienced and is a better boxer compared to Margarito.
“He’ll give us a little trouble because he is also experienced. He is a different type of fighter compared to Margarito… Manny loves guys who come to him but Mosley will box him and come to him much more intelligently,” said Roach.
RP training out of the question
The boxing coach also said that Pacquiao will do his training at the Wild Card Gym in Los Angeles. He said a Philippine-based training camp for the Filipino is out of the question.
Roach said he doesn't want a repeat of what happened in Baguio City while they were preparing for the Margarito fight.
“We had maybe our worst training camp ever,” he earlier said about the experience.
He said fighting Mosley won’t be easy, which is why they will need Pacquiao’s total focus.
“People who say this is the easiest fight are crazy. It's definitely not the easiest fight. This guy will get into shape for Manny and try to fight the best fight he can. It's not an easy fight by any means, but whoever Bob puts in front of me, I’ll get Manny ready for him,” said Roach.

description.content:
24일 오후 2시, '� �탄소 녹색성장을 위한 산림의 역� ' 주� �로 열� � 남해군은 오는 24일 오후 2시 문화체육센터에서 하영� � 농수산물� 통공사 사장을 초빙해 보물섬 아카데미 특강을 갖는다. 이번 초청 강좌는 '� �탄소 녹색성장을 위한 산림의 역� '이라는 주� �로 미래 산림의 역� 과 더불어 농수산물의 � 성장 동� � 구축 등 산림청장과 농림수산식품부 � �2차관을 역임한 경험을 바탕으로 농림수산업이 나아가야 � � �탄소 녹색성장에 대해 강의� 계획이다. 하 사장은 남해가 � 향으로 남해군수를 지냈으며 � �27대 산림청장, � �43대 농림수산식품부 � �2차관을 역임한 후 지난 11월 농림수산물 � 통공사 사장에 취임해 농식품 수출 100억 시대를 열어가기 위해 노� �하� 있다. 한편, 하 사장은 특강에 앞서 농업인 기관 단체와 마늘연구소에서 간담회 자리를 갖� 생생한 현장의 소리를 들을 계획이다.
군 관계자는 "남해군은 산림이 약 70%로 미래 산림의 역� 이 미래성장 동� �이 � 수 있으며, 농수산업이 주요 산업인 남해군의 미래가 � �탄소 녹색성장에서 찾을 수 있는 방안을 모색하는 계기가 � 것으로 기대한다"며, "농민과 어민, 산림에 관심 있는 군민의 많은 참여를 바란다"� 말했다. 아카데미 강좌와 관� � 사항은 군청 주민생활지원과 평생교육팀(860-3866)으로 문의하면 된다.
(끝)

description.hltext_display: Trio digs deep in quarry takeover
description.content:
Three local businessmen - Nigel Baxter, Richard Tuxford and Peter Stephens - have taken over Yellowstone Quarry, the last remaining producer of local Bulwell Stone. The new company will be called Nottingham Bulwell Stone.
The commercial property team at law firm Fraser Brown helped secure the takeover, which required the formation of the new company before the quarry could be purchased.
Corporate law partner Gavin White, who advised on the deal, said: This is an important deal for the region as it has secured the future of the last remaining producer of local Nottingham stone. Working with the commercial property team we pulled out all the stops to get this deal to completion quickly and are delighted that under new ownership the quarry can now continue to supply this unique product. Nigel Baxter said that the quarry represented a good business opportunity. He said: We could all see the potential in the product which there is a large market for in the area and were keen to realise its potential and protect this valuable local resource. We were working to tight deadlines to get the deal to completion and the team at Fraser Brown were seamless in their approach to what was a unique proposition.

This is an important deal for the region as it has secured the future of the last remaining producer of local Nottingham stone
